Source: Heavy rain is coming soon. If you live near a river or low area, please move valuables to higher ground now. It’s better to be safe.
Igbo: Nnukwu mmiri ozuzo na-abịa n'oge na-adịghị anya. Ọ bụrụ na ị bi nso n'osimiri maọbụ n'ebe dị ala, biko buru ihe dị mkpa buga n'ebe dị elu ugbua. Ọ ka mma na ị zọrọ onwe gị.
Hausa: Ruwan sama mai ƙarfi yana zuwa nan ba da jimawa ba. Idan kuna zaune kusa da kogi ko wuri mai kwari-kwari, ku mai da muhimman kayayyakinku zuwa wuri mai tudu yanzu. Ya kamata a kiyaye.
Yoruba: Òjò ńlá ń bọ̀ láìpẹ́. Bí ẹ bá ń gbé nítòsí odò tàbí àgbègbè tí kò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ jìnnà sí odò, ẹ jọ̀wọ́ ẹ gbé àwọn nǹkan iyebíye yín lọ síbi tó ga. Ó dára láti wà ní ààbò.

Source: Water levels are rising fast. Avoid flooded roads, just a little water can sweep you off your feet or stall your car. Stay sharp!
Igbo: Ogo mmiri na-ebuwanye ibu. Zere okporo ụzọ nwere ide mmiri n'ihi na obere mmiri nwere ike ịmịchatu gị maọbụ mee ka ụgbọala gị ghara ịgbazi. Kpachara anya!
Hausa: Ruwa yana ƙara yin sama cikin sauri. Ku guji bin hanyoyin da ruwa ya mamaye, saboda ruwa kaɗan ma zai iya ka da ku ko ya hana motarku aiki. Kasance a faɗake!
Yoruba: Omi ń yára ròkè. Yẹra fún àwọn ọ̀nà tí omi ti kún inú rẹ̀, omi díẹ̀ péré lè gbé ẹ lọ tàbí kó mú kí ọkọ̀ rẹ dúró. Ẹ wà lójúfò!

Source: If your area floods easily, don’t wait till the last minute. Pack an emergency bag with essentials, food, water, medicine, and important documents.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ide mmiri na-adịkarị ebe i bi, echela ka o ruo oge ikpeazụ. Buru ihe ndị dị mkpa, nri, mmiri, ọgwụ, na akwụkwọ ndị dị mkpa tinye n'akpa gị.
Hausa: Idan yankinku na da saurin yin ambaliya, kada ku jira har lokaci ya ƙure. Ku ɗebe jaka da abinci da ruwa da magani na gaggawa da kuma takardu masu muhimmanci.
Yoruba: Tó bá jẹ́ pé omi máa ń bo àdúgbò rẹ, má ṣe dúró títí dìgbà tó bá yá. Kó àwọn nǹkan tó o nílò, oúnjẹ, omi, oògùn àti àwọn ìwé pàtàkì sínú àpò pàjáwìrì.

Source: Drainage systems are already full, and more rain is on the way. If you notice water rising, start making plans to leave before it’s urgent.
Igbo: Ọwa mmiri niile ejuola, mmiri ọzọ na-akwado izo. Ọ bụrụ na ị chọpụta na mmiri na-ebili, kwado pụọ tupu ọ daa mberede.
Hausa: Magudanan ruwa sun riga sun cika, kuma ruwan sama na shirin sauƙa. Idan kukuka ga ruwa yana ƙara yin sama, ku fara shirin barin wurin kafin lamarin ya yi tsanani.
Yoruba: Àwọn eto ònà tí omi gbà ń ṣàn ti kún, òjò á sì máa rọ̀ lọ́jọ́ iwájú. Tó o bá kíyè sí i pé omi ti ń lọ sókè, bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ṣètò bó o ṣe máa kúrò níbẹ̀ kó tó di pé ó di kánjúkánjú.

Source: Floodwater is dirty and dangerous. If you must wade through it, protect your feet and wash up immediately. Don’t take risks with your health.
Igbo: Mmiri ide ruru inyi ma nwe ike ibunye mmadụ ọrịa. Ọ bụrụ na ị chọrọ isi n'ime ya gafee, chebe ụkwụ gị ma saa ahụ́ ozugbo. E jila ahụike gị egwu egwu.
Hausa: Ruwan ambaliya yana da datti da haɗari. Idan dole sai kun ratsa ta cikinsa, to ku kare ƙafafunkuu kuma ku wanke jikinku da zarar kun wuce. Kada ku yi wasa da lafiyarku.
Yoruba: Àgbàrá máa ń dọ̀tí ó sì léwu. Tí o bá ní láti rìn nínú rẹ, dáàbò bo ẹsẹ rẹ, kó o sì tètè wẹ̀. Má ṣe fi ìlera rẹ wewu.

Source: The heat is serious today. If you’re feeling dizzy or weak, find shade and drink plenty of water. Don’t ignore the signs!
Igbo: Oké okpomọkụ dị taa. Ọ bụrụ na ajụ na-ebu gị maọbụ na ahụ esighi gị ike, gaa na ndò ma ṅụọ mmiri nke ọma. E legharala ihe ịrịba ama ndị ahụ anya!
Hausa: Yau zafi yayi tsanani sosai. Idan kuna jin jiri ko kasala, nemi inuwa ku huta kuma ku sha ruwa sosai. Kada ku yi watsi da waɗannan alamomi!
Yoruba: Óóru tóni lágbára gan nií. Tó bá ń ṣe ẹ́ bí ẹni pé orí rẹ ń wú tàbí pé o kò lágbára, lọ síbi tó ni iboji, kó o sì mu omi tó pọ̀. Má ṣe fójú fo àwọn àmì náà!

Source: Check on older family members and kids. They struggle more in extreme heat. Make sure they’re drinking water and staying cool.
Igbo: Leruo ndị okenye na ụmụaka nọ n'ezinaụlọ gị anya. Ọ na-ahịa ha ahụ ịnọ n'oké okpomọkụ. Gbaa mbọ hụ na ha na-aṅụ mmiri ma na-anọ ebe ikuku dị.
Hausa: Duba lafiyar tsofaffi da yara da ke cikin gidanku. Sun fi shan wahala lokacin zafi mai tsanani. Ku tabbatar cewa suna shan ruwa kuma suna zama cikin sanyi-sanyi.
Yoruba: Ẹ ṣàbẹwò àwọn arúgbó àti àwọn ọmọ kékeré. Wọ́n máa ń ní ìṣòro púpọ̀ nígbà tí ooru bá pọ̀. Mú kó dájú pé wọ́n ń mu omi tó àti pé wọ́n wà níbi tó tútù.

Source: Try to limit outdoor work during peak heat hours. If you must go out, wear light clothes and take breaks often.
Igbo: Gbalịa ka ị ghara ịrụ ọrụ n'èzí n'oge okpomọkụ. Ọ bụrụ na ọ bụ iwu na ị ga-apụ apụ, yiri uwe na-anaghị anyị arọ ma na-ezutụ ike kwa mgbe.
Hausa: Ku yi ƙoƙari ku rage yawan yin aiki a waje a lokutan da zafi ya fi tsanani. Idan kuma dole sai kun fita, to ku sanya tufafi marasa nauyi kuma ku riƙa hutawa aki-aki.
Yoruba: Gbìyànjú láti dín iṣẹ́ tí wàá máa ṣe níta kù lákòókò tí ooru bá pọ̀ jù. Bó bá pọn dandan pé kó o jáde, wọ aṣọ fẹ́rẹ́fẹ́, kí o sì máa sinmi lẹ́ẹ̀kọọ̀kan.

Source: Power cuts are possible because of high electricity demand. Charge your phone and keep water stocked in case of an outage.
Igbo: E nwere ike were ọkụ n'ihi na ndị ji ọkụ eletrik eme ihe karị akarị. Tinye ekwentị gị n'ọkụ ma chekwaa mmiri ma ọ bụrụ na e were ọkụ.
Hausa: Akan iya ɗauke wutar lantarki saboda yawan buƙatar amfani da wutar lantarki. Yi cajin wayarku kuma ku tanadi ruwa a gida ko da za a ɗauke wuta.
Yoruba: Ìyọkúrò nínu ina lè ṣẹlẹ̀ nítorí ìbéèrè fún iná ga. Gbìyànjú láti ri pè fónú rẹ ní ina lòrí, kí o sì pèsè omi tó pọ̀ sílẹ̀ nítòsí, bi o ba ṣẹlẹ pe ìna lọ.

Source: Heatwaves can dry up wells and streams. Start conserving water now, use it wisely so it lasts longer.
Igbo: Oké okpomọkụ nwere ike ime ka mmiri dị n'ọmị na iyi takpọọ. Bido ichekwa mmiri ugbua, jiri ya n'ụzọ dị mma ka o wee nọtere gị aka.
Hausa: Zafin rana kan iya sa rijiyoyi da ƙoramu su ƙafe. Ku fara tanadin ruwa yanzu, ku yi amfani da shi yadda ya dace ta yadda zai yi ƙarko sosai.
Yoruba: Ooru tó ń mú gan-an lè mú kí kànga àti odò gbẹ. Bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí í ṣọ́ omi nísinsìnyí, kó o sì máa lò ó lọ́nà tó bọ́gbọ́n mu, kí omi nà le pẹ́.

Source: Strong winds are expected tonight. Secure loose objects outside so they don’t become flying hazards.
Igbo: A tụrụ anya na nnukwu ifufe ga-eku n'abalị a. Debe ihe ndị na-esighị ike n'èzí ka ha ghara ịghọ ihe ize ndụ na-efe efe.
Hausa: Ana sa ran yin iska mai ƙarfi a daren yau. Ku tabbata kun kulle kaya marasa nauyi da ke waje don kada su zama haɗari yayin shawagi.
Yoruba: A ń retí afẹ́fẹ́ tó lagbara lálẹ́ òní. Rí wípé ósétó áâbó fún gbogbo áwón óhun alaimuṣinṣin níta, kí wọ́n má bà á di ewu tó lè fò.

Source: If you see dark clouds forming fast, take it seriously. Seek shelter before the storm starts, don’t wait till it’s too late.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ị hụ ka ígwé ojii na-agba n'ike n'ike, were ya ka ihe dị mkpa. Chọọ ebe mgbaba tupu ebili mmiri amalite, e chela ka oge gafee.
Hausa: Idan kuka ga baƙin hadari yana haɗuwa da sauri, ku ɗauki abin da muhimmanci. Nemi mafaka kafin a fara guguwa, kada ku jira har sai lokaci ya ƙure.
Yoruba: Tó o bá rí i pé àwọn àwọsánmà dúdú ti ń pọ̀ sí i lójú ẹsẹ̀, má fọ̀rọ̀ náà ṣeré rárá. Wá ibi ìsádi kí ìjì náà tó bẹ̀rẹ̀, má ṣe dúró di ìgbà tí ó ti pẹ́ jù.

Source: Falling trees and flying debris can be dangerous. Stay indoors and away from windows during heavy winds.
Igbo: Osisi ndị dara ada na ihe ndị na-efe efe nwere ike imeru gị ahụ. Nọrọ n'ime ụlọ ma ghara ịga na windo mgbe oké ifufe na-efe.
Hausa: Bishiyoyi masu faɗuwa da tarkace masu shawagi na iya zama haɗari. Kasance a cikin gida kuma ku nisanci tagogi yayin iska mai ƙarfi.
Yoruba: Áwón Igí tí ń ṣubú àti àwọn nkan tí afẹ́fẹ́ ń gbé lewu gan. Má ṣe jáde nílé, má sì ṣe sún mọ́ fèrèsé nígbà tí afẹ́fẹ́ bá ń fẹ́ gan-an.

Source: If you rely on electricity for medical equipment, have a backup plan. Power lines can go down in storms, so be prepared.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ị chekwubere ọkụ eletrik, nwe atụmatụ ọzọ. Igwe ọkụ eletrik nwere ike ịda n'oge ebili mmiri, n'ihi ya, kwado onwe gị.
Hausa: Idan kun dogara ne da wutar lantarki wurin amfani da na'urorin kula da lafiya, ku tanadi madadinta. Wayoyin wuta na iya yankewa yayin guguwa, don haka ku shirya.
Yoruba: Tí o bá ń lo ẹrọ ìtọ́jú tó ń ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú ina, o gbọ́dọ̀ ṣètò bó o ṣe máa lò wọ́n. Àwọn okun ina lè jà ni ákókó ìjì, torí náà,  murá sile.

Source: Storms can disrupt mobile networks. If you need help, send text messages instead of calling, it uses less battery and is more reliable.
Igbo: Ebili mmiri nwere ike ịghasa netwọk ekwentị. Ọ bụrụ na ị chọrọ enyemaka, detuo ozi ị ga-ezi n'ekwentị gị kama ịkpọba mmadụ, ọ naghị eri oke batrị ma bụrụ nke e nwere ike ịdabekarịsị.
Hausa: Guguwa na iya jawo cikas ga hanyoyin sadarwa na wayar hannu. Idan kuna buƙatar taimako, aika saƙo na rubutu maimakon kira, saboda yana jan caji ɗan kaɗan kuma ya fi tabbaci.
Yoruba: Ìjì líle lè fa idalọwọduro si awọn nẹtiwọọki. Tí o bá nílò ìrànlọ́wọ́, á yárá kó ló óró àkọráńṣẹ́ ju kó pé, nítórípé ó máa n lo batiri kékeré, ó sì dájú jù.

Source: The sun is scorching today! Wear a hat, drink plenty of water, and avoid working outside for too long.
Igbo: Anwụ na-achasi ike taa! Kpuru okpu, ṅụọ mmiri nke ọma ma zere ịrụ ọrụ n'èzí ruo ogologo oge.
Hausa: Rana ta yi matuƙar zafi yau! Saka hula, sha ruwa sosai, ku kuma guji yin aiki a waje na dogon lokaci.
Yoruba: Oòrùn yìí gbóná gán léní! Wọ fìlà, mu omi púpọ̀, má sì ṣe máa ṣiṣẹ́ níta fún àkókò gígùn.

Source: With little rain expected this month, water sources may dry up. Conserve what you have and use it wisely.
Igbo: Ebe ọ bụ na a tụrụ anya obere mmiri ozuzo n'ọnwa a, isi iyi mmiri nwere ike ikpọnwụ. Chekwaa ihe i nwere ma jiri ya mee ihe n'ụzọ dị mma.
Hausa: Yayin da ake sa ran samun ƙarancin ruwan sama a wannan watan, madatsan ruwa na iya bushewa. Adana ruwan da kuke da shi kuma ku yi amfani da shi cikin hikima.
Yoruba: Níwọ̀n bí ìròyìn bá ṣe sọ pé òjò kéré ni a máa ní lósù yìí, orísun omi le gbẹ. Ṣọ́ omi rẹ dáadá, kó o sì máa lò ó lọ́nà tó bọ́gbọ́n mu.

Source: Extreme heat can damage crops. Farmers should irrigate early in the morning or late in the evening to reduce water loss.
Igbo: Oké okpomọkụ pụrụ imebi ihe ọkụkụ. Ndị ọrụ ugbo kwesịrị ịgbara ya mmiri n'isi ụtụtụ maọbụ n'uhuruchi iji belata ọnwụ mmiri.
Hausa: Zafi mai tsanani na iya lalata amfanin gona.Ya kamata manoma su yi ban-ruwa da sassafe ko da yamma don rage tsoteswa da bushewar ruwa.
Yoruba: Ooru tó ń mú gan-an lè ba irè oko jẹ́. Àwọn àgbẹ̀ gbọ́dọ̀ máa bomi rinlẹ̀ láàárọ̀ kùtùkùtù tàbí nírọ̀lẹ́ kí wọ́n má bàa pàdánù omi.

Source: Prolonged heat and no rain can lead to bushfires. Avoid burning waste near dry grass or farmlands.
Igbo: Okpomọkụ nọtere aka na enweghị mmiri ozuzo nwere ike ime ka ọhịa gbaa ọkụ. Zere ịsụ ahịhịa ọkụ n'akụkụ ala kpọrọ nkụ maọbụ n'ebe a na-akọ ihe.
Hausa: Zafi mai tsawo da rashin ruwan sama na iya haddasa gobarar daji. Guji ƙona shara kusa da ciyawa ko gonaki busassu.
Yoruba: Ooru tó ń mú gan-an àti òjò tí kò rọ̀ lè fa iná igbó. Má ṣe sun ìdọ̀tí nítòsí koríko gbígbẹ tàbí ilẹ̀ oko.

Source: If you start feeling weak or dizzy under the sun, stop and rest. It could be heat exhaustion, get water and shade immediately.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ajụ na-ebu gị maọbụ ahụ esighị gị ike mgbe ị nọ n'okpuru anwụ, kwụsị ma zuo ike. O nwere ike ịbụ ike ọgwụgwụ n'ihi okpomọkụ, ṅụọ mmiri ma nọdụ na ndo ozugbo.
Hausa: Idan kuka fara jin kasala ko jiri lokacin da kuke cikin rana, ku tsaya ku huta. Wataƙila zafin rana ne ya rinjaye ku, ku sha ruwa ku shiga inuwa nan da nan.
Yoruba: Tó o bá bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí í rẹ̀wẹ̀sì tàbí kí óyí má kó é nínú oorun, dáwọ̀ dúró kí o sinmi. Ó lè jẹ́ ìfarapa ooru, wa omi àti íbójí lọ lẹsẹkẹsẹ.

Source: More rain is expected tonight, and the ground is already soaked. If your area floods easily, plan ahead, don’t wait till water enters your home.
Igbo: A tụrụ anya na mmiri ga-ezo ọzọ n'abalị a, mmiri ejuola n'ala. Ọ bụrụ na ebe i bi na-adọ mmiri ọsịsọ, tụọ arọ n'oge, e chela ka mmiri banye bee gị.
Hausa: Ana sa ran ƙarin ruwan sama mai yawa da daddare, kuma har ƙasa ta riga ta jiƙe. Idan yankinku na da saurin yin ambaliya, ku fara shiri tun wuri, kada ku jira har sai ruwa ya shigo gidanku.
Yoruba: Òjò á tún rọ̀ lálẹ́ yìí, ilẹ̀ sì ti rin gbingbin. Bí omi bá máa ń bo àdúgbò rẹ, ṣètò ṣáájú, má ṣe dúró dìgbà tí omi bá wọlé rẹ.

Source: Blocked gutters and drains make flooding worse. If you can, clear the ones around you before the rain starts. Small actions save lives.
Igbo: Ụsọ mmiri e mechiri emechi na-eme ka ide kawanye njọ. Ọ bụrụ na i nwere ike, kpochapụ ndị gbara gị gburugburu tupu mmiri amalite izo. Obere omume na-azọpụta ndụ.
Hausa: Tosassun kwatoci na ƙara munin ambaliya. Idan zaku iya, ku share waɗanda ke kusa da ku kafin a fara ruwan sama. Ƙananan matakai kan tsare rayuka.
Yoruba: Àwọn ọ̀nà abẹ́lẹ̀ tó ti dí máa ń mú kí àkúnya omi túbọ̀ burú sí i. Tó o bá lè ṣe é, kọ́kọ́ yọ àwọn tó wà nítòsí rẹ kúrò kí òjò tó bẹ̀rẹ̀. Àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ kéékèèké máa ń gba ẹ̀mí là.

Source: If floodwaters enter your home, turn off gas and electricity immediately. It could prevent a fire or electric shock. Stay safe.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ide mmiri abanye n'ụlọ gị, gbanyụọ gas na ọkụ eletrik ozugbo. Ọ nwere ike igbochi ọkụ maọbụ eletrik ịdọgbi gị. Zọrọ onwe gị..
Hausa: Idan ruwan ambaliya ya shiga gidanku, kashe gas da wutar lantarki nan da nan. Hakan na iya hana gobara ko shokin ɗin wutar lantarki. Kasance cikin aminci.
Yoruba: Tó bá ṣẹlẹ̀ pé omíyalé wọnú ilé rẹ, tètè pa gáàsì àti iná. Ó lè dènà iná tàbí ìkọlù ẹ̀lẹ́tírìkì. Gbìyànjú láti wà ní ààbò.

Source: Flooding has increased mosquito breeding. Protect yourself, use nets, cover exposed skin, and clear stagnant water around your home.
Igbo: ide mmiri emewo ka anwụnta na-amụba. Chebe onwe gị, jiri ụgbụ, yichie ahụ gị ma hichaa mmiri na-adọ adọ dị n'akụkụ be gị.
Hausa: Ambaliya ta ƙara yawan sauro. Kare kanku, yi amfani da gidan sauro, rufe fatar jikinku, ku kuma share ruwan da ke tare kusa da gidanku.
Yoruba: Ìkún omi ti mú kí àwọn ẹ̀fọn pọ̀ sí i. Dáàbò bo ara rẹ, lo àwọ̀n, bo awọ ara ti o farahan, yọ omi tó ti dúró sójú kan kúrò ní àyíká ilé rẹ.

Source: Heavy rain can cause sudden road collapses. Drive carefully, and avoid shortcuts you’re unsure about.
Igbo: Nnukwu mmiri ozuzo nwere ike ime ka okporo ụzọ mebie n'ike. Uche gị dị ya ma ị na-anya ụgbọala, ma zere nkenke ụzọ ị na-amaghị nke ọma.
Hausa: Ruwan sama mai ƙarfi na iya haddasa lalacewar hanya kwatsam. Yi tuƙi cikin kula, ku guji hanyoyin ratse da ba ku tabbata da amincinsu ba.
Yoruba: Òjò tó rọ̀ gan-an lè mú kí ojú ọ̀nà ya lulẹ̀ lójijì. Máa ṣọ́ra bó o bá ń wakọ̀, má sì ṣe gba àwọn ọ̀nà kéékèèké tí kò dá ẹ lójú.

Source: Flooded water wells can be contaminated. If your water smells or tastes unusual, boil it before drinking or use bottled water.
Igbo: E nwere ike imeru omi ide mmiri dọjụrụ na ya. Ọ bụrụ na ọ nwere ka mmiri ị na-aṅụ si atọ maọbụ esi, sie ya n'ọkụ tupu ị ṅụọ ya maọbụ ị zụta mmiri a na-ere na karama plastik.
Hausa: Ruwan rijiyoyin da ruwan ambaliya ya shiga na iya gurɓata. Idan ruwanku  yana wari ko ɗanɗanon da ba a saba ji ba, tafasa kafin ku sha ko kuna shan ruwan roba.
Yoruba: Àwọn kànga tí omi kún inú wọn lè di eléèérí. Tó o bá rí i pé òórùn omi rẹ kò bára dé tàbí pé ó rí bákan lẹ́nu, se kó o tó mu tàbí kó o lo omi inú ìgò rọ́bà.

Source: Rescue teams may take time to reach flooded areas. If you must evacuate, do so early when it’s still safe.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ nnapụta nwere ike igbu oge tupu ha eruo n'ebe ndị mmiri tojuru. Ọ bụrụ na ị ghaghị ịpụ, mee ya n'oge mgbe ọ ka bụ ihe ize ndụ.
Hausa: Masu ceto na iya jinkiri wajen isa wuraren da aka yi ambaliya. Idan dole sai kun ƙaura, to ku yi hakan da wuri tun komai yana lafiya.
Yoruba: Ó lè pẹ́ díẹ̀ kí àwọn Ẹgbẹ́ Olùgbàlà tó lè dé ibi tí omi ti ya wọlé. Tó bá di dandan pé kó o fi ibẹ̀ sílẹ̀, tètè lọ, nígbà tí kò sí ewu.

Source: Flooded roads can hide deep holes. Even shallow-looking water can be dangerous. Find another route if possible.
Igbo: E nwere ike inwe olulu miri emi n'okporo ụzọ ndị ide mmiri jupụtara. Ọbụna mmiri na-emighị emi pụrụ ịdị ize ndụ. Chọta ụzọ ọzọ ma ọ bụrụ na ọ ga-ekwe omume.
Hausa: Hanyoyin da ruwa ya mamaye na iya ɓoye rami mai zurfi. Hatta ruwa kaɗan da kuka raina na iya zama mai haɗari. Canza hanya idan zai yiwu.
Yoruba: Àwọn ọ̀nà tó ti kún àkúnya lè ní àwọn kòtò tó jìn. Kódà omi tó dà bíi pé kò jinlẹ̀ pàápàá lè léwu. Tó bá ṣeé ṣe, wá ọ̀nà míì.

Source: If your home is at risk of landslides during heavy rain, don’t sleep near weak walls. Move to a safer part of the house or stay elsewhere for the night.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ala nwere ike ịda n'ụlọ gị n'oge oké mmiri ozuzo, elela anya n'akụkụ mgbidi ndị na-esighị ike. Gaa n'ebe dị nchebe karị n'ụlọ maọbụ nọrọ ebe ọzọ n'abalị.
Hausa: Idan gidanku yana cikin hatsarin zabtarowar ƙasa yayin ruwan sama, kada ku kwana kusa da bangon da ba shi da ƙarfi. Ku koma inda ya fi aminci a cikin gidan ko kada ku kwana a gidan gaba ɗaya.
Yoruba: Bí ilé rẹ bá wà ní ewu ìmìtìtì ilẹ̀ nígbà tí òjò bá ń rọ̀ gan-an, má ṣe sùn nítòsí ògiri tí kò lágbára. Máa lọ síbi tí kò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ léwu nínú ilé tàbí kó o lọ sùn níbòmíì.

Source: Farmers should take extra care. Prolonged rainfall can damage crops, check drainage and protect seedlings.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ ugbo kwesịrị ịkpachara anya karị. Mmiri na-ezo ogologo oge nwere ike imebi ihe ọkụkụ, gbochie drainage ma chebe mkpụrụ.
Hausa: Ya kamata manoma su ƙara kula sosai. Ruwan sama mai tsawo na iya lalata amfanin gona. A duba magudanan ruwa a kuma kare sabbin shuke-shuke.
Yoruba: Ó yẹ kí àwọn àgbẹ̀ máa ṣọ́ra gan-an. Òjò tó ń rọ̀ fún àkókò gígùn lè ba irè oko jẹ́, ṣàyẹ̀wò ọ̀nà tí omi ń gbà ṣàn, kó sì dáàbò bo àwọn ọ̀gbìn.

Source: If your home is flooding, turn off the electricity at the main switch. Water and electricity are a deadly mix, stay safe.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na mmiri na-eju n'ụlọ gị, gbanyụọ ọkụ eletrik n'ebe isi ọkụ eletrik dị. Mmiri na ọkụ eletrik bụ ngwakọta na-egbu egbu, nọrọ na nchebe.
Hausa: Idan ambaliya ta mamaye gidanku, kashe wutar lantarki daga babbar makunnar wutar gidan. Ruwa da wuta haɗari ne idan suka haɗu. A kiyaye.
Yoruba: Bí omi bá ń bo ilé rẹ, pa iná mànàmáná tó wà níbẹ̀. Omi àti iná mànàmáná máa ń ṣekú pani, ẹ ṣọ́ra.

Source: Be careful where you step after flooding. Snakes, sharp objects, and hidden holes can cause serious injury. Walk with caution.
Igbo: Kpachara anya n'ebe ị na-azọ mgbe ide mmiri gasịrị. Agwọ, ihe ndị dị nkọ, na oghere ndị zoro ezo pụrụ imerụ mmadụ ahụ́ nke ukwuu. Jiri nlezianya na-eje ije.
Hausa: Ku lura da inda kuke takawa bayan gama ambaliya. Macizai da abubuwa masu kaifi da ɓoyayyaun ramuka na iya cutar da ku. Yi tafiya cikin kula.
Yoruba: Ṣọ́ra bó o ṣe ń rìn lẹ́yìn tí òjò bá ti rọ̀. Àwọn ejò, àwọn ohun abẹ̀rẹ́, àtàwọn ihò tó fara sin lè ṣe èèyàn léṣe gan-an. Máa ṣọ́ra bó o ṣe ń rìn.

Source: Food and water may be contaminated after floods. Boil drinking water, and check food properly before eating. Your health comes first.
Igbo: A pụrụ imerụ nri na mmiri mgbe ide mmiri gasịrị. Mee ka mmiri ị na-aṅụ sie ike, leekwa nri anya nke ọma tupu i rie ya. Ahụ ike gị na-ebute ụzọ.
Hausa: Abinci da ruwa na iya gurɓata bayan gama ambaliya. Tafasa ruwan sha, kuma ku duba abinci sosai kufin ku ci. Lafiyarku ta fi komai.
Yoruba: Oúnjẹ àti omi lè di ẹlẹ́gbin lẹ́yìn omíyalé. Máa se omi tó o máa mu, kó o sì máa yẹ oúnjẹ wò dáadáa kó o tó jẹ ẹ́. Ìlera rẹ ló ṣe pàtàkì jù.

Source: Bridges and roads may be weak after heavy rain. If you’re unsure about a path, wait for authorities to confirm it’s safe.
Igbo: Nnukwu mmiri ozuzo zosịa, akwà mmiri na okporo ụzọ nwere ike, ha agaghị esi ike. Ọ bụrụ na ị maghị ụzọ ị ga-esi gaa ebe ahụ, chere ka ndị ọchịchị mara ma ebe ahụ ọ dị mma ịgafee.
Hausa: Gadoji da hanyoyi na iya raunana bayan ruwan sama mai yawa. Idan baku da tabbaci game da amincin wata hanya, ku jira hukumomi su tabbatar da amincinta.
Yoruba: Àwọn afárá àtàwọn ojú ọ̀nà lè má ṣiṣẹ́ dáadáa lẹ́yìn òjò tó rọ̀. Bí o kò bá mọ ọ̀nà tó o máa gbà, dúró dìgbà tí àwọn aláṣẹ bá sọ fún ẹ pé kò léwu.

Source: Listen for updates from local officials. Weather can change quickly, and it’s better to get information early than to be caught off guard.
Igbo: Gee ntị n'ozi ndị ọchịchị obodo na-ezi gị. Ọnọdụ ihu igwe nwere ike ịgbanwe ọsịsọ, ọ dịkwa mma inweta ihe ozi n'oge karịa ịda na mberede.
Hausa: Kuna sauraron sabbin bayanai daga hukumomi na cikin gida. Yanayi na iya sauyawa cikin sauri, kuma yana da kyau a sami bayanai da wuri don a shirya kan lokaci.
Yoruba: Fetí sí àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ìjọba tó wà ládùúgbò. Ojú ọjọ́ lè yí padà kíákíá, ó sì dára láti tètè rí ìsọfúnni gbà ju kí o má tètè mọ̀.

Source: Don’t leave animals or children in parked cars. Temperatures inside can rise dangerously fast. A quick stop can turn deadly.
Igbo: A hapụla ụmụ anụmanụ maọbụ ụmụaka n'ụgbọala ndị a dọwara adọwa. Ọnọdụ okpomọkụ dị n'ime ụgbọala ahụ nwere ike ịrị ọsịsọ. Ịkwụsị ngwa ngwa nwere ike ibute ọnwụ.
Hausa: Kada ku bar dabbobi ko yara a cikin motocin da ke ajiye. Zafin cikin su na iya ƙaruwa cikin tsananin sauri. Tsayawa kaɗan na iya zama mai haɗari.
Yoruba: Má ṣe fi àwọn ẹranko tàbí àwọn ọmọ sílẹ̀ nínú ọkọ̀ tó dúró. Ooru tó wà nínú ọkọ̀ náà lè tètè pọ̀ gan-an. Ìdákẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ráńpẹ́ lè yọrí sí ikú.

Source: If you feel tired, confused, or stop sweating, get help immediately. These are signs of heat exhaustion. Rest, drink water, and cool down.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ike gwụrụ gị, obi erughị gị ala, maọbụ ọsụsọ akwụsị, chọọ enyemaka ozugbo. Ihe ndị a bụ ihe ịrịba ama nke ike ọgwụgwụ n'ihi okpomọkụ. Zuo ike, ṅụọ mmiri, ma nọdụ ebe ikuku dị.
Hausa: Idan kuna jin gajiya ko kun rikice ko kun daina zufa, nemi taimako nan da nan. Waɗannan alamun jin zafi mai tsanani ne. Huta, sha ruwa, kuma ku sarara.
Yoruba: Tó o bá rí i pé ó ti rẹ̀ ẹ́ tẹnutẹnu, tàbí tí ara rẹ ò dá gbọ̀ọ̀rọ̀-gbọọrọ mọ́, tètè wá ìrànlọ́wọ́. Àwọn àmì yìí fi hàn pé ooru ti mú kó rẹ̀ ẹ́. Máa sinmi, máa mu omi, kó o sì wá bó o ṣe máa tu ara rẹ lára.

Source: Keep windows open at night if it’s safe to do so. Let in fresh air and cool down your home naturally.
Igbo: Mee ka windo ghere oghe n'abalị ma ọ bụrụ na ọ nweghị ihe ọjọọ ọbụla ga-emenwu gị. Mee ka ikuku bata n'ụlọ gị ma mee ka ụlọ gị juo oyi.
Hausa: Ku bar tagogi a buɗe da daddare idan hakan ba matsala. Bar tsaftatacciyar iska ta shigo don sanyaya gidan.
Yoruba: Jẹ́ kí fèrèsé wà ní ṣíṣí ní òru bí kò bá léwu láti ṣe é. Jẹ́ kí afẹ́fẹ́ tútù wọlé, kí ilé rẹ sì tutù.

Source: Drink more water than usual today. Even if you’re not thirsty, staying hydrated helps your body handle the heat better.
Igbo: Taa, ṅụọ mmiri karịa ka ị na-aṅụbu. Ọ bụrụgodi na mmiri anaghị agụ gị, ịṅụ mmiri na-enye ahụ gị aka ịnagide okpomọkụ nke ọma.
Hausa: Sha ruwa yau fiye da yadda kuka saba. Ko ba kwa jin ƙishirwa, kasancewa da ruwa a jiki na taimaka wa jikinku ya daidaita zafi.
Yoruba: Mu omi púpọ̀ ju bó ṣe yẹ lọ lónìí. Kódà bí òùngbẹ ò bá tiẹ̀ gbẹ ẹ́, tó o bá ń mu omi dáadáa, ara rẹ á lè fara da ooru náà dáadáa.

Source: People with asthma and respiratory issues should stay indoors as much as possible. Heat and dust can trigger breathing problems.
Igbo: Ndị nwere ụkwara ume ọkụ na nsogbu iku ume kwesịrị ịnọ n'ime ụlọ oge ọbụla o kwere mee. Okpomọkụ na uzuzu nwere ike ibute nsogbu iku ume.
Hausa: Ya kamata masu cutar asma da matsalolin numfashi suna yawan zama a gida sosai. Zafi da ƙura na iya tayar da matsalolin numfashi.
Yoruba: Àwọn ènìyàn tí ó ní àrùn ikọ́ fée àti àwọn ìṣòro òdòdó èémí ní láti dúró nínú ilé bí ó bá ti lè ṣeé ṣe. Ooru àti eruku lè fa ìṣòro mímí.

Source: Water levels in rivers and wells are dropping. Communities should plan ahead and store clean drinking water.
Igbo: Ogo mmiri dị n'osimiri na omi na-ebelata. Ndị obodo kwesịrị ịtụpụta arọ ma chekwaa mmiri ọṅụṅụ dị ọcha.
Hausa: Matakin ruwa a koguna da rijiyoyi na yin ƙasa. Ya kamata jama’a su shirya da wuri kuma su ajiye ruwan sha mai tsafta.
Yoruba: Omi tó wà nínú àwọn odò àtàwọn kànga ti ń dín kù. Ó yẹ káwọn aráàlú máa wéwèé ohun tí wọ́n máa ṣe, kí wọ́n sì máa tọ́jú omi tó mọ́ tónítóní.

Source: Drought conditions can lead to food shortages. Support local farmers, and avoid unnecessary food waste.
Igbo: Oké ọkọchị nwere ike ibute ụkọ nri. Kwado ndị ọrụ ugbo nọ n'ime obodo, ma zere imefusị ihe oriri n'ụzọ na-enweghị isi.
Hausa: Fari na iya jawo ƙarancin abinci. A tallafa wa manoma na cikin gida, kuma a guji ɓarnatar da abinci ba dalili.
Yoruba: Ọ̀dá lè fa àìtó oúnjẹ. Ẹ máa ṣètìlẹ́yìn fún àwọn àgbẹ̀ tó wà ládùúgbò yín, ẹ má sì máa fi oúnjẹ ṣòfò.

Source: If you rely on a borehole, check its depth regularly. Overuse can dry it up faster in extreme heat.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ị chekwubere mmiri a gbapuru agbapu, lelee umi ya mgbe ọbụla. Oke iji ya eme ihe na-eme ya ọ taa ọsịsọ n'oké okpomọkụ.
Hausa: Idan kun dogara da rijiyar burtsatse, kuna duba zurfinta akai-akai. Amfani da ita da yawa na iya busar da ita da sauri cikin zafi mai tsanani.
Yoruba: Tó bá jẹ́ pé bọ́ọ́hoò lo gbẹ́kẹ̀ lé, máa ṣàyẹ̀wò bó ṣe jìn déédéé. Tí wọ́n bá ń lò ó ju bó ṣe yẹ lọ, ó lè tètè gbẹ nínú ooru.

Source: Livestock can suffer in extreme heat too. Ensure they have enough water and shade during the day.
Igbo: Anụ ụlọ nwekwara ike ịta ahụhụ n'oke okpomọkụ. Gbaa mbọ hụ na ha nwere mmiri na ndo n'ehihie.
Hausa: Dabbobin gida na iya shan wahala cikin zafi mai tsanani. Ku tabbatar suna da ruwa da inuwa isassu a cikin yini.
Yoruba: Ìgbésí ayé àwọn ẹran ọ̀sìn náà lè nira nínú ooru tó ń mú gan-an. Rí i dájú pé wọ́n ń mu omi tó pọ̀ tó àti pé wọ́n wà ní ibòji lọ́sàn-án.

Source: The electricity demand will be high. If you have a backup power plan, make sure it’s ready.
Igbo: Ndị ga-eji ọkụ eletrik mee ihe ga-ehi nne. Ọ bụrụ na ị nwere arọ ọzọ, hụ na ị kwadoro ya.
Hausa: Buƙatar wutar lantarki za ta ƙaru. Idan kuna da madadin wutar lantarki, ku tabbatar da cewa yana shirye.
Yoruba: Àìmọye èèyàn ló máa nílò iná mànàmáná. Ti o ba ni eto agbara afẹyinti, rii daju pe o ṣetan.

Source: Harmattan dust is in the air. If you have asthma or breathing issues, wear a mask and keep windows closed when possible.
Igbo: Uzuzu ụgụrụ dị n'ikuku. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-arịa ụkwara ume ọkụ maọbụ nsogbu iku ume , na-eyi ihe mkpuchi ihu ma na-emechi windo mgbe o kwere mee .
Hausa: Ƙurar lokacin sanyi a cikin iska ta ke. Idan kuna da cutar asma ko matsalar numfashi, ku sa takunkumin fusku kuma ku rufe tagogi idan zai yiwu.
Yoruba: Erùpẹ̀ Ọyẹ́ wà nínú afẹ́fẹ́. Bí o bá ní àrùn ikọ́ fée tàbí ìṣòro síséèémí, lo ìbòjú àti kí o pa wíńdò tí ó bá ṣeé ṣe.

Source: The dry season is here, moisturize your skin and lips to prevent cracking. Stay hydrated too!
Igbo: Oge ọkọchị abịala, tee ude n'ahụ gị na egbugbere ọnụ gị iji gbochie mgbawa. Na-aṅụkwa mmiri nke ọma!
Hausa: Lokacin bazara ya zo. Ku shafa mai a fatar jikinku da leɓenku don hana tsagewar fata da leɓe. Ku kasance da ruwa a jiki.
Yoruba: Àkókò ọ̀dá ti dé, máa fi omi sí awọ ara rẹ àti ètè rẹ kó o má bàa ní àlàfo. Máa mu omi dáadáa!

Source: Harmattan dust can damage electronics. Cover your devices when not in use to prevent dust buildup.
Igbo: Uzuzu ụgụrụị nwere ike imebi ngwá eletrọnik. Kpuchie ngwá ọrụ gị mgbe ị jighị ha eme ihe iji gbochie uzuzu.
Hausa: Ƙurar lokacin sanyi na iya lalata kayan lantarki. Ku rufe na'urorinku lokacin da ba kwa amfani da su ba don hana taruwar ƙura.
Yoruba: Erùpẹ̀ ọyẹ́ lè ba ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé jẹ́. Fi nǹkan bo àwọn ohun èlò rẹ nígbà tí o kò bá lò wọ́n kí eruku má bàa kóra jọ.

Source: Poor visibility on roads due to harmattan haze. If you’re driving, use headlights and reduce speed.
Igbo: Ahụghị ụzọ nke ọma n'okporo ụzọ n'ihi ụgụrụ. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-anya ụgbọala, jiri ọkụ ụgbọala ma belata ọsọ.
Hausa: Akwai rashin kallon hanya da kyau saboda ƙurar lokacin sanyi. Idan kuna tuƙi, ku kunna fitilun gaban mota ku kuma rage gudu.
Yoruba: Ìwòye tí kò dára lórí àwọn òpópónà nítorí ìkùukùu harmattan. Tó o bá ń wakọ̀, lo fìtílà iwájú kó o sì dín eré kù.

Source: Air pollution levels are high today. If you work outdoors, take breaks in fresh air whenever possible.
Igbo: Ogo ikuku meruru emeru kaa nkụ taa. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-arụ ọrụ n'èzí, zuo ike n'ebe e nwere ikuku dị ọcha mgbe ọbụla o kwere mee.
Hausa: Gurɓatar iska yana da yawa yau. Idan kuna aiki a waje, kuna hutawa a wuraren da ke da iska mai kyau idan zai yiwu.
Yoruba: Ọ̀pọ̀ nǹkan ló ń ba afẹ́fẹ́ jẹ́ lóde òní. Tó o bá ń ṣiṣẹ́ níta, máa gba atẹ́gùn tó mọ́ ní gbogbo ìgbà tó bá ṣeé ṣe.

Source: Burning waste can worsen air pollution. Dispose of trash responsibly and avoid open fires.
Igbo: Ịgba ahịhịa ọkụ nwere ike ịbawanye mmetọ ikuku. Kpofuo ahịhịa n'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị ma zere ọkụ na-agba n'ama.
Hausa: Ƙona shara na iya ƙara gurɓatar iska. Zubar da shara yadda ya kamata kuma ku guji kona ta a fili.
Yoruba: Ó ṣeé ṣe kí sísun pàǹtírí túbọ̀ ba afẹ́fẹ́ jẹ́. Má ṣe máa da pàǹtírí, má sì ṣe dáná.

Source: Harmattan can dry out stored food quickly. Keep food items in airtight containers to prevent spoilage.
Igbo: Ụgụrụ nwere ike ịkpọnwụ nri e chekwara echekwa ọsịsọ. Tinye nri n'ebe ikuku agaghị aba ya ka ọ ghara imebi.
Hausa: Lokacin sanyi na busar da abinci da aka ajiye da sauri. Ajiye kayan abinci a cikin rufaffun ma’adanai don hana lalacewa.
Yoruba: Ọyẹ́ lè tètè gbẹ àwọn oúnjẹ tó bá wà nípamọ́. Má ṣe jẹ́ kí oúnjẹ bà jẹ́ bó o bá gbé e sínú ohun tí kò ní jẹ́ kí atẹ́gùn wọ̀ ọ́.

Source: Breathing dry, dusty air can cause throat irritation. Drink warm water with honey to soothe it.
Igbo: Ikuru ikuku kpọrọ nkụ nwere uzuzu na-ebute nsogbu n'akpịrị. Na-aṅụ mmiri ọkụ na mmanụ aṅụ iji belata ya.
Hausa: Shaƙar busasshiyar iska mai ƙura na iya jawo ƙaiƙayin maƙogwaro. Sha ruwan ɗumi da zuma don daidaita maƙogwaronku.
Yoruba: Èémí gbígbóná, tó ní eruku nínú lè mú kí ọ̀fun máa wú. Omi gbígbóná pẹ̀lú oyin ni kó o mu kí ara rẹ yá.

Source: Use a wet cloth to clean surfaces daily. Dust from harmattan settles quickly inside homes.
Igbo: Jiri ákwà dị mmiri mmiri na-ehicha elu ihe kwa ụbọchị. Uzuzu nke ụgụrụ na-aba n'ụlọ ọsịsọ.
Hausa: Yi amfani da zane mai laushi da ruwa wajen goge ƙasa kullum. Ƙurar lokacin sanyi na taruwa cikin sauri a gida.
Yoruba: Máa fi aṣọ tutù nu àwọn nǹkan tó o bá ń lò lójoojúmọ́. Erùpẹ̀ ọyẹ́ máa ń tètè kó sínú ilé.

Source: Check in on older people during harmattan. They are more vulnerable to respiratory problems.
Igbo: Leruo ndị agadi anya n'oge ụgụrụ. Ha na-aka enwe nsogbu n'iku ume.
Hausa: Kuna duba tsofaffi a lokacin sanyi. Sun fi yiwuwar haɗuwa da cututtukan numfashi.
Yoruba: Wá àwọn àgbàlagbà wò nígbà tí ọyẹ́ bá ń lọ lọ́wọ́. Àwọn ló máa ń tètè níṣòro ọ̀nà tí wọ́n fi ń mí.

Source: Strong winds are expected today. Secure roofs, doors, and windows before the storm starts.
Igbo: A tụrụ anya na oke ifufe ga-ekusi ike taa. Mechie gbamgbam,ọnụ ụzọ, na windo tupu ebili mmiri amalite.
Hausa: Ana sa ran iska mai ƙarfi yau. Ku gyara rufin ɗaki, kuma ku kulle ƙofofi da tagogi kafin guguwa ta fara.
Yoruba: A retí pé kí afẹ́fẹ́ líle máa jà lónìí. Ṣọ́ àwọn òrùlé, ilẹ̀kùn, àti fèrèsé kó tó di pé ìjì náà bẹ̀rẹ̀.

Source: Flying debris can be dangerous. Keep lightweight objects like buckets and plastic chairs indoors.
Igbo: Iberibe ihe na-efe efe adịghị mma. Debe ihe ndị dị mfe dịka bọket na oche plastik n'ime ụlọ.
Hausa: Tarkace masu shawagi na iya zama haɗari. Ku saka ƙananan kayan amfani kamar guga da kujerun roba a cikin ɗaki.
Yoruba: Ó léwu gan-an téèyàn bá ń rí àwọn ìdọ̀tí tó ń fò lójú òfuurufú. Má ṣe kó àwọn nǹkan tó rọrùn láti lò mọ́lé, irú bí àwọn korobá àti àga oníke.

Source: If you see tree branches shaking violently, move away. Falling branches can cause serious injuries.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ị hụ alaka osisi ka ha na-ama jijiji, si ebe ahụ pụọ. Alaka osisi ndị na-ada nwere ike imerụ mmadụ ahụ́ nke ukwuu.
Hausa: Idan kuka ga rassan itatuwa suna girgiza da ƙarfi, ku nesance su. Rassan da ke faɗowa na iya jawo mummunan rauni.
Yoruba: Tó o bá rí i pé àwọn ẹ̀ka igi ń mì tìtì, tètè kúrò níbẹ̀. Àwọn ẹ̀ka igi tó bá já bọ́ lè ṣe èèyàn léṣe gan-an.

Source: Lightning strikes are more common during storms. Avoid standing under tall trees or using metal objects outside.
Igbo: A na-enwekarị oke amụma mmiri n'oge ebili mmiri. Zere ịkwụ n'okpuru osisi toro ogologo maọbụ iji ihe ígwè ihe n'èzí.
Hausa: Hasken walƙiya yakan fi yawa yayin hadari. Guji tsayawa ƙarƙashin manyan itatuwa ko amfani da ƙarfe a waje.
Yoruba: Ìjì sábà máa ń jà nígbà tí mànàmáná bá ń sán. Má ṣe dúró sábẹ́ àwọn igi gíga tàbí kó o máa lo àwọn ohun èlò onírin níta.

Source: Power outages may happen after strong winds. Have a flashlight and backup power ready.
Igbo: E nwere ike iwe ọkụ ma oke ifufe kuo. Kwado ọkụ mpanaka na ọkụ ọzọ.
Hausa: Ana iya samun katsewar wutar lantarki bayan iska mai ƙarfi. Ku tanadi fitilar hannu da wata hanyar samun wuta.
Yoruba: Ìdínà iná mànàmáná lè wáyé lẹ́yìn afẹ́fẹ́ líle. Mú fìtílà àti agbára ààbò wà ní sẹ́nu.

Source: Storms can damage weak buildings. If your home has cracks or an unstable roof, consider reinforcing it before bad weather arrives.
Igbo: Ebili mmiri nwere ike imebi ụlọ na-esighị ike. Ọ bụrụ na mgbidi ụlọ gị nwere ebe gbawara agbawa maọbụ na gbamgbam gị anọsighị ike, rụọ ya tupu ọnọdụ ihu igwe ọjọọ amalite.
Hausa: Guguwa na iya lalata gine-gine marasa ƙarfi. Idan gidanku ba shi da ƙarfi, a gyara kafin yanayi ya lalace.
Yoruba: Ìjì lè ba àwọn ilé tí kò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ lágbára jẹ́. Tó bá jẹ́ pé òrùlé ilé rẹ ti fọ́ tàbí tí òrùlé náà kò dúró dáadáa, o lè wá nǹkan ṣe sí i kó tó di pé ojú ọjọ́ bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí í le.

Source: Expect disruptions in mobile networks during storms. Charge your phone ahead of time and keep emergency contacts saved.
Igbo: Tụọ anya na netwọk mkpanaka n'oge ebili mmiri ga-aghasasị. Tinye ekwentị gị n'ọkụ n'oge ma debe kọntaktị i nwere ike ịkpọ ma e nwee ihe mberede.
Hausa: Ku sa ran samun cikas a wayoyin hanyoyin sadarwa yayin guguwa. Yi cajin wayarku da wuri kuma ku tanadi lambobin gaggawa.
Yoruba: O yẹ ki o reti awọn idilọwọ ninu awọn nẹtiwọọki alagbeka lakoko awọn iji. Máa fi fóònù rẹ ṣírò bí nǹkan ṣe ń lọ, kó o sì máa tọ́jú àwọn fóònù tí wọ́n bá fi ránṣẹ́ sí ẹ nígbà pàjáwìrì.

Source: Heavy winds can cause boats to capsize. Fishermen should avoid deep waters until conditions are safe.
Igbo: Oké ifufe nwere ike ime ka ụgbọ mmiri kpuo. Ndị ọkụ azụ̀ kwesịrị izere mmiri miri emi ruo mgbe ọnọdụ dị mma.
Hausa: Iska mai ƙarfi na iya kifar da ƙananan jiragen ruwa. Masunta su guji shiga ruwa mai zurfi har sai yanayi ya daidaita.
Yoruba: Ẹ̀fúùfù líle lè mú kí ọkọ̀ ojú omi rì. Àwọn apẹja gbọ́dọ̀ yẹra fún lílọ síbi omi jíjìn títí dìgbà tí ọ̀ràn náà á fi dáwọ́ dúró.

Source: If a storm is approaching, don’t wait till it’s close to seek shelter. Move to a safe place as soon as possible.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ebili mmiri na-achọ ịmalite, e chela ka ọ malite tupu ị chọwa ndo. Gaa n'ebe ndo dị ozugbo.
Hausa: Idan guguwa na zuwa, kada ku jira sai ta kusanto kafin neman mafaka. Ku koma inda ya fi aminci da wuri.
Yoruba: Tí ìjì bá ń rọ̀, má ṣe dúró dìgbà tó máa rọ̀ kó o tó wá ibi tó o máa sá sí. Ẹ tètè lọ síbi tí kò léwu.

Source: Many people get nosebleeds during harmattan. If this happens, lean forward slightly and pinch your nostrils for a few minutes.
Igbo: Ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-enwe ezi imi n'oge ụgụrụ. Ọ bụrụ na nke a mee, butuo ihu obere ma tụọ imi gị mbọ ruo nkeji olenaole.
Hausa: Yawancin mutane na yin haɓo lokacin sanyi. Idan hakan ya faru, ku sunkuyar da kai ku matse hancin na 'yan mintuna.
Yoruba: Ọ̀pọ̀ èèyàn ló máa ń ní ẹ̀jẹ̀ imú nígbà harmattan. Tó bá ṣẹlẹ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀, tẹjú mọ́ ọn díẹ̀, kó o sì fi ọwọ́ tẹ ihò imú rẹ fún ìṣẹ́jú díẹ̀.

Source: Strong winds can lift weak roofs. Check your home for loose sheets or unstable structures.
Igbo: Ifufe siri ike nwere ike iwepụ gbamgbam na-esighị ike. Leruo ụlọ gị anya ka ị hụ ma è nwere gbamgbam ndị na-esighị ike maọbụ ihe ndị na-emebi emebi.
Hausa: Iska mai ƙarfi na iya ɗaga rufin da ba shi da ƙarfi. Duba gidanku don gano fallen kwanon da bai ɗauru sosai ba ko ginin da ke da matsala.
Yoruba: Ẹ̀fúùfù líle lè gbé àwọn òrùlé tí kò lágbára sókè. Ṣàyẹ̀wò ilé rẹ kó o lè rí i bóyá àwọn aṣọ ìnura tàbí àwọn nǹkan tí kò dúró sójú kan wà níbẹ̀.

Source: Trees near power lines may fall during storms. If you notice any leaning trees, report them before they become a hazard.
Igbo: Osisi ndị dịdebere eriri ọkụ eletrik nwere ike ịda n'oge ebili mmiri. Ọ bụrụ na ị hụ osisi ọbụla na-achọ ịda, kọọrọ mmadụ tupu ha aghọọ ihe ize ndụ.
Hausa: Itatuwan da ke kusa da wayoyi wuta na iya faɗowa yayin guguwa. Idan kuka ga bishiya tana lanƙwashe, sanar kafin abin ya zama matsala.
Yoruba: Àwọn igi tó wà nítòsí ìmọ́lẹ̀ lè wó nígbà tí ìjì bá ń jà. Tó o bá rí i pé igi kan ti ń wọ́ tì sẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ kan, kíá lọ sọ fún wọn kí wọ́n tó di ewu.

Source: Soil erosion is damaging farmlands. If you farm on a slope, use sandbags or plant cover crops to protect the soil.
Igbo: Ozize na-emebi ugbo. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-akọ ugbo n'elu ugwu, jiri akpa ájá maọbụ kụọ ihe ọkụkụ ga-emechi ajaala.
Hausa: Zaizayar ƙasa na lalata gonaki. Idan kuna noma akan gangara, ku saka buhunan yashi ko ku shuka ciyawa mai lulluɓewa don kare ƙasa.
Yoruba: Ọ̀nà tí ilẹ̀ ń gbà jẹrà ń ba àwọn ilẹ̀ oko jẹ́. Tó bá jẹ́ pé orí òkè ni o ti ń ṣiṣẹ́, lo àpò iyẹ̀pẹ̀ tàbí kó o gbin àwọn ohun ọ̀gbìn tí wọ́n fi ń bo ilẹ̀ mọ́lẹ̀ láti dáàbò bo ilẹ̀ náà.

Source: Landslides are possible in hilly areas after heavy rain. If you notice cracks in the soil, move to a safer location.
Igbo: Nnukwu mmiri ozuzo zosịa, a na-ahụkarị ka ikuku na-ebugasị ihe . Ọ bụrụ na ị chọpụta mgbawa n'ajaala, gaa ebe ka mma.
Hausa: Zabtarewar ƙasa na iya faruwa a yankunan tsaunuka bayan ruwan sama mai yawa. Idan kuka ga ƙasa ta tsage, koma inda ya fi aminci.
Yoruba: Ìmìtìtì ilẹ̀ lè ṣẹlẹ̀ láwọn àgbègbè olókè lẹ́yìn òjò líle. Tó o bá kíyè sí i pé ilẹ̀ ti fọ́, lọ síbi tí kò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ léwu.

Source: Farming too close to riverbanks increases erosion. Protect your land by planting trees along the edges.
Igbo: Ịrụ ọrụ ugbo n'ebe debere ikpere osimiri na-ebute ozize. Chebe ala gị site n'ịkụ osisi n'akụkụ ya.
Hausa: Yin noma kusa da gaɓar kogi yana ƙara zaizayar ƙasa. Shuka itatuwa a iyakokinta don kare gonar.
Yoruba: Tí wọ́n bá ń dáko nítòsí odò, ó máa ń jẹ́ kí ilẹ̀ túbọ̀ ba ilẹ̀ jẹ́. Máa gbin àwọn igi sí etí ilẹ̀ rẹ kó o lè dáàbò bo ilẹ̀ rẹ.

Source: Heavy winds can blow down billboards. Avoid standing near large signs during storms.
Igbo: Oké ifufe pụrụ ịkwatu bọọdụ mkpọsa ngwá ahịa. Zere iguzo n'akụkụ akwụkwọ ozi n'oge ebili mmiri.
Hausa: Iska mai ƙarfi na iya kayar da allunan talla. Guji tsayawa kusa da manyan alluna yayin guguwa.
Yoruba: Ẹ̀fúùfù líle lè wó àwọn pátákó ìpolówó ọjà lulẹ̀. Má ṣe dúró nítòsí àwọn àmì ńlá nígbà tí ìjì ń jà.

Source: Severe storms may cut off electricity. If you use solar power, charge your batteries ahead of time.
Igbo: Oké ebili mmiri nwere ike ime ka e were ọkụ. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-eji ọkụ anwụ, tinye ya n'ọkụ n'oge.
Hausa: Guguwa mai tsanani na iya katse wutar lantarki. Idan kuna amfani da wutar hasken rana, yi caji da wuri.
Yoruba: Ìjì líle lè dá iná mànàmáná dúró. Tó o bá ń lo agbára oòrùn, máa fi batiri kún un ṣáájú àkókò.

Source: Road collapses are common in erosion-prone areas. Check for cracks or sinking ground on familiar routes.
Igbo: Mmebi okporo ụzọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'ebe nwere ozize. Lelee ma è nwere ebe gbawara agbawa maọbụ ala na-emi emi n'okporo ụzọ ndị ị maara nke ọma.
Hausa: Hanyoyi na yawan rushewa a wuraren da ke da yiwuwar zaizayar ƙasa. Duba ƙasa don tsagewa ko rushewa a hanyoyin da ka sani.
Yoruba: Ọ̀pọ̀ ìgbà ló máa ń ṣẹlẹ̀ pé kí ojú ọ̀nà wó lulẹ̀ láwọn àgbègbè tí ilẹ̀ ti máa ń bà jẹ́. Wá àwọn ibi tó ti ń ya pàǹtírí tàbí ibi tó ti ń wọ́ tìrítìrí lójú ọ̀nà tó o ti máa ń rìn.

Source: If heavy rain is washing away your farmland, plant vetiver grass. It helps prevent soil loss.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na oké mmiri ozuzo na-ekpochapụ ala ubi gị, kụọ ahịhịa vetiva. Ọ na-enye aka igbochi nsachapụ ajaala.
Hausa: Idan ruwan sama na ɗebe gonarka, shuka ciyawar gyaran ƙasa. Tana taimakawa wurin hana ɓacewar ƙasa.
Yoruba: Bí òjò bá ń rọ̀ gan-an tó sì ń gbá ilẹ̀ oko rẹ lọ, gbin koríko vetiver. Ó máa ń dènà pé kí ilẹ̀ má ṣòfò.

Source: Coastal erosion is affecting fishing villages. If you live near the sea, follow updates on shoreline protection projects.
Igbo: Ozize na-emetụta obodo nta ndị na-akụ azụ̀. Ọ bụrụ na ị bi n'akụkụ oké osimiri, na-eso ozi banyere ihe ndị a na-eme iji chebe ụsọ oké osimiri.
Hausa: Zaizayar ƙasa na bakin teku na shafar ƙauyukan masunta. Idan kuna kusa da teku, bi bayanan kariyar bakin gaɓar ruwa.
Yoruba: Ìgbẹ́ òkun ń ba àwọn abúlé àwọn apẹja jẹ́. Tó o bá ń gbé nítòsí òkun, máa kíyè sí àwọn ìsọfúnni tó ń jáde lórí àwọn ohun tó ń dáàbò bo etíkun.

Source: Cattle herders may be moving south due to drought. Farmers, be aware of potential conflicts over grazing land.
Igbo: O nwere ike ịbụ na ndị na-azụ ehi na-akwaga n'ebe ndịda n'ihi ụkọ mmiri ozuzo. Ndị ọrụ ugbo, kpacharanụ anya maka esemokwu ndị nwere ike ibilite n'ihi ebe ịta nri.
Hausa: Makiyaya na iya ƙaura zuwa kudu saboda fari. Manoma, ku kula da yiwuwar rikici a kan kiwo.
Yoruba: Ó ṣeé ṣe kí àwọn darandaran máa ṣí lọ sí ìhà gúúsù nítorí ọ̀dá. Ẹ̀yin àgbẹ̀, ẹ máa ṣọ́ra fún ìjà tó lè wáyé lórí ilẹ̀ ìjẹko.

Source: With food prices rising, now is a good time to buy and store grains before they become too expensive.
Igbo: Ebe ọ bụ na ọnụ ahịa ihe oriri na-arị elu, ugbua bụ oge dị mma iji zụta ma chekwaa ọka tupu ha adị oké ọnụ.
Hausa: Tare da hauhawar farashin abinci, yanzu lokaci ne mai kyau na saya da ajiye hatsi kafin yayi tsada sosai.
Yoruba: Níwọ̀n bí iye tí wọ́n ń ta oúnjẹ ti ń lọ sókè, àkókò tó dára jù lọ láti ra àwọn ọkà kó o sì tọ́jú wọn pa mọ́ ni báyìí kí wọ́n tó di èyí tó wọ́n gan-an.

Source: Erratic rainfall is affecting crop growth. Farmers should consider drought-resistant seeds this season.
Igbo: Mmiri na-ezo n'ụzọ na-adịghị mma na-emetụta uto ihe ọkụkụ. Ndị ọrụ ugbo kwesịrị ịtụle mkpụrụ na-eguzogide ọkọchị n'oge a.
Hausa: Ruwan sama marar tsari yana shafar girman amfanin gona. Manoma su fara tunanin amfani da iri mai jure fari.
Yoruba: Òjò tó ń rọ̀ lọ́nà tí kò déédéé ń ṣàkóbá fún ìdàgbàsókè irè oko. Ó yẹ kí àwọn àgbẹ̀ ronú nípa àwọn irúgbìn tí kò lè gbẹ lásìkò yìí.

Source: Rainfall is increasing, and many roads will soon flood. If your street floods easily, make early arrangements to leave or secure your home.
Igbo: Mmiri ozuzo na-amụba, n'oge na-adịghịkwa anya, mmiri ga-eju n'ọtụtụ okporo ụzọ. Ọ bụrụ na mmiri na-eju n'okporo ámá gị n'ụzọ dị mfe, mee ndokwa n'oge iji pụọ maọbụ chebe ebe obibi gị.
Hausa: Ruwan sama yana ƙaruwa, kuma hanyoyi da yawa za su fara ambaliya. Idan layinku na yin ambaliya, shirya da wuri ku bar gidanku ko ku gyara shi.
Yoruba: Òjò ti ń rọ̀ gan-an báyìí, kò sì ní pẹ́ tí ọ̀pọ̀ ọ̀nà á fi kún fún omi. Bó bá jẹ́ pé ọ̀nà tó o gbà ń gbé máa ń kún fún omi, tètè ṣètò bó o ṣe máa kúrò níbẹ̀ tàbí bó o ṣe máa dáàbò bo ilé rẹ.

Source: Keke and motorcycles may struggle in flooded areas. If you must go out, choose safer routes and avoid deep water.
Igbo: Ọ ga-ahịa keke na ọgba tum tum ahụ ịgafee n'ebe ide mmiri juru. Ọ bụrụ na ị ga-apụ apụ, họrọ ụzọ ndị dị nchebe karị ma zere mmiri miri emi.
Hausa: Keke-napep da babura na iya shan wahala a wuraren da ruwa ya mamaye. Idan dole ne sai kun fita, ku bi hanya mafi aminci kuma ku guji ruwa mai zurfi.
Yoruba: Keke àti alùpùpù lè jàra ní àwọn àgbègbè tí omi kún. Tó bá pọn dandan pé kó o jáde, yan ọ̀nà tí kò léwu kó o sì yẹra fún omi jíjìn.

Source: Heavy rain is coming, and drainage is blocked. If you can, clear the gutters before the flood starts. It might just save your street.
Igbo: Oké mmiri ozuzo na-abịa, a na-egbochikwa mmiri na-asọpụ mmiri. Ọ bụrụ na ị pụrụ, kpochapụ ọwa mmiri tupu ide mmiri amalite. Ọ pụrụ nanị ịzọpụta okporo ámá gị.
Hausa: Ruwan sama mai ƙarfi yana zuwa, magudanar ruwa ta toshe. Idan zaku iya, share magudanan ruwa kafin ambaliya ta fara. Wannan na iya ceton layinku.
Yoruba: Òjò ńlá ń rọ̀, omi ò sì lè ṣàn dáadáa. Bó o bá lè ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀, kọ́kọ́ fọ àwọn ìkùdu náà kí òjò tó bẹ̀rẹ̀. Ó lè gba òpópónà yín là.

Source: Flooding increases the risk of cholera outbreaks. Boil all drinking water and avoid consuming food exposed to floodwaters.
Igbo: ide mmiri na-eme ka ihe ize ndụ nke ntiwapụ nke ọrịa ọgbụgbọ na-amụba. Na-esi mmiri ọbụla ị na-aṅụ esi, na-esikwa nri ọbụla mmiri ahụ metụrụ esi.
Hausa: Ambaliya na ƙara yiwuwar ɓarkewar cutar kolera. Tafasa duk ruwan sha, kuma ku guji abinci da ruwan da ambaliya ya taɓa.
Yoruba: Ìkún omi máa ń jẹ́ kí àrùn kọlẹ́rà tètè tàn kálẹ̀. Máa se omi tó o máa mu, má sì jẹ oúnjẹ tó bá ti wà nínú omi náà.

Source: Many roads are now impassable due to rising water levels. Avoid unnecessary travel and wait for official updates.
Igbo: Ọtụtụ okporo ụzọ bụzi ndị a na-apụghị ịgafe agafe n'ihi ịrị elu mmiri. Zere njem na-adịghị mkpa ma chere maka mmelite gọọmentị.
Hausa: Yawancin hanyoyi yanzu ba a iya wucewa ta kansu saboda ruwa. Ku guji fitar da ba dole ba, ku jira bayanan hukuma.
Yoruba: Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ojú ọ̀nà ni kò ṣeé rìn nítorí omi tó ń lọ sókè. Yẹra fún ìrìn àjò tí kò pọn dandan, kí o sì dúró de àtúnṣe tí ìjọba ṣe.

Source: If you live in an area prone to flooding, don’t wait until water enters your house to move valuables. Start now.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na i bi n'ebe ide mmiri na-emekarị, echela ka mmiri bata n'ụlọ gị tupu i bupụ ihe ndị dị oké ọnụ ahịa i nwere. Malite ugbua.
Hausa: Idan kuna zaune a wuri mai yawan ambaliya, kada ku jira ruwa ya shigo kafin fitar da kaya masu muhimmanci. Ku fara yanzu.
Yoruba: Tó o bá ń gbé ní àgbègbè tí omíyalé sábà máa ń ṣẹlẹ̀, má ṣe dúró dìgbà tí omi á wọlé kó o tó gbé àwọn nǹkan tó ṣeyebíye kúrò níbẹ̀. Bẹ̀rẹ̀ báyìí.

Source: Flooded areas often attract reptiles and other dangerous animals. Watch where you step, especially at night.
Igbo: Ebe ndị ide mmiri na-ejupụta na-adọta anụ ndị na-akpụ akpụ na anụ ndị ọzọ dị ize ndụ. Kpachara anya n'ebe ị na-azọ ụkwụ, karịsịa n'abalị.
Hausa: Wuraren da ruwa ya mamaye na yawan jawo dabbobi masu jan ciki da dabbobi masu haɗari. Ku kula da inda kuke takawa, musamman da daddare.
Yoruba: Àwọn ẹranko tó ń rìn gbéregbère àtàwọn ẹranko eléwu mìíràn sábà máa ń wá síbi tí omi ti ya bo. Ṣọ́nà bó o ṣe ń rìn, àgàgà lálẹ́.

Source: Water-logged houses can collapse. If your walls start showing cracks after flooding, seek professional advice before returning home.
Igbo: Ụlọ ndị jupụtara na mmiri pụrụ ịdakpọ. Ọ bụrụ na mgbidi ụlọ gị amalite ịgbaji mgbe ide mmiri gasịrị, chọọ ndụmọdụ nke ọkachamara tupu ị laa.
Hausa: Gidajen da ruwa ya zauna acikinsu na iya rushewa. Idan bangonku ya fara tsagewa bayan ambaliya, nemi shawarar ƙwararru kafin komawa gidan.
Yoruba: Àwọn ilé tó kún fún omi lè wó lulẹ̀. Tó bá ṣẹlẹ̀ pé àwọn ògiri ilé rẹ bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí í fọ́ lẹ́yìn tí òjò bá ti rọ̀, wá ìmọ̀ràn lọ sọ́dọ̀ dókítà kó o tó padà sílé.

Source: Many bridges and footpaths are becoming unsafe. Walk carefully, especially at night or in unfamiliar areas.
Igbo: Ọtụtụ àkwà mmiri na ụzọ ụkwụ na-aghọ ndị na-adịghị nchebe. Kpachara anya n'otú i si aga ije, ọkachasị n'abalị maọbụ mgbe ị na-aga n'ebe ị na-amaghị.
Hausa: Gadoji da hanyoyin tafiyar ƙafa na ƙara zama masu haɗari. Ku yi tafiya cikin kula, musamman da daddare ko a sabbin wurare.
Yoruba: Ọ̀pọ̀ afárá àtàwọn òpópónà táwọn èèyàn ń gbà ti di èyí tí kò lẹ́sẹ̀ nílẹ̀ mọ́. Máa ṣọ́ra bó o ṣe ń rìn, pàápàá tó bá jẹ́ lálẹ́ tàbí tó o bá ń rìn láwọn àgbègbè tí o kò mọ̀ rí.

Source: Floodwaters take time to recede. Be patient and avoid entering affected areas too soon, it may not be safe yet.
Igbo: Ọ na-ewe oge tupu ide mmiri ahụ atalata. Nwee ndidi ma zere ịbanye n'ebe ndị ọrịa ahụ metụtara ọsịsọ, ọ nwere ike ọ gaghị adị mma.
Hausa: Ruwan ambaliya na ɗaukar lokaci kafin ya janye. Ku yi haƙuri, ku guji shiga inda ambaliya ta shafa da wuri, ba lalle ya zama mai aminci da wuri ba.
Yoruba: Ó máa ń gba àkókò kí omi àkúnya omi náà tó fà. Ẹ ní sùúrù, ẹ má sì tètè wọ àwọn àgbègbè tí àrùn náà ti kọ lu, ó lè máà sí ààbò.

Source: Temperatures are soaring today. Avoid prolonged exposure to the sun and drink water regularly.
Igbo: Ọnọdụ okpomọkụ na-arị elu taa. Zere ịnọ n'anwụ ruo ogologo oge, na-aṅụkwa mmiri mgbe niile.
Hausa: Zafin rana yana da yawa sosai yau. Ku guji fita rana sosai, kuma kuna shan ruwa akai-akai.
Yoruba: Ooru ti pọ̀ gan-an lónìí. Yẹra fún wíwà lábẹ́ oòrùn fún àkókò gígùn, kó o sì máa mu omi déédéé.

Source: Water shortages are worsening. If you rely on public taps or boreholes, store water when available.
Igbo: Ụkọ mmiri na-akawanye njọ. Ọ bụrụ na ọ bụ pọmpụ maọbụ mmiri a gbapuru agbapu ka i chekwubere, chekwaa mmiri ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị.
Hausa: Rashin ruwa na ƙaruwa. Idan kun dogara da rijiyoyin burtsatse ko famfuna na gwamnati, ku tanadi ruwa idan akwai.
Yoruba: Àìtó omi túbọ̀ ń pọ̀ sí i. Tó bá jẹ́ pé ẹ̀rọ abẹ́lẹ̀ tàbí bọ́ọ́hoò tó wà fún gbogbo èèyàn lo máa ń lò, máa tọ́jú omi tó o bá rí.

Source: Heat can make children sick faster. Keep babies and young kids hydrated, and avoid letting them play outside in the hottest hours.
Igbo: Okpomọkụ pụrụ ime ka ụmụaka rịa ọrịa ngwa ngwa. Na-enye ụmụ ọhụrụ na ụmụntakịrị mmiri nke ọma, e kwekwala ka ha gwurie egwu n'èzí n'oge okpomọkụ.
Hausa: Zafi na sa yara su kamu da rashin lafiya da sauri. Ku shayar da jarirai da yara ƙanana ruwa, kuma ku hana su fita lokaci nda rana ta fi zafi.
Yoruba: Ooru lè mú kí àwọn ọmọ tètè ṣàìsàn. Jẹ́ kí omi máa ṣàn dáadáa nínú ara àwọn ọmọ ọwọ́ àtàwọn ọmọ kéékèèké, má sì jẹ́ kí wọ́n máa ṣeré níta nígbà tí ooru bá mú gan-an.

Source: If the heat is making you dizzy, stop whatever you’re doing. Find shade, drink water, and rest.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na okpomọkụ na-eme ka isi na-agba gị, kwụsị ihe ọbụla ị na-eme. Nọrọ n'ebe ụzụ na-adịghị, ṅụọ mmiri, ma zurutụ ike.
Hausa: Idan zafi na sa ku jin jiri, ku dakatar da abin da kuke yi. Ku shiga inuwa, ku sha ruwa, ku huta.
Yoruba: Bí ooru bá ń mú kí orí rẹ máa gbọ̀n, jáwọ́ nínú ohunkóhun tó o bá ń ṣe. Wá ibi tó ṣókùnkùn, mu omi, kó o sì sinmi.

Source: Farmers, water your crops early in the morning or late evening. Midday watering leads to fast evaporation.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ ugbo, na-agba ihe ubi unu mmiri n'isi ụtụtụ maọbụ ná mgbede. Ịgba ya mmiri n'etiti ehihie na-eme ka mmiri ya gbazee ngwa ngwa.
Hausa: Manoma, yi ban-ruwa ga gonarku da sassafe ko da yamma. Shayarwa da rana na sa ruwa ya bushe da sauri.
Yoruba: Ẹ̀yin àgbẹ̀, ẹ máa bomi rin àwọn irè oko yín ní òwúrọ̀ kùtùkùtù tàbí ní ọ̀sán gangan. Tí wọ́n bá ń bomi rin lọ́sàn-án, ńṣe ni omi náà á tètè dà nù.

Source: Drought is increasing food prices. Plan ahead and store staple foods while they’re affordable.
Igbo: Oké ọkọchị na-eme ka ọnụ ahịa ihe oriri na-arị elu. Mee atụmatụ tupu oge eruo ma na-echekwa ihe oriri ndị bụ́ isi mgbe ha ka dị ọnụ ala.
Hausa: Fari na haifar da hauhawar farashin abinci. Ku shirya da wuri ku ajiye kayan abinci kafin su ƙara tsada.
Yoruba: Ọ̀dá ló ń mú kí iye tí wọ́n ń ta oúnjẹ lọ sókè. Máa wéwèé ṣáájú kó o sì máa tọ́jú àwọn oúnjẹ pàtàkì tó o bá ṣì lè rà wọ́n.

Source: If you rely on streams or small rivers for drinking water, check their levels daily. Many are drying up faster than expected.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ọ bụ iyi maọbụ obere osimiri ka i ji enweta mmiri ị ga-aṅụ, na-ele mmiri ha kwa ụbọchị. Ọtụtụ na-akpọnwụ ngwa ngwa karịa ka e chere.
Hausa: Idan kun dogara da ƙoramu ko ƙananan koguna wurin ruwan sha, duba matakin ruwan cikinsu kullum. Da dama cikinsu na bushewa da wuri fiye da yadda ake tsammani.
Yoruba: Tó bá jẹ́ pé odò tàbí àwọn odò kéékèèké lo máa ń mu omi, rí i dájú pé o máa ń ṣàyẹ̀wò bí omi náà ṣe pọ̀ tó lójoojúmọ́. Ọ̀pọ̀ wọn ló ń gbẹ táútáú ju bá a ṣe rò lọ.

Source: Livestock are struggling in the heat. Ensure they have enough shade and water throughout the day.
Igbo: Anụ ụlọ na-ata ahụhụ n'oge okpomọkụ. Gbaa mbọ hụ na ha nwere ndò na mmiri kwesịrị kwesịrị n'ụbọchị ahụ niile.
Hausa: Dabbobin kiwo na fama cikin zafi. Tabbatar suna da isassun inuwa da ruwa tsawon yini.
Yoruba: Ọ̀pọ̀ ẹran ọ̀sìn ló ń jìjàkadì nítorí ooru. Rí i dájú pé wọ́n ní ibòji àti omi tó pọ̀ tó lójoojúmọ́.

Source: The sun is making roads too hot for barefoot walking. If you see street kids without shoes, consider donating a pair.
Igbo: Anwụ na-eme ka okporo ụzọ na-ekpo ọkụ nke ukwuu maka ịgba ụkwụ ọtọ gaa ije. Ọ bụrụ na ị hụ ụmụaka na-enweghị akpụkpọ ụkwụ n'okporo ámá, chee echiche inye ha otu.
Hausa: Rana na sa tituna su yi zafi sosai ta yadda ba za a iya tafiya kansu a ƙafa ba takalimi ba. Idan kuka ga yara akan titi ba su da takalmi, ku ba su takalmi.
Yoruba: Oòrùn ń mú kí ojú ọ̀nà gbóná débi pé èèyàn ò lè rìn lábẹ́lẹ̀. Tó o bá rí àwọn ọmọ òpópónà tí wọn ò ní bàtà, ronú nípa fífún wọn ní bàtà.

Source: Heavy rainfall in Abeokuta is causing the Ogun River to overflow. Residents in Lafenwa and Isabo should move to higher ground and avoid flooded roads.
Igbo: Nnukwu mmiri ozuzo n'Abeokuta na-eme ka Osimiri Ogun na-awufusi. Ndị bi na Lafenwa na Isabo kwesịrị ịkwaga n'ebe dị elu ma zere okporo ụzọ ndị ide mmiri jupụtara.
Hausa: Ruwan sama mai yawa a Abeokuta na haddasa tumbatsar Kogin Ogun. Mazauna Lafenwa da Isabo su koma wuri mai tudu kuma su guji hanyoyin da ruwa ya mamaye.
Yoruba: Òjò líle tó rọ̀ ní Abeokuta ti mú kí Odò Ogun kún àkúnya. Àwọn olùgbé Lafenwa àti Isabo gbọ́dọ̀ kó lọ síbi tó ga, kí wọ́n sì yẹra fún àwọn òpópónà tí omi bò.

Source: Kano is expected to reach 42°C tomorrow. Farmers in Bichi should water crops early and avoid working under the sun from noon to 4 PM.
Igbo: A na-atụ anya na Kano ga-eru ogo 42 Celsius echi. Ndị ọrụ ugbo nọ na Bichi kwesịrị ịgbara ihe ọkụkụ mmiri n'oge ma zere ịrụ ọrụ n'okpuru anwụ site n'ehihie ruo elekere anọ nke ehihie.
Hausa: Ana sa ran zafin Kano zai kai 42°C gobe. Manoma a Bichi su yi ban-ruwa da sassafe kuma su guji yin aiki cikin rana daga tsakar rana zuwa ƙarfe 4 na yamma.
Yoruba: A retí pé Kano yóò dé ogójì ó lé méjì ìwọn ti celsius lọ́la. Àwọn àgbẹ̀ ní Bichi yẹ kí wọ́n máa bomi rin àwọn irè oko wọn kíákíá kí wọ́n sì yẹra fún ṣíṣiṣẹ́ lábẹ́ oòrùn láti ọ̀sán títí di aago mẹ́rin òru.

Source: Rising sea levels are threatening fishing communities in Bayelsa’s Brass and Akassa regions. Residents should prepare for possible relocation.
Igbo: Ogo osimiri na-arị elu na-eyi obodo ndị na-akụ azụ na mpaghara Brass na Akassa nke Bayelsa egwu. Ndị bi n'ebe ahụ kwesịrị ịkwado maka ịkwaga ebe ọzọ.
Hausa: Hauhawar ruwan teku na barazana ga ƙauyukan masunta a yankunan Brass da Akassa na Bayelsa. Mazauna su shirya don yiwuwar ƙaura.
Yoruba: Ipò omi òkun tó ń ga sí i ń halẹ̀ mọ́ àwọn agbègbè apẹja ní àgbègbè Brass àti Akassa ti Bayelsa. Ó yẹ kí àwọn olùgbé múra sílẹ̀ fún ṣíṣíṣí tí ó ṣeé ṣe.

Source: Severe drought is affecting farmlands in Dutse and Hadejia. Farmers are encouraged to adopt drip irrigation to conserve water.
Igbo: Oké ọkọchị na-emetụta ọrụ ugbo na Dutse na Hadejia. A na-agba ndị ọrụ ugbo ume ka ha na-agba mmiri site na mmiri mmiri iji chekwaa mmiri.
Hausa: Fari mai tsanani na shafar gonaki a Dutse da Hadejia. Ana ƙarfafa cewa manoma su rungumi hanyar ban-ruwa ta ɗigo-ɗigo don tanadin ruwa.
Yoruba: Ògùn tó le gan-an ti ba àwọn ilẹ̀ oko jẹ́ ní Dutse àti Hadejia. Wọ́n rọ àwọn àgbẹ̀ pé kí wọ́n máa lo ọ̀nà tí wọ́n fi ń fa omi sára láti lè dín omi kù.

Source: Air pollution levels in Port Harcourt are dangerously high due to soot emissions. Residents should wear masks outdoors and keep windows shut.
Igbo: Ogo ikuku merụrụ emerụ na Port Harcourt dị oke elu n'ihi nsị. Ndị bi n'ime obodo kwesịrị iyi ihe nkpuchi ihu n'èzí ma mechie windo.
Hausa: Gurɓatar iska a Port Harcourt yana da yawa sosai saboda hayaƙin da ake fitarwa. Mazauna su saka takunkumi a waje kuma su rufe tagogi.
Yoruba: Awọn ipele idoti afẹfẹ ni Port Harcourt ga pupọ nitori awọn atẹjade màjàlà. Àwọn olùgbé gbọ́dọ̀ wọ ìbòjú ní ìta, kí wọ́n sì pa fèrèsé.

Source: Heavy rainfall is worsening gully erosion in Nanka and Oko, Anambra. Residents should avoid unstable slopes and report landslides to local authorities.
Igbo: Nnukwu mmiri ozuzo na-akawanye ozize dị na Nanka na Oko, Anambra njọ. Ndị bi n'ebe ahụ kwesịrị izere ala na-amị amị ma kọọrọ ndị ọchịchị obodo ha ihe dị etu ahụ.
Hausa: Ruwan sama mai yawa na ƙara tsananta ɓarnar zaizayar ƙasa a Nanku da Oko, Anambra. Mazauna su guji gangarar ƙasa mara ƙarfi kuma su sanar da hukumomi idan ƙasa ta zabtare.
Yoruba: Òjò líle ń mú kí ìdàrúdàpọ̀ àfonífojì pọ̀ sí i ní Nanka àti Oko, Anambra. Ó yẹ kí àwọn aráàlú yẹra fún àwọn ibi tí ọ̀nà ò gbabẹ̀ dé, kí wọ́n sì sọ fún àwọn aláṣẹ àdúgbò nípa ìsẹ̀lẹ̀ náà.

Source: Strong winds and thunderstorms are expected in Kaduna tonight. Motorists should be cautious of fallen trees and electric poles.
Igbo: A na-atụ anya oke ifufe na égbè eluigwe na Kaduna n'abalị a. Ndị ọkwọ ụgbọala kwesịrị ịkpachara anya banyere osisi ndị dara ada na igwe ọkụ eletrik.
Hausa: Ana sa ran samun iska mai ƙarfi da guguwar ruwan sama a Kaduna daren yau. Matuƙa babura su kula da faɗuwar itatuwa da sandunan wutar lantarki.
Yoruba: Afẹ́fẹ́ líle àti ìjì ààrá ni wọ́n ń retí ní Kaduna lálẹ́ yìí. Ó yẹ kí àwọn awakọ̀ ṣọ́ra fún àwọn igi tó ti wó lulẹ̀ àtàwọn òpó iná mànàmáná.

Source: Borehole water levels in Sokoto’s Tambuwal and Gwadabawa have dropped significantly. Residents should store water efficiently and minimize wastage.
Igbo: Ogo mmiri a gbapuru agbapu na Tambuwal Sokoto na Gwadabawa adaala nke ukwuu. Ndị bi n'obodo ahụ kwesịrị ịchekwaa mmiri ma ghara imefu ya.
Hausa: Yawan ruwa a rijiyoyin burtsatse na Tambuwal da Gwadabawa a Sokoto ya sauka sosai. Mazauna su tanadi ruwa kuma su rage ɓarna.
Yoruba: Ìwọ̀n omi tó wà nínú bọ́ọ́hoò ni Tambuwal ati Gwadabawa ni Sokoto ti lọ sílẹ̀ gan-an. Ó yẹ káwọn aráàlú máa tọ́jú omi wọn dáadáa kí wọ́n má sì máa fi ṣòfò.

Source: Dry conditions in Obudu Ranch are increasing the chances of bushfires. Farmers should clear dry vegetation around homes and avoid open burning.
Igbo: Ọnọdụ ọkọchị na Obudu Ranch na-abawanye ohere ọhịa ịgba ọkụ. Ndị ọrụ ugbo kwesịrị iwepụ ahịhịa kpọrọ nkụ n'akụkụ ụlọ ma zere ịgba ya ọkụ n'èzí.
Hausa: Bazara a Obudu Ranch na ƙara yiwuwar yin gobarar daji. Manoma su share busassun ciyayi kuma su guji ƙona shara a fili.
Yoruba: Àìsí omi tó pọ̀ ní Oko Obudu ń mú kí iná máa jó nínú igbó. Àwọn àgbẹ̀ gbọ́dọ̀ gé àwọn ewéko gbígbẹ tó wà nítòsí ilé kúrò kí wọ́n sì yẹra fún sísun wọn ní gbangba.

Source: Heavy downpours in Lagos have worsened potholes along the Lekki-Epe Expressway. Commuters should drive carefully and expect longer travel times.
Igbo: Nnukwu mmiri ozuzo na Legọs emeela ka oghere dị n'okporo ụzọ Lekki-Epe ka njọ. Ndị na-aga ọrụ kwesịrị ịkwọ ụgbọala nke ọma ma na-atụ anya njem ga-ewe ogologo oge.
Hausa: Ruwan sama mai yawa a Lagos ya ƙara lalata ramukan kan titi a kan titin Lekki-Epe. Masu motocin haya su tuƙa a hankali kuma su shirya tafiya mai tsawo.
Yoruba: Òjò líle tó rọ̀ nílùú Èkó ti sọ àwọn ihò tó wà ní ojú ọ̀nà Lekki-Epe Expressway di bàìbàì. Ó yẹ kí àwọn tó ń wakọ̀ máa ṣọ́ra, kí wọ́n sì mọ̀ pé àkókò tí wọ́n máa lò lójú ọ̀nà máa pọ̀ sí i.

Source: It’s been raining heavily in Lokoja, and the River Niger is rising fast. If you live near the river, start making plans to move to safer ground before it gets worse.
Igbo: Oke mmiri na-ezo na Lokoja, Osimiri Niger na-arịkwa elu ngwa ngwa. Ọ bụrụ na ị bi nso n'osimiri, malite ịtụ arọ ịkwaga n'ebe ka mma tupu ọ ka njọ.
Hausa: An samu ruwan sama sosai a Lokoja, kuma Kogin Neja na hauhawa da sauri. Idan kuna kusa da kogin, ku fara shirin barin wurin zuwa wuri mai aminci kafin lamarin yayi tsanani.
Yoruba: Òjò ti rọ̀ gan-an ní Lokoja, Odò Niger sì ń yára kún. Tó o bá ń gbé nítòsí odò, bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ṣètò láti kó lọ síbi tí kò léwu kó tó di pé odò náà wá le koko sí i.

Source: Maiduguri is getting unbearably hot this week. Please drink lots of water and stay indoors during peak sun hours. Heatstroke is real.
Igbo: Maiduguri na-ekpo oke ọkụ n'izu a. Biko ṅụọ mmiri nke ọma ma nọrọ n'ime ụlọ n'oge anwụ kacha acha. Ọrịa heatstroke bụ eziokwu.
Hausa: Maiduguri na ƙara shiga zafi mai tsanani a wannan makon. Don Allah kun shan ruwa da yawa, kuma kun zama a cikin gida lokacin tsananin zafin rana. Mataslar zafi gaskiya ce.
Yoruba: Ooru ti ń mú Maiduguri lọ́sẹ̀ yìí débi pé kò ṣeé fara dà. Jọwọ mu omi pupọ ki o si duro ni ile lakoko awọn wakati oorun ti o pọ julọ. Òótọ́ ni pé ooru máa ń múni.

Source: Strong winds in Calabar have already knocked down some trees and power lines. If you’re outside, stay alert and avoid unstable structures.
Igbo: Ifufe siri ike na Calabar adapụlarị ụfọdụ osisi na eriri eletrik. Ọ bụrụ na ị nọ n'èzí, kpachara anya ma zere ụlọ ndị na-adịghị mma.
Hausa: Iska mai ƙarfi a Calabar ta kayar da wasu itatuwa da wayoyin wutar lantarki. Idan kuna waje, ku zauna a faɗake, kuma ku guji gine-gine masu matsala.
Yoruba: Ìjì líle tó ń jà ní Calabar ti wó àwọn igi àti àwọn ìlà iná mànàmáná kan lulẹ̀. Tó o bá wà níta, ṣọ́ra kó o sì yẹra fún àwọn ilé tí kò dúró sójú kan.

Source: Benin City roads are flooded again. If you’re driving, avoid Sapele Road and Ugbowo. The last thing you want is to be stuck in water with a bad engine.
Igbo: Mmiri ejupụtala n'okporo ụzọ dị na Benin City ọzọ. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-akwọ ụgbọala, zere okporo ụzọ Sapele na Ugbowo. Ihe ikpeazụ ị chọrọ bụ ịnọ n'ime mmiri n'ihi na injin ya mebiri.
Hausa: Hanyoyin Benin City sun sake cika da ruwa. Idan kuna tuƙi, ku guji titin Sapele da Ugbowo, in dai ba so kuke ku maƙale cikin ruwa injin motarku ya lalace ba.
Yoruba: Ọ̀nà ìlú Benin tún kún fún omi. Ti o ba n wakọ, yago fun ọ̀nà Sapele ati Ugbowo. Ohun tí o kò ní fẹ́ ni pé kó o máa jókòó sínú omi pẹ̀lú ẹ̀rọ tó ti bà jẹ́.

Source: Farmers in Jigawa, please hold off on planting just yet. The rains are coming later than usual, and early planting may lead to losses. Stay patient.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ ugbo nọ na Jigawa, biko kwụsịnụ ịgha mkpụrụ ugbua. Mmiri na-ezo n'oge na-adịghị anya karịa ka ọ na-emekarị, ịgha mkpụrụ n'oge pụkwara ịkpata mfu. Nwee ndidi.
Hausa: Manoma a Jigawa, ku dakata da shuka tukuna. Ruwan sama zai yi latti a bana, kuma shuka da wuri na iya janyo asara. Ku yi haƙuri ku ɗan jira.
Yoruba: Ẹ̀yin àgbẹ̀ ní Jigawa, ẹ jọ̀wọ́ ẹ dúró díẹ̀ kí ẹ tó gbin irúgbìn. Òjò ò rọ̀ déédéé mọ́ báyìí, tí wọ́n bá sì lọ gbin nǹkan ṣáájú àkókò, ó lè máà sèso. Ní sùúrù.

Source: The harmattan is hitting hard this year. If you have asthma or allergies, wear a mask and keep your windows closed to reduce exposure to dust.
Igbo: Ụgụrụ n a-abịasi ike n'afọ a. Ọ bụrụ na ị na- arịa ụkwara ume ọkụ maọbụ na- arịa ọrịa ndị na- eme ka ahụ ghara ịna-arụ ọrụ nke ọma , na- ekpu ihe n'ihu gị ma na- emechi windo gị ka uzuzu ghara ịna-emetụ gị .
Hausa: Lokacin sanyi na shigowa da ƙarfi a bana. Idan kuna da cutar asma ko damuwar cuta, ku sa takunkumi kuma ku rufe tagogin gida don rage haɗuwa da ƙura.
Yoruba: Ọyẹ́ náà le lọ́dún yìí. Tó o bá ní àrùn ikọ́ fée tàbí tó o ní àrùn tó máa ń mú kí ara mára gbóná, máa fi nǹkan bo ojú rẹ, kó o sì máa fi fèrèsé rẹ pa kó o má bàa kó sínú eruku.

Source: Rising sea levels in Lagos Island are causing coastal erosion. If you live close to the shore, take extra precautions to protect your home and property.
Igbo: Ogo osimiri na-arị elu n'Agwaetiti Lagos na-akpata ozize n'ụsọ oké osimiri. Ọ bụrụ na ị bi nso n'ụsọ oké osimiri, kpachara anya iji chebe ụlọ gị na ihe onwunwe gị.
Hausa: Hauhawar ruwan teku a Lagos Island na haddasa zaizayar ƙasa a bakin teku. Idan kuna rayuwa kusa da gaɓar ruwa, ku ɗauki matakan kare gidanku da kayanku.
Yoruba: Bí omi òkun ṣe ń ga sí i ní erékùṣù Èkó ti mú kí etíkun bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí í mì. Tó o bá ń gbé nítòsí etíkun, rí i pé o ṣe àwọn nǹkan kan láti dáàbò bo ilé rẹ àti ohun ìní rẹ.

Source: The sun in Ibadan is something else right now. If you work outside, take regular breaks in the shade and wear light-colored clothing to stay cool.
Igbo: Anwụ dị n'Ibadan bụ ihe ọzọ ugbua. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-arụ ọrụ n'èzí, na-ezutụ ike mgbe niile na ndò ma na-eyi uwe na-esighị ike iji mee ka ahụ́ jụọ gị oyi.
Hausa: Rana a Ibadan na da zafi sosai a yanzu haka. Idan kuna aiki a waje, kuna hutawa akai-akai a inuwa, kuma kuna sanya kaya marasa nauyi.
Yoruba: Oòrùn ní Ibadan ti di nǹkan míì báyìí. Tó o bá ń ṣiṣẹ́ níta, máa wá ibi tó ṣókùnkùn, kó o sì máa wọ aṣọ aláwọ̀ mèremère kó lè tutù.

Source: A thunderstorm is on the way in Enugu tonight. If you have outdoor plans, you might want to reschedule. Also, unplug your electronics to prevent damage.
Igbo: Ebili mmiri na-abịa na Enugu n'abalị a. Ọ bụrụ na i nwere ihe ndị ị ga-eme n'èzí, i nwere ike ịhazigharị oge ahụ. Wepụkwa eletrọniks gị n'ọkụ ka ha ghara imebi.
Hausa: Ana sa ran guguwa da tsawa da daddare a Enugu. Idan kuna da shirin fita, to ku ɗaga fitar. Ku kuma cire na’urorin lantarki daga soket don gujewa ɓarna.
Yoruba: Ìjì ààrá ń bọ̀ ní Enugu lálẹ́ yìí. Tó bá jẹ́ pé o ní àfojúsùn kan tó o fẹ́ ṣe níta, o lè fẹ́ ṣe àtúntò rẹ̀. Yàtọ̀ síyẹn, o tún gbọ́dọ̀ yọ àwọn ẹ̀rọ tó o fi ń gbé ìsọfúnni jáde kúrò nínú ẹ̀rọ rẹ kó má bàa bà jẹ́.

Source: Aba market is flooded again after heavy rain. Traders, please raise your goods off the ground to avoid losses. Customers, wear waterproof shoes if you must go out.
Igbo: Mmiri ejupụtala ahịa Aba ọzọ mgbe oke mmiri zoro. Ndị na-azụ ahịa, biko bulie ngwongwo gị n'ala iji zere mmefu. Ndị ahịa, yirinụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ na-eguzogide mmiri ma ọ bụrụ na unu ga-apụ.
Hausa: Kasuwar Aba ta cika da ruwa bayan ruwan sama mai yawa. ‘Yan kasuwa, ku ɗaga kayanku daga ƙasa. Masu sayen kaya kuma, ku saka takalma masu kare ruwa idan dole sai kun fita.
Yoruba: Ọjà Aba tún kún fún omi lẹ́yìn òjò líle. Ẹ̀yin oníṣòwò, ẹ jọ̀wọ́ ẹ gbé ẹrù yín sókè láti yẹra fún àdánù. Àwọn oníbàárà, ẹ máa wọ bàtà tí kò lè wọ omi bí ẹ bá ní láti jáde.

Source: The Jebba Dam water levels are rising. If you live in a riverine area downstream, stay informed and be ready to move if necessary.
Igbo: Mmiri na-arị elu n'ọdọ mmiri Jebba. Ọ bụrụ na i bi n'ebe osimiri na-asọda, mara ihe na-emenụ ma dịrị njikere ịkwaga ebe ọzọ ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị mkpa.
Hausa: Ruwa a Dam ɗin Jebba yana tasowa sama. Idan kuna zaune a ƙasa kusa da kogi, ku kasance a shirye da shirin matsawa zuwa wani wuri.
Yoruba: Omi tó wà nínú ìsédò Jebba ń ga sí i. Bó o bá ń gbé ní àgbègbè odò kan tó wà ní ìsàlẹ̀ odò náà, máa wà lójúfò, kó o sì múra tán láti ṣí lọ síbòmíràn tó bá pọn dandan.

Source: If your area is prone to landslides, be alert after heavy rains. Unusual cracks in the ground or sudden changes in the landscape could be warning signs.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ala na-asụfu n'ebe i bi, kpachara anya ma oké mmiri ozuzo zoo. Mgbawa dị n'ala maọbụ mgbanwe bịara n'ike nwere ike ịbụ ihe iribeama.
Hausa: Idan yankinku na cikin barazanar zabtarewar ƙasa, ku kula bayan ruwan sama mai yawa. Tsagewar ƙasa ko sauyin yanayin ƙasa na iya zama alamar matsala.
Yoruba: Tó bá jẹ́ pé ilẹ̀ máa ń wọ́ tìrítìrí lágbègbè rẹ, ṣọ́ra lẹ́yìn òjò tó rọ̀ gan-an. Àwọn àlàfo tó máa ń wà nínú ilẹ̀ tàbí bí ojú ilẹ̀ ṣe máa ń yí pa dà lójijì lè jẹ́ àmì tó ń kìlọ̀ fún wa.

Source: The Lagos State Emergency Services say they have recorded more car accidents due to wet, slippery roads. Drive carefully, especially at night.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ mberede na Legọs steeti kwuru na ha enwetakwuola ọnụọgụgụ ihe mberede okporo ụzọ n'ihi ụzọ na-amị amị. Na-akwọ ụgbọala nke ọma, ọkachasị n'abalị.
Hausa: Hukumar Agajin Gaggawa ta Jihar Lagos tace an samu ƙarin haɗurran mota saboda hanya mai santsi da jiƙa. Ku yi tuƙi a hankali, musamman da dare.
Yoruba: Ẹ̀ka Iṣẹ́ pàjáwìrì Ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó sọ pé àwọn ti ṣe àkọsílẹ̀ àwọn jàǹbá ọkọ̀ púpọ̀ nítorí àwọn ojú ọ̀nà tó rọ̀, tó sì ń rọ̀. Ṣọ́ra nígbà tó o bá ń wakọ̀, pàápàá lóru.

Source: The Red Cross is assisting families displaced by floods in Adamawa. If you need help or know someone who does, reach out for support.
Igbo: Ndị na-ahụ maka ahụike na-enyere ezinụlọ ndị ide mmiri chụpụrụ aka na Adamawa. Ọ bụrụ na ị chọrọ enyemaka maọbụ ị maara onye chọrọ enyemaka, kpọtụrụ ha maka enyemaka.
Hausa: Ƙungiyar Agajin Gaggawa ta Red Cross na taimaka wa waɗanda ambaliya ta kora a Adamawa. Ku nemi taimako idan kuna buƙata ko kun san mai buƙata.
Yoruba: Ẹgbẹ́ Àmì Àgbélébùú Pupa ń ṣèrànwọ́ fún àwọn ìdílé tí omíyalé kó kúrò ní Adamawa. Tó o bá nílò ìrànlọ́wọ́ tàbí tó o mọ ẹnì kan tó nílò ìrànlọ́wọ́, béèrè fún ìrànlọ́wọ́

Source: Harmattan is setting in earlier than usual in parts of the North. Expect drier air and colder mornings—stay warm and moisturize your skin!
Igbo: Ụgụrụ bịara n'oge karịa ka ọ na-abịakarị n'akụkụ ụfọdụ n'Ugwu. Na-atụ anya ikuku kpọrọ nkụ na oyi n'ụtụtụ --- yichie ahụ ma na-ete ude.
Hausa: Lokacin sanyi na zuwa da wuri a Arewa akan yadda aka saba. Ka sa ran samun busasshiyar iska da safiya mai sanyi—ku rufe jiki kuma ku shafa mai.
Yoruba: Ọyẹ́ ti ń bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí í dé ṣáájú àkókò tó fi máa ń dé láwọn apá ibì kan ní Àríwá. O lè máa retí òjò tó gbẹ àti òwúrọ̀ tó tutù ju ti tẹ́lẹ̀ lọ.

Source: Farmers in Jos are worried about unexpected dry spells. The government advises using water-saving techniques to protect crops.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ ugbo na Jos na-echegbu onwe ha maka oge ọkọchị a na-atụghị anya ya. Gọọmenti na-adụ ọdụ ka e jiri usoro ndị na-echekwa mmiri mee ihe iji chebe ihe ọkụkụ.
Hausa: Manoma a Jos na fargabar tsaikon ruwan sama. Gwamnati na ba da shawarar amfani da dabarun rashin ruwa don kare tsirrai.
Yoruba: Àwọn àgbẹ̀ ní Jos ń ṣàníyàn nípa òjò gbígbẹ tí wọn kò retí. Ìjọba ń dábàá pé kí wọ́n máa lo àwọn ọ̀nà tó lè dín omi kù kí wọ́n lè dáàbò bo irè oko wọn.

Source: Recent floods have led to a rise in snake sightings in Delta State. Be cautious, especially at night, and keep your surroundings clear of hiding spots.
Igbo: Ide mmiri bidoro ọhụrụ emeela ka ọnụ ọgụgụ agwọ a na-ahụ na Delta steeti rịa elu. Kpachara anya, ọkachasị n'abalị, ma zere ebe ndị zoro ezo.
Hausa: Ambaliya a Jihar Delta ta haifar da ƙaruwar ganin macizai. Ku yi hattara, musamman da dare, kuma ku tabbata babu wuraren ɓuya a gidanku.
Yoruba: Àkúnya omi tó wáyé láìpẹ́ yìí ti mú kí iye àwọn ejò tí wọ́n ń rí pọ̀ sí i ní ìpínlẹ̀ Delta. Ṣọ́ra, pàápàá lọ́wọ́ alẹ́, má sì jẹ́ kí ibi tó o máa sá pa mọ́ sí wà nítòsí.

Source: The rising heatwave has made food spoil faster. Store perishable items properly and avoid buying more than you can consume quickly.
Igbo: Oké okpomọkụ rịrị elu emeela ka nri na-emebi ọsịsọ. Debe ihe ndị na-emebi ọsịsọ n'ebe kwesịrị ekwesị ma zere ịzụ ihe karịrị ihe ị gaghị-erisi ọsịsọ.
Hausa: Zafin rana mai tsanani na sa abinci ya lalace da wuri. Ka ajiye kayan da ke da saurin lalacewa da kyau, kuma ku guji sayan fiye da abin da kuke buƙata da wuri.
Yoruba: Ooru tó ń mú gan-an ti mú kí oúnjẹ tètè bà jẹ́. Máa tọ́jú àwọn nǹkan tó lè tètè bà jẹ́ dáadáa, má sì ra ju ohun tó o lè lò lójú ẹsẹ̀ lọ.

Source: Taraba farmers, the rains are delaying this year. You might need to consider irrigation or alternative crops while waiting. Stay prepared.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ ugbo Taraba, mmiri ozuzo na-egbu oge n'afọ a. Ị nwere ike ịtụle etu ị ga-esi na-agba ya mmiri maọbụ ihe ọkụkụ ndị ọzọ ma ị na-eche. Dịrị njikere.
Hausa: Manoma a Taraba, ruwan sama na jinkiri wannan shekarar. Ku yi tunanin yin ban-ruwa ko wasu shuke-shuken daban. Ku kasance a shirye.
Yoruba: Ẹ̀yin àgbẹ̀ Taraba, òjò ń pẹ́ lọ́dún yìí. Ó lè pọn dandan pé kó o máa bomi rin ilẹ̀ tàbí kó o máa gbin àwọn nǹkan míì nígbà tó o bá ń dúró. Ẹ múra sílẹ̀.

Source: The winds in Yobe are no joke right now. If your roof is not strong, please secure it before the next storm comes.
Igbo: Ifufe na Yobe abụghị ihe egwuregwu ugbua. Ọ bụrụ na ụlọ gị esichaghị ike, biko mee ka o sie ike tupu oké ifufe ọzọ abịa.
Hausa: Iska a Yobe tana da ƙarfi sosai. Idan rufin gidanku ba shi da ƙarfi, ku gyara kafin guguwa ta dawo.
Yoruba: Àwọn afẹ́fẹ́ ní Yobe kì í ṣe àwàdà nísinsìnyí. Bí òrùlé yín kò bá lágbára, ẹ jọ̀wọ́ ẹ ṣàtúnṣe rẹ̀ dáadáa kí ìjì tó ń bọ̀ náà tó dé.

Source: Makurdi roads are flooded after last night’s rain. If you must go out, be careful. Hidden potholes are everywhere.
Igbo: Mmiri na-ezo n'okporo ụzọ ndị dị na Makurdi kemgbe mmiri zoro n'abalị ụnyaahụ. Ọ bụrụ na ị ga-apụ apụ, kpachara anya. E nwere olulu ndị zoro ezo n'ebe niile.
Hausa: Hanyoyin Makurdi sun cika da ruwa bayan ruwan jiya da daddare. Idan dole sai kun fita, ku kula da ramukan hanya na ko ina.
Yoruba: Òjò tó ròru lálẹ́ àná ti sọ àwọn òpópónà Makurdi di ahoro. Tó bá pọn dandan pé kó o jáde, ṣọ́ra. Àwọn kòtò tó fara sin wà níbikíbi.

Source: Kano’s air is thick with dust today. If you have breathing issues, please avoid staying outside for long.
Igbo: Ikuku Kano jupụtara n'ájá taa. Ọ bụrụ na i nwere nsogbu iku ume, biko zere ịnọ n'èzí ruo ogologo oge.
Hausa: Iskar ƙurar Kano ta yi duhu yau. Idan kuna da matsalar numfashi, ku guji zama a waje na dogon lokaci.
Yoruba: Òfuurufú Kano kún fún eruku lónìí. Bí o bá ní ìṣòro síséèémí, jọ̀wọ́ yẹra fún wíwà níta fún àkókò gígùn.

Source: Sokoto’s dry season is stretching longer than expected. Water storage will help, especially if you rely on boreholes.
Igbo: Oge ọkọchị na Sokoto na-adịte aka karịa ka a tụrụ anya ya. Ichekwa mmiri ga-enye aka, karịsịa ma ọ bụrụ na ị na-adabere n'olulu mmiri.
Hausa: Lokacin bazara a Sokoto ya yi tsawo fiye da yadda ake tsammani. Tanadin ruwa zai taimaka, musamman idan ka dogaro da rijiyoyin burtsatse.
Yoruba: Àkókò òjò tó gbẹ ní Sokoto ti gùn ju bí a ṣe rò lọ. Ìtọ́jú omi yóò ṣèrànwọ́, àgàgà tó o bá gbára lé àwọn bọ́ọ́hoò.

Source: The thunderstorms in Owerri are causing floods in some areas. If you see water rising, don’t wait—move to higher ground immediately.
Igbo: Ajọ ifufe na Owerri na-akpata ide mmiri n'ebe ụfọdụ. Ọ bụrụ na ị hụ ka mmiri na-arị elu, echela ruo mgbe ị gafere n'ebe dị elu ozugbo.
Hausa: Guguwar hadari a Owerri na haddasa ambaliya a wasu yankuna. Idan kuka ga ruwa na hauhawa, kada ku jira—ku koma wuri mai tudu nan-take.
Yoruba: Ìjì ààrá ní Owerri ń fa omíyalé ní àwọn àgbègbè kan. Tó o bá rí i pé omi ń lọ sókè, má ṣe dúró kí omi náà tó lọ sókè.

Source: Farmers in Katsina, desert encroachment is worsening. Tree planting and soil conservation will go a long way in protecting your land.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ ugbo nọ na Katsina, ọzara na-abịanụ na-akawanye njọ. Ịkụ osisi na ichebe ala ga-enye aka nke ukwuu n'ichebe ala gị.
Hausa: Manoma a Katsina, kwararowar hamada na ƙara tsanani. Shuka itatuwa da kare ƙasa na da matuƙar amfani wurin kare ƙasarku.
Yoruba: Àwọn àgbẹ̀ ní Katsina, bí aṣálẹ̀ ṣe ń wọlé sí i ń burú sí i. Kíkó igi àti pípa erùpẹ̀ mọ́ yóò ṣèrànwọ́ gan-an láti dáàbò bo ilẹ̀ yín.

Source: The heavy rain in Warri has made river transport risky. If you must travel by boat, check the weather before setting out.
Igbo: Oké mmiri ozuzo na Warri emeela ka njem n'osimiri bụrụ ihe dị ize ndụ. Ọ bụrụ na ị ga-eji ụgbọ mmiri mee njem, buru ụzọ chọpụta otú ihu igwe ga-adị tupu ị gawa.
Hausa: Ruwan sama mai yawa a Warri ya sa sufuri ta ruwa ya zama mai haɗari. Idan dole sai ku yi tafiya ajirgin ruwa, Ku duba yanayi kafin fara tafiyar.
Yoruba: Òjò líle tó rọ̀ ní Warri ti sọ ìrìn-àjò orí odò di ewu. Tó bá di dandan kó o wọkọ̀ ojú omi, kọ́kọ́ ṣàyẹ̀wò bí ojú ọjọ́ ṣe máa rí.

Source: The Lake Chad area is getting drier by the day. Herders, please start looking for alternative grazing areas early.
Igbo: Ebe Ọdọ Mmiri Chad na-akpọnwụ kwa ụbọchị. Ndị ọzụzụ atụrụ, biko malite ịchọ n'oge ebe ọzọ a ga-anọ na-ata ahịhịa.
Hausa: Yankin Tafkin Chadi na ƙara bushewa kullum. Makiyaya, ku fara nemo sabin wuararen kiwo da wuri.
Yoruba: Àgbègbè Adágún Chad ń gbẹ̀ sí i lójoojúmọ́. Ẹ̀yin olùṣọ́ àgùntàn, ẹ jọ̀wọ́ ẹ tètè bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí í wá àwọn ibòmíì tí ẹ ti lè máa jẹko.

Source: Uyo’s drainage system is clogged again, and floods are everywhere. If you see blocked gutters, let’s clear them before the next rain.
Igbo: Ọwa mmiri nke Uyo akpọchịela ọzọ ma ide mmiri dị ebe niile. Ọ bụrụ na ị hụ ebe mmiri na-agbachi, ka anyị kpochapụ ha tupu mmiri ezoo ọzọ.
Hausa: Magudanan ruwa na Uyo sun sake toshewa, ambaliya kuma na ko’ina. Idan kuka ga magudanan ruwa a toshe, mu share su kafin ruwa na gaba ya zo.
Yoruba: Ọ̀nà tí omi ń gbà ṣàn ní ìlú Uyo tún ti dí, omíyalé sì wà káàkiri. Bí ẹ bá rí àwọn ìkùdu tó dí, ẹ jẹ́ ká tú wọn ká tó di ìgbà òjò tó ń bọ̀.

Source: Minna is experiencing strong winds that might disrupt communication signals. If your network is shaky, that’s probably why.
Igbo: Minna na-enwe oké ifufe nke pụrụ ịghasa netwọk nkwurịta okwu. Ọ bụrụ na netwọkụ gị na-ama jijiji, nke ahụ bụ ihe kpatara ya.
Hausa: Minna na fuskantar iska mai ƙarfi da ke iya jawo matsala ga hanyoyin sadarwa. Idan hanyar sadarwa ba ta aiki yadda ya kamata, wannan na iya zama dalili.
Yoruba: jì líle tó ń jà nílùú Minna lè ba ìsọfúnni jẹ́. Tó bá jẹ́ pé àárín ẹ̀yin méjèèjì kò gún, ó ṣeé ṣe kó jẹ́ pé ìyẹn ló fà á.

Source: The dust haze in Bauchi is making visibility terrible. If you’re driving, use your headlights and go slow.
Igbo: Uzuzu na Bauchi na-eme ka a ghara ịhụ ụzọ nke ọma. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-akwọ ụgbọala, jiri ọkụ ụgbọala gị ma jiri nwayọọ na-aga.
Hausa: Hazon ƙura a Bauchi na hana ganin hanya da kyau. Idan kuna tuƙi, kunna fitilun mota kuma ku rage gudu.
Yoruba: Òfuurufú tó bo ìlú Bauchi ti mú kí ojú ò ríran dáadáa. Tó o bá ń wakọ̀, lo fìtílà rẹ kó o sì máa lọ ní kẹ̀rẹ̀kẹ̀rẹ̀.

Source: The drought in Borno is worsening food shortages. If you’re struggling, please check for community aid programs.
Igbo: Oké ọkọchị na Borno na-eme ka ụkọ nri ka njọ. Ọ bụrụ na ọ na-ahịa gị ahụ, biko lelee maka mmemme enyemaka obodo.
Hausa: Fari a Borno na ƙara jawo ƙarancin abinci. Idan kuna cikin wahala, ka bincika shirye-shiryen tallafi na al’umma.
Yoruba: Ọ̀dá tó wà ní Borno ń mú kí àìtó oúnjẹ burú sí i. Bí o bá ń jìjàkadì, jọ̀wọ́ ṣàyẹ̀wò àwọn ètò ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún àwùjọ.

Source: Flash floods in Ekiti are getting worse. If your area is prone to landslides, stay extra cautious during heavy rains.
Igbo: ide mmiri na-abịa na mberede n'Ekiti na-akawanye njọ. Ọ bụrụ na ala na-asụfu n'ebe i bi, kpachara anya nke ọma ma oké mmiri zoo.
Hausa: Ambaliya ta bazata a Ekiti na ƙara tsananta. Idan yankinku na da yiwuwar zabtarewar ƙasa, ka ƙara kula lokacin ruwan sama mai yawa.
Yoruba: Àkúnya omi lójijì ní Ekiti ti ń burú sí i. Tó bá jẹ́ pé ilẹ̀ máa ń wọ́ tìrítìrí lágbègbè tó ò ń gbé, máa ṣọ́ra gan-an lákòókò tí òjò bá ń rọ̀.

Source: Kwara, more thunderstorms are coming. Secure outdoor furniture and anything that could be blown away.
Igbo: Kwara, a ga-enwekwu égbè eluigwe. Chekwaa ngwá ụlọ ndị dị n'èzí na ihe ọbụla nwere ike ifufe.
Hausa: Kwara, ana sa ran samun ƙarin guguwar hadari. Ka kulle kayan gida na waje da duk abin da iska za ta iya ɗauka.
Yoruba: Kwara, ìjì ààrá tún ń bọ̀. Fi àwọn ohun èlò inú ilé àti ohunkóhun tó lè fẹ́ pa run pa mọ́.

Source: Bayelsa fishermen, high tides are making the waters rough. Be extra careful when heading out.
Igbo: Ndị ọkụ azụ Bayelsa, oke ebili mmiri na-eme ka mmiri dị egwu. Kpachapụ anya nke ọma mgbe ị na-apụ apụ.
Hausa: Masuntan Bayelsa, igiyar ruwa mai tsawo na ƙara rashin daidaito a ruwa. Ku kula sosai idan zakun fita.
Yoruba: Àwọn apẹja Bayelsa, ìgbì òkun ń ru gùdù. Ṣọ́ra gan-an nígbà tó o bá ń lọ.

Source: Cold temperatures in Jos are affecting livestock. If you keep animals, make sure they have warm shelter at night.
Igbo: Ọnọdụ okpomọkụ dị na Jos na-emetụta anụ ụlọ. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-azụ ụmụ anụmanụ, hụ na ha nwere ebe na-ejughị oyi ha ga-anọ n'abalị.
Hausa: Sanyi a Jos na shafar dabbobin kiwo. Idan kuna da dabba, ka tanadar musu da mafaka mai ɗumi da dare.
Yoruba: Òtútù tó ń mú ní Jos ń ṣàkóbá fún ẹran ọ̀sìn. Tó o bá ní àwọn ẹran ọ̀sìn, rí i dájú pé wọ́n ní ibi tó móoru tí wọ́n ti lè sùn lóru.

Source: Nsukka roads are becoming a mess due to continuous rain. If you have to drive, avoid shortcuts through unpaved paths.
Igbo: Okporo ụzọ Nsukka na-emebisi n'ihi mmiri ozuzo na-ezo kwa mgbe. Ọ bụrụ na ị ga-akwọ ụgbọala, ghara isi na nkenke ụzọ a naghị aganwu..
Hausa: Hanyoyin Nsukka na lalacewa saboda ruwan sama da bai tsaya ba. Idan dole sai ku yi tuƙi, ku guji hanyoyin ratse na hanyoyin da babu titi.
Yoruba: Àwọn ojú ọ̀nà ìlú Nsukka ti di ẹ̀gbin nítorí òjò tó ń rọ̀ láìdáwọ́ dúró. Tó o bá ní láti wa mọ́tò, má ṣe gba ọ̀nà tí kò ní òpópónà.

Source: Delta riverbanks are weakening due to rising water levels. If your house is close to the river, start making safety plans now.
Igbo: Osimiri Delta na-adalata n'ihi mmụba ogo mmiri. Ọ bụrụ na ụlọ gị dị nso n'osimiri ahụ, malite ịtụ arọ maka nchekwaba gị ugbua.
Hausa: Gaɓoɓin kogin Delta na raunana sakamakon hauhawar ruwa. Idan gidanku na kusa da kogi, fara shirin tsaro yanzu.
