Yoruba: Àwọn etí odò Delta ti ń di ahẹrẹpẹ nítorí omi tó ń lọ sókè. Bí ilé rẹ bá wà nítòsí odò, bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ṣe àwọn ètò ààbò nísinsìnyí.

Source: Ondo farmers, coastal erosion is taking away fertile land. Consider alternative farming techniques.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ ugbo Ondo, ozize na-ewepụ ala na-amị mkpụrụ. Tụlee ụzọ ndị ọzọ e si akọ ugbo.
Hausa: Manoma a Ondo, zaizayar ƙasa ta gaɓar teku na lalata filayen noma masu kyan ƙasar noma. Ku yi la'akari da amfani da wasu hanyoyin noma.
Yoruba: Àwọn àgbẹ̀ Ondo, ìdàrúdàpọ̀ etíkun ń gba ilẹ̀ eléso lọ. Ronú nípa àwọn ọ̀nà mìíràn tí wọ́n lè gbà dáko.

Source: Taraba’s dry conditions may lead to water shortages. Start storing water now before it becomes scarce.
Igbo: Ọnọdụ ọkọchị nke Taraba nwere ike ibute ụkọ mmiri. Malite ịchekwa mmiri ugbua tupu ya agwụ.
Hausa: Bushewar ƙasa a Taraba na iya haddasa ƙarancin ruwa. Fara tanadin ruwa yanzu kafin ya yi ƙaranci.
Yoruba: Àìsí omi ní Taraba lè yọrí sí àìtó omi. Bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí kó omi jọ nísinsìnyí kó tó di pé kò sí omi mọ́.

Source: Lagos traffic is even worse today because of flooded expressways. If you’re heading out, leave early or find alternative routes.
Igbo: Ụgbọala na Lagos ka njọ taa n'ihi na mmiri jupụtara n'okporo ụzọ awara awara. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-apụ apụ, pụọ n'oge maọbụ chọta ụzọ ndị ọzọ.
Hausa: Cunkoson ababen hawa a Lagos ya ƙara tsananta yau saboda manyan tituna masu ambaliya. Idan zakun fita, kun fita da wuri ko ka nemi wata hanya.
Yoruba: Ìṣòro ọkọ̀ nílùú Èkó ti wá burú ju ti ìgbàkígbà rí lọ lónìí nítorí àwọn ojú ọ̀nà tó kún fún omi. Tó o bá fẹ́ jáde, tètè kúrò nílé tàbí kó o wá ọ̀nà míì.

Source: Osun is experiencing stronger winds than usual. If your roof isn’t solid, please reinforce it before the next storm.
Igbo: Osun na-enwe ifufe siri ike karịa ka ọ na-adịbu. Ọ bụrụ na gbamgbam gị esighi ike, biko mee ka o sie ike tupu oké ifufe ọzọ abịa.
Hausa: A Osun, ana fuskantar iska mai ƙarfi fiye da yadda aka saba. Idan rufin gidanku ba shi da ƙarfi, ka gyara shi kafin guguwa ta gaba.
Yoruba: Osun ti ń rí afẹ́fẹ́ tó lágbára jutó lágbára ju bó ṣe yẹ lọ. Bí òrùlé yín kò bá dúró dáadáa, ẹ jọ̀wọ́ ẹ tún un ṣe kí ìjì tó dé.

Source: Akwa Ibom fish farmers, the heavy rain might flood your ponds. Secure them before you lose stock.
Igbo: Ndị na-akpa azụ na Akwa Ibom, oke mmiri ozuzo nwere ike iju ọdọ mmiri unu. Chekwaa ha tupu ị ha aghọrọ mmefu.
Hausa: Masunta a Akwa Ibom, ruwan saman mai tsanani na iya cinye ruwanku na kifi. Ka tsare su kafin ruwa ya watsar da kifinku.
Yoruba: Ẹ̀yin àgbẹ̀ ẹja ní Akwa Ibom, òjò líle lè sọ adágún yín di òkun. Ẹ kó wọn pa mọ́ kí ẹ tó pàdánù ẹrù yín.

Source: Adamawa’s heat index is dangerously high today. Try to avoid direct sunlight between noon and 3 PM.
Igbo: Ọnọdụ okpomọkụ Adamawa dị oke egwu taa. Gbalịa izere ìhè anyanwụ kpọmkwem n'agbata etiti ehihie na elekere atọ nke ehihie.
Hausa: Zafin rana a Adamawa yana da tsananin yawa yau. Ku guji shiga rana ku-tsaye daga tsakar rana zuwa ƙarfe 3 na yamma.
Yoruba: Àkọsílẹ̀ ooru Adamawa ti ga lọ́nà tó léwu lónìí. Gbìyànjú láti yẹra fún oòrùn ní tààràtà láàárín ọ̀sán àti aago mẹ́ta òru.

Source: Kebbi farmers, the rains might end earlier than usual. Harvest your crops in time to avoid losses.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ ugbo Kebbi, mmiri ozuzo nwere ike ịkwụsị n'oge karịa ka ọ na-adị. Ghaa ihe ubi gị n'oge iji zere mmefu.
Hausa: Manoman Kebbi, ruwan sama na iya tsayawa kafin lokacin da ya saba tsayawa. Girbe amfanin gonarku da wuri don guje wa asara.
Yoruba: Ẹ̀yin àgbẹ̀ Kebbi, òjò lè tètè parí ju bó ṣe yẹ lọ. Máa kórè àwọn irè oko rẹ lásìkò kó o má bàa pàdánù wọn.

Source: Plateau, expect more rockslides this week. If you live near a rocky area, stay on alert.
Igbo: Plateau, na-atụ anya ihe ndị ọzọ rocklides n'izu a. Ọ bụrụ na ị bi nso n'ebe nkume dị, nọrọ na nche.
Hausa: A Filato, a sa ran zabtarewar duwatsu a wannan makon. Idan kuna kusa da yanki mai yawan duwatsu, ka kasance cikin shiri.
Yoruba: Plateau, máa retí àkúnya òkúta púpọ̀ sí i lọ́sẹ̀ yìí. Tó o bá ń gbé nítòsí ibi àpáta, máa ṣọ́ra.

Source: Gombe, the harmattan haze is affecting flights. If you’re travelling, check for possible delays.
Igbo: Gombe, harmattan haze na-emetụta ụgbọelu. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-eme njem, lelee ma ọ̀ ga-egbu oge.
Hausa: A Gombe, hazo na lokacin sanyi na hana tashi da sauƙar jiragen sama. Idan zaku yi tafiya, binciku yiwuwar jinkiri.
Yoruba: Gombe, ìkùukùu ọyẹ́ náà ń nípa lórí àwọn ọkọ̀ òfuurufú. Tó o bá ń rìnrìn àjò, rí i dájú pé o kò fi àkókò ṣòfò.

Source: Boreholes in Ogun are drying up faster than usual. Conserve water where you can.
Igbo: Oghere ndị dị n'Ogun na-akpọnwụ ngwa ngwa karịa ka ọ na-adị. Na-echekwa mmiri mgbe ọbụla i nwere ike.
Hausa: Rijiyoyin burtsatse a Ogun na bushewa da wuri fiye da yadda aka saba gani. Ka tanadi ruwa a duk inda ya yiwu.
Yoruba: Àwọn bọ́ọ́hoò tó wà ní Ogun ti ń gbẹ kíákíá ju bó ṣe yẹ lọ. Máa ṣọ́ omi lò níbi tó o bá ti lè ṣe é.

Source: Ebonyi is experiencing more power outages due to stormy weather. Charge your devices while you can.
Igbo: Ebonyi na-enwekwu ụkọ ọkụ eletrik n'ihi ọnọdụ ihu igwe. Tinye ngwaọrụ gị n'ọkụ mgbe ị nwere ike.
Hausa: A Ebonyi, ana yawan samun katsewar wutar lantarki sakamakon guguwar hadari. Ku yi wa na’urorinku caji da zarar ka samu dama.
Yoruba: Ìjì tí ń jà nílùú Ebonyi ti mú kí iná mànàmáná túbọ̀ dín kù. Ẹ máa fi àwọn ohun èlò yín kún iná nígbà tí ẹ bá ṣì lè ṣe é.

Source: Cross River river crossings might be dangerous today due to strong currents. Take extra care.
Igbo: Ịgafe osimiri Cross River nwere ike ịbụ ihe dị ize ndụ taa n'ihi mmiri na-asọsi ike. Kpachara anya nke ọma.
Hausa: Gadojin kogin Cross River na iya zama masu haɗari yau saboda ƙarfin igiyar ruwan. Ku kula sosai.
Yoruba: Ìrìn odò Cross River lè léwu lónìí nítorí ìjì líle. Ṣọ́ra gan-an.

Source: Lightning storms in Zamfara are on the rise. Avoid sheltering under trees during storms.
Igbo: Ajọ ifufe na Zamfara na-arị elu. Zere ịnọ n'okpuru osisi mgbe oké ifufe na-efe.
Hausa: Yawan walƙiya a Zamfara na ƙaruwa. Ku guji tsayawa ƙarƙashin itatuwa yayin ruwa ko hadari.
Yoruba: Ìjì mànàmáná ní Zamfara ti ń pọ̀ sí i. Má ṣe sá sábẹ́ igi nígbà tí ìjì bá ń jà.

Source: Rain in Imo is worsening erosion in some communities. If you see a developing gully, report it early.
Igbo: Mmiri na-ezo n'Imo na-abawanye ozize n'obodo ụfọdụ. Ọ bụrụ na ị hụ ebe mmiri na-asọ asọ, kwuo ya n'oge.
Hausa: Ruwan sama a Imo na ƙara munin zaizayar ƙasa a wasu al'ummomi. Idan kuka ga rami na rarakewa, ka sanar da wuri.
Yoruba: Òjò ní Imo ń mú kí òkìtì ilẹ̀ túbọ̀ pọ̀ sí i ní àwọn agbègbè kan. Tó o bá rí i pé ọ̀gbàrá ti ń yọ, tètè ròyìn rẹ̀.

Source: Benue’s farmland is getting battered by strong winds. If you’re a farmer, reinforce weak crops.
Igbo: Oké ifufe na-emebisi ala a na-akọ ihe na Benue. Ọ bụrụ na ị bụ onye ọrụ ugbo, kụọ ihe ọkụkụ nke na-esighi ike.
Hausa: Gonakin Benue na fuskantar illa daga iska mai ƙarfi. Idan ku manomi ne, ka ƙarfafa amfanin gonarka da kyau.
Yoruba: Àwọn ẹ̀fúùfù líle ń fẹ́ lu ilẹ̀ oko Benue. Tó o bá jẹ́ àgbẹ̀, máa fún àwọn irè oko tó ti bà jẹ́ lókun.

Source: Anambra’s heat is affecting food storage. Keep perishable goods in cool places.
Igbo: Okpomọkụ Anambra na-emetụta nchekwa nri. Debe ihe ndị na-emebi ngwa ngwa n'ebe juo oyi.
Hausa: Zafin rana a Anambra na shafar ajiyar abinci. Ka ajiye kayan da ke da saurin lalacewa a wuri mai sanyi.
Yoruba: Ooru tó ń mú nílùú Anambra ń nípa lórí ìpamọ́ oúnjẹ. Fi àwọn nǹkan tó lè tètè bà jẹ́ pa mọ́ sí ibi tó tutù.

Source: Niger residents should expect more sudden thunderstorms. Unplug appliances when you hear thunder.
Igbo: Ndị bi na Niger kwesịrị ịtụ anya na a ga-enwe ebili mmiri nke ga-abịa na mberede. Wepụ ihe ndị dị n'ọkụ mgbe ị nụrụ égbè eluigwe.
Hausa: Mazauna jihar Niger su sa ran guguwar hadari ta bazata. Ka cire kayan lantarki daga soket idan ka ji tsawa.
Yoruba: Ó yẹ kí àwọn olùgbé Niger máa retí ìjì ààrá lójijì. Yọ àwọn ohun èlò jáde nígbà tó o bá gbọ́ ààrá.

Source: Oyo’s heavy rains might increase crop diseases. Farmers, be prepared.
Igbo: Oke mmiri e nwere n'Oyo nwere ike ịbawanye ọrịa n'ihe ọkụkụ. Ndị ọrụ ugbo, dịrịnụ njikere.
Hausa: Ruwan sama mai yawa a Oyo na iya ƙara yawan cututtukan amfanin gona. Manoma, ku shirya.
Yoruba: Òjò ńlá tó ń rọ̀ ní Oyo lè mú kí àrùn àwọn irè oko pọ̀ sí i. Ẹ̀yin àgbẹ̀, ẹ múra sílẹ̀.

Source: High tides in Rivers State are causing more coastal flooding. If you live by the shore, be careful.
Igbo: Oke ebili mmiri na Rivers Steeti na-akpata oke ide mmiri n'akụkụ osimiri. Ọ bụrụ na ị bi n'akụkụ osimiri, kpachara anya.
Hausa: Hawan igiyoyin ruwa a jihar Rivers na haddasa ƙarin ambaliya a gaɓar teku. Idan kuna zaune kusa da teku, Ku kula sosai.
Yoruba: Àkúnya omi tó ga ní Ìpínlẹ̀ Rivers ń fa omíyalé tó pọ̀ sí i ní etíkun. Tó o bá ń gbé létíkun, ṣọ́ra.

Source: Edo is experiencing flooded streets again. Wear waterproof shoes if you must go out.
Igbo: Edo na-enwekwa ide mmiri n'okporo ámá ọzọ. Yiri akpụkpọ ụkwụ na-eguzogide mmiri ma ọ bụrụ na ị ga-apụ apụ.
Hausa: Edo na sake fuskantar ambaliya a tituna. Ka sa takalma masu hana ruwa taɓa jiki idan dole sai kun fita.
Yoruba: Àwọn òpópónà Edo tún ti kún fún omi. Wá bàtà tí kò lè wọ omi bó o bá fẹ́ jáde.

Source: NiMet says heavy rainfall is coming in the next few days. If you live in a flood-prone area, start making safety plans now. Don’t wait until it’s too late.
Igbo: NiMet na-ekwu na oke mmiri ga-ezo n'ụbọchị ole na ole na-abịa. Ọ bụrụ na i bi n'ebe a na-enwekarị ide mmiri, malite ime atụmatụ maka ịnọ ná nchebe ugbua. E cherela ruo mgbe oge gafeworo.
Hausa: NiMet ta ce ana sa ran ruwan sama mai yawa a cikin kwanaki masu zuwa. Idan kuna zaune a yankin da ke da yiwuwar ambaliya, fara shirin tsaro yanzu. Kada ku jira har sai lokaci ya ƙure.
Yoruba: NiMet sọ pé òjò ńlá yóò rọ̀ ní ọjọ́ díẹ̀ tó ń bọ̀. Tó o bá ń gbé ní àgbègbè kan tí omíyalé ti sábà máa ń ṣẹlẹ̀, bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí í ṣètò bó o ṣe máa dáàbò bo ara rẹ. Má ṣe dúró dìgbà tó bá ti pẹ́ jù.

Source: The Ministry of Health is advising everyone to be cautious of waterborne diseases after the recent floods. Boil your drinking water and keep your surroundings clean.
Igbo: Mịnịstrị na-ahụ maka ahụike na-adụ onye ọbụla ọdụ ka o kpachara anya maka ọrịa ndị a na-ebute site na mmiri ka ide mmiri nke ahụ gasịrị. Sie mmiri ị na-aṅụ n'ọkụ ma na-emekwa ka ebe ị na-anọ dị ọcha.
Hausa: Ma’aikatar Lafiya na shawartar jama’a su kula da cututtuka masu yaɗuwa ta ruwa bayan ambaliya tabaya-bayan nan. Ka tafasa ruwan shanku kuma ku tsaftace muhallinku.
Yoruba: Ilé Iṣẹ́ Ìlera ń gba gbogbo ènìyàn nímọ̀ràn láti ṣọ́ra fún àìsàn tí omi ń kó ranni lẹ́yìn ìkún omi tó wáyé láìpẹ́ yìí. Máa se omi tó o máa mu, kó o sì máa rí i pé àyíká rẹ wà ní mímọ́ tónítóní.

Source: Residents in low-lying areas of Kogi and Anambra should stay alert. Water levels are rising, and evacuation might be necessary if the situation worsens.
Igbo: Ndị bi n'ebe ndị dị n'okpuru Kogi na Anambra kwesịrị ịnọ na nche. Mmiri ahụ na-arị elu, ịpụ ebe ahụ ozugbo dị mkpa ma ọ bụrụ na ọnọdụ ahụ aka njọ.
Hausa: Mazauna yankunan yankunan kwari-kwari a Kogi da Anambra su kasance cikin shiri. Ruwan na hauhawa, kuma ana iya buƙatar ƙaura idan lamarin ya tsananta.
Yoruba: Àwọn olùgbé ní àwọn agbègbè ìsàlẹ̀ Kogi àti Anambra gbọ́dọ̀ wà lójúfò. Omi ń lọ sókè, ó sì lè di dandan kí wọ́n kó àwọn èèyàn kúrò níbẹ̀ bí ọ̀ràn náà bá burú sí i.

Source: The Lagos State Government has urged people to clear blocked drainages around their homes. A little effort now can prevent major flooding when the rains come.
Igbo: Gọọmentị Legọs Steeti agwala ndị mmadụ ka ha kpochapụ ebe mmiri na-asọ n'akụkụ ụlọ ha. Obere mbọ e mere ugbua nwere ike igbochi oké ide mmiri mgbe mmiri ozuzo malitere.
Hausa: Gwamnatin Jihar Lagos na ƙarfafa mutane su share magudanan ruwa da suka toshe da ke kusa da gidajensu. Ƙoƙari kaɗan yanzu na iya hana ambaliya mai girma idan ruwa ya zo.
Yoruba: Ìjọba Ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó ti rọ àwọn ènìyàn láti fọ àwọn ọ̀nà ìtọ́jú omi tí ó ti dí yí ilé wọn ká. Ìsapá díẹ̀ táa bá ṣe nísinsìnyí lè dènà omíyalé ńlá nígbà tí òjò bá rọ̀.

Source: Coastal communities should prepare for strong winds and rough tides in the coming days. If you’re a fisherman, consider delaying your trips until conditions improve.
Igbo: Obodo ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri kwesịrị ịkwadebe maka ifufe siri ike na oké ebili mmiri n'ụbọchị na-abịanụ. Ọ bụrụ na ị bụ onye na-akụ azụ̀, maa ma ị ga-eme njem oge ọzọ mgbe ọnọdụ dị mma.
Hausa: Al’ummomin gaɓar teku su shirya don iska mai ƙarfi da igiyar ruwa mai ƙarfi a kwanaki masu zuwa. Idan ku masunci ne, kuka fara tunanin jinkirta tafiye-tafiye har sai yanayi ya inganta.
Yoruba: Àwọn ìlú tó wà létí òkun gbọ́dọ̀ múra sílẹ̀ fún afẹ́fẹ́ líle àti ìgbì òkun líle ní àwọn ọjọ́ tó ń bọ̀. Tó o bá jẹ́ apẹja, ronú nípa fífi ìrìn àjò rẹ falẹ̀ títí dìgbà tí ipò nǹkan á fi dára sí i.

Source: The National Emergency Management Agency has warned that more heatwaves are expected this month. Stay hydrated and avoid long hours in the sun, especially for children and the elderly.
Igbo: Ụlọọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe mberede na mba adọọla aka na ntị na a na-atụ anya na oke okpomọkụ ga-adị n'ọnwa a. Na-aṅụ mmiri nke ọma ma ghara ịnọ ogologo oge n'anwụ, ọkachasị ụmụaka na ndị agadi.
Hausa: Hukumar Agajin Gaggawa ta yi gargaɗin cewa ana sa ran za a samu ƙarin zafin rana a wannan wata. Ku sha ruwa sosai kuma ku guji shiga rana sosai, musamman ga yara da tsofaffi.
Yoruba: Àjọ tó ń rí sí ọ̀ràn pàjáwìrì lágbàáyé ti kìlọ̀ pé ooru tó ń mú gan-an tún ń bọ̀ lóṣù yìí. Máa mu omi dáadáa, kó o sì yẹra fún wíwà lábẹ́ oòrùn fún àkókò gígùn, pàápàá fún àwọn ọmọdé àtàwọn arúgbó.

Source: Sokoto is seeing unusually dry conditions. Farmers are encouraged to adopt irrigation methods to prevent crop losses.
Igbo: Sokoto anaghị enwezi mmiri dịka ha si enwebu. A na-agba ndị ọrụ ugbo ume ka ha jiri usoro ịgbara mmiri iji gbochie ihe ọkụkụ ịla n'iyi.
Hausa: Sokoto na fama da bushewar ƙasa fiye da kima. Ana so manoma su rungumi yin ban-ruwa don kare lalacewar amfanin gona.
Yoruba: Ọ̀dá tí kò wọ́pọ̀ ló wà ní Sokoto. Wọ́n rọ àwọn àgbẹ̀ láti máa lo ọ̀nà ìfún omi kí irè oko wọn má bàa bà jẹ́.

Source: Continuous heavy rains in Ibadan have caused some roads to be flooded. Drive carefully and avoid waterlogged streets whenever possible.
Igbo: Nnukwu mmiri ozuzo n'Ibadan emeela ka ụfọdụ okporo ụzọ jupụta na mmiri. Na-akwọ ụgbọala nke ọma ma zere ịga n'okporo ámá ndị mmiri jupụtara na ha mgbe ọbụla ị nwere ike.
Hausa: Ruwan sama mai ƙarfi a Ibadan ya haddasa ambaliya a wasu tituna. Ku yi tuƙi a hankali kuma ku guji hanyoyin da ruwa ya mamaye idan zai yiwu.
Yoruba: Òjò líle tó ń rọ̀ láìdáwọ́dúró ní Ibadan ti mú kí omi bo àwọn ojú ọ̀nà kan. Máa ṣọ́ra nígbà tó o bá ń wakọ̀, má sì ṣe gba àwọn òpópónà tí omi ti pọ̀.

Source: Rising temperatures across the North have increased the risk of wildfires. If you live near dry vegetation, avoid open flames and report any bushfires immediately.
Igbo: Ọnọdụ okpomọkụ bawanyerenụ n'akụkụ Ugwu amụbawo ọhịa ịgba ọkụ. Ọ bụrụ na ị bidebere ala kpọrọ nkụ, zere ọkụ na-agba n'èzí ma kọọrọ ndị mmadụ ozugbo ọkụ gbara n'ọhịa.
Hausa: Hauhawar zafin rana a faɗin Arewa na ƙara haɗarin faruwar gobarar daji. Idan kuna kusa da busassun dazuka, ku guji wuta a fili kuma ku sanar da gobarar daji da wuri.
Yoruba: Ooru tó ń lọ sókè lápá àríwá ti mú kí ewu iná pápá pọ̀ sí i. Bó o bá ń gbé nítòsí igbó gbígbẹ, má ṣe dáná, tó o bá sì rí i pé igbó ń jó, tètè lọ ròyìn fún wọn.

Source: The Ogun State Emergency Services are on high alert as strong winds are expected. Secure loose objects around your home to avoid damage or injury.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe mberede n'Ogun steeti nọ na njikere maka oke ifufe na-atụ anya. Kpachara anya ka ihe ọbụla na-agbapụ agbapụ ghara imebi maọbụ merụọ gị ahụ́.
Hausa: Hukumar Agaji ta Jihar Ogun na cikin shiri domin ana sa ran iska mai ƙarfi. Ka kulle dukkan abubuwan da iska za ta iya ɗauka.
Yoruba: Àwọn Ẹ̀ka Iṣẹ́ Àkànṣe Ìpèsè fún Ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ Pàjáwìrì ní Ìpínlẹ̀ Ogun ti wà ní ìmúrasílẹ̀ gíga nítorí afẹ́fẹ́ líle tí wọ́n ń retí. Má ṣe jẹ́ kí ohunkóhun tó bá ń ṣí kiri nínú ilé rẹ bọ́ lọ́wọ́ àwọn nǹkan tó lè bà jẹ́ tàbí tó lè ṣe èèyàn léṣe.

Source: If your area has been experiencing frequent power outages during storms, consider getting surge protectors for your electronics. Protect your appliances before the next rainfall.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ebe i bi anaghị enwe ọkụ mgbe mmiri na-ezo, mara ma ị ga-eweta ihe ga-echekwabara gị eletrọniks. Chebe ngwongwo dị n'ụlọ gị tupu oké mmiri ozuzo ọzọ abịa.
Hausa: Idan yankinku na yawan samun katsewar wutar lantarki yayin hadari, ya kamata ke nemo na’urar kiyaye lantarki don kare na’urorinku. Kare na’urorinku kafin ruwan sama na gaba.
Yoruba: Tó bá jẹ́ pé ìgbà gbogbo ni iná mànàmáná máa ń pa ní àgbègbè rẹ nígbà tí ìjì bá ń jà, o lè wá nǹkan tó máa dáàbò bo àwọn ẹ̀rọ rẹ lọ́wọ́ iná mànàmáná. Dáàbò bo àwọn ohun èlò rẹ kí òjò tó rọ̀.

Source: The Nigerian Red Cross has set up temporary shelters in Delta State for families displaced by floods. If you need help, don’t hesitate to reach out.
Igbo: Òtù Red Cross nke Naịjirịa ewepụtala ebe mgbaba nwa oge na Delta Steeti maka ezinụlọ ndị ide mmiri ahụ chụpụrụ n'ụlọ ha. Ọ bụrụ na ị chọrọ enyemaka, e gbula oge ịkpọtụrụ anyị.
Hausa: Ƙungiyar Red Cross ta Najeriya ta kafa sansanonin gaggawa a Jihar Delta don iyalan da ambaliya ta raba da muhallansu. Idan kuna buƙatar taimako, ka nemi taimakonsu.
Yoruba: Ẹgbẹ́ Àgbélébùú Pupa Nàìjíríà ti ṣètò àwọn ilé ààbò fúngbà díẹ̀ ní ìpínlẹ̀ Delta fún àwọn ìdílé tí àkúnya omi ti kó kúrò ní ilé wọn. Tó o bá nílò ìrànlọ́wọ́, má ṣe lọ́ tìkọ̀ láti kàn sí wọn.

Source: Reports indicate that floodwaters in Bayelsa are receding, but residents are advised to remain cautious. Avoid contaminated water and seek medical care if you notice any health issues.
Igbo: Akụkọ na-egosi na ide mmiri na Bayelsa na-alaghachi azụ, mana a na-adụ ndị bi ọdụ ka ha kpachara anya. Zere ịṅụ mmiri e metọrọ emetọ, gakwurukwa dọkịta ma ọ bụrụ na ị chọpụta na ị na-arịa ọrịa.
Hausa: Rahotanni na nuna cewa ruwan ambaliya a Bayelsa yana raguwa, amma ana shawartar mazauna su ci gaba da kula. Guji ruwa da ya gurɓata kuma ku nemi kula ta lafiya idan kuka ga wata matsala ta lafiya.
Yoruba: Ìròyìn fi hàn pé omi tó ń ṣàn ní Bayelsa ti ń rọ̀, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn olùgbé ti gba ìkìlọ̀ láti ṣọ́ra. Yẹra fún omi tó ti di ẹlẹ́gbin, kó o sì lọ rí dókítà tó o bá rí i pé o níṣòro.

Source: If you notice cracks in your building after heavy rains, don’t ignore them. Report to local authorities or seek professional advice to avoid a potential collapse.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ị hụ na mgbidi ụlọ gị na-agbawa agbawa mgbe oké mmiri zoro, e legharala ya anya. Kpọọ ndị ọchịchị obodo maọbụ chọọ ndụmọdụ ndị ọkachamara iji zere ọdịda ọbụla.
Hausa: Idan kuka ga bango ya tsage bayan ruwan sama mai yawa, kada ku yi watsi da shi. Ka sanar da hukuma ko neman shawarar ƙwararre don guje wa rushewar gini.
Yoruba: Bí o bá rí àwọn àlàfo nínú ilé rẹ lẹ́yìn òjò líle, má ṣe gbójú fo wọn dá. O lè lọ sọ fún àwọn aláṣẹ àdúgbò tàbí kó o lọ gba ìmọ̀ràn lọ́dọ̀ àwọn ògbóǹkangí tó mọ̀ nípa ọ̀ràn náà kí o má bàa wó.

Source: Dust storms are expected in parts of Borno and Yobe. If you have respiratory issues, limit your outdoor activities and keep your home well-ventilated.
Igbo: A na-atụ anya na a ga-enwe oké ifufe uzuzu n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Borno na Yobe. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-arịa ọrịa iku ume, kwụsịlata ihe ndị ị na-eme n'èzí ma hụ na ikuku na-abanye n'ụlọ gị nke ọma.
Hausa: Ana sa ran guguwar ƙura a wasu yankunan Borno da Yobe. Idan kuna da matsalar numfashi, rage ayyukan waje, kuma ku bar iska mai kyau ta shiga gidanku.
Yoruba: A retí ìjì eruku ní àwọn apá ibì kan ní Borno àti Yobe. Tó o bá ní ìṣòro ẹ̀dọ̀fóró, dín ìgbòkègbodò rẹ níta kù, kó o sì jẹ́ kí ilé rẹ máa gba atẹ́gùn dáadáa.

Source: With fuel scarcity affecting some areas, the government advises caution when storing petrol at home. Keep it in safe containers and away from fire hazards.
Igbo: N'ihi ụkọ mmanụ ụgbọala na-emetụta ụfọdụ ebe, gọọmenti na-adụ ọdụ ịkpachara anya mgbe a na-echekwa mmanụ ụgbọala n'ụlọ. Debe ya n'ebe dị nchebe nakwa n'ebe ihe na-agba ọkụadịghị.
Hausa: Tare da ƙarancin man fetur a wasu yankunan, gwamnati na jan kunne idan za a adana shi a gida. Ka ajiye shi a cikin abin da ya dace kuma ku nisanta shi da wuta.
Yoruba: Níwọ̀n bí àìtó epo rọ̀bì ti ń nípa lórí àwọn àgbègbè kan, ìjọba ń fúnni nímọ̀ràn pé kí wọ́n ṣọ́ra nígbà tí wọ́n bá ń tọ́jú epo rọ̀bì pa mọ́ sílé. Má ṣe kó o sínú àwọn ohun èlò tí kò ní jẹ́ kó dáná, kó o sì kó o síbi tí iná kò ti lè jó.

Source: Flooded farmlands in Benue are causing food supply concerns. Farmers are encouraged to check with local agricultural offices for support and advice.
Igbo: Ala ugbo ndị ide mmiri na Benue na-akpata nchegbu maka nri. A na-agba ndị ọrụ ugbo ume ka ha jụọ ndị ọrụ ugbo nọ n'ógbè ha maka nkwado na ndụmọdụ.
Hausa: Gonakin da ambaliya ta lalata a Benue sun jawo ƙarancin abinci. Ana shawartar manoma su tuntuɓi ofisoshin malaman noma na cikin gida don neman taimako ko shawarwari.
Yoruba: Àwọn ilẹ̀ oko tí omi bò ní Benue ń fa ìdààmú fún ìpèsè oúnjẹ. A rọ àwọn àgbẹ̀ láti wádìí lọ́dọ̀ àwọn iléeṣẹ́ àgbẹ̀ tó wà ládùúgbò wọn fún ìrànlọ́wọ́ àti ìmọ̀ràn.

Source: The Nigerian Centre for Disease Control warns of a potential rise in malaria cases due to stagnant floodwaters. Sleep under mosquito nets and use insect repellents.
Igbo: Ụlọọrụ na-ahụ maka igbochi ọrịa na Naịjirịa na-adọ aka na ntị na ọrịa ịba nwere ike ịba ụba n'ihi oke mmiri. Na-ehi ụra n'ugbuanwụnta ma na-eji ọgwụ na-egbochi ahụhụ.
Hausa: Hukumar Kula da Cututtuka, NCDC, na gargaɗin yiwuwar ƙaruwar cutar malaria saboda ruwan ambaliya da ke tsaye wuri guda. Yi amfani da gidan sauro da maganin sauro.
Yoruba: Ibùdó Ìdènà Àrùn ní Nàìjíríà kìlọ̀ nípa bí iye àwọn tí àìsàn ibà ń ṣe ṣe lè máa pọ̀ sí i nítorí omi tó ń ṣàn lọ. O lè sùn lábẹ́ àwọ̀n tí wọ́n fi ń dènà ẹ̀fọn, o sì lè lo oògùn apakòkòrò.

Source: If you see fallen power lines after a storm, do not go near them. Report immediately to the power authorities for safe removal.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ị hụ ebe eriri eletrik dara mgbe oké ifufe fechara, agala nso n'ebe ha dị. Kpọtụrụ ndị ọchịchị ozugbo maka iwepụ ya n'enweghị nsogbu.
Hausa: Idan kuka ga wayarwuta ta faɗi bayan ruwa ko hadari, kada ka kusance su. Ka sanar da hukumar lantarki nan-da-nan don su cire su cikin aminci.
Yoruba: Tó o bá rí i pé òpó iná mànàmáná ti wó lulẹ̀ lẹ́yìn tí ìjì líle bá jà, má ṣe sún mọ́ ọn. Ẹ tètè lọ sọ fún àwọn aláṣẹ tó ń bójú tó ètò ìnáwó kí wọ́n lè gbé e kúrò.

Source: The weather forecast predicts strong thunderstorms in Abuja this weekend. If you’re planning outdoor activities, stay updated on the latest alerts.
Igbo: Ndị na-ahụ maka ihu igwe na-ekwu na a ga-enwe oke égbè eluigwe n'Abuja na ngwụcha izuụka a. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-atụ arọ ịrụ ọrụ n'èzí, mata ihe ndị ọhụrụ e kwuru.
Hausa: Hasashen yanayi na nuna cewa ana sa ran guguwar hadari mai ƙarfi a Abuja ƙarshen wannan mako. Idan kuna da shirin fita, ka saurari sabbin bayanai.
Yoruba: Àkọsílẹ̀ ojú-ọjọ́ sọ wípé ìjì líle yóò máa jà ní Abuja ní òpin ọ̀sẹ̀ yìí. Tó o bá ń gbèrò láti ṣe àwọn ìgbòkègbodò kan níta gbangba, rí i pé o mọ àwọn ìkìlọ̀ tó ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ jáde.

Source: High tides and strong waves have been reported along the coast of Rivers State. Avoid beach activities until conditions improve.
Igbo: A kọọla na ebili mmiri dị elu na ebili mmiri siri ike n'akụkụ ụsọ oké osimiri nke Rivers State. Zere ime ihe ndị a na-eme n'ụsọ oké osimiri ruo mgbe ọnọdụ dị mma.
Hausa: An bayyana hauhawar igiyoyin ruwa da guguwa mai ƙarfi a gaɓar Jihar Rivers. Ku guji wasanni a bakin teku har sai lamarin ya lafa.
Yoruba: A ti gbọ́ ìròyìn nípa ìgbì omi tó ga àti ìgbì omi tó lágbára ní etíkun Ìpínlẹ̀ Rivers. Má ṣe lọ sí etíkun títí dìgbà tí nǹkan á fi dáa.

Source: The Federal Road Safety Corps advises drivers to reduce speed during heavy rain. Wet roads can be dangerous, and accidents increase when visibility is low.
Igbo: Ndị Federal Road Safety Corps na-adụ ndị ọkwọ ụgbọala ọdụ ka ha belata ọsọ n'oge oke mmiri na-ezo. Okporo ụzọ ndị mmiri na-ezo pụrụ ịdị ize ndụ, ihe mberede na-arịkwa elu mgbe anaghị ahụ ụzọ nke ọma.
Hausa: Hukumar Kula da Hanyoyi ta Ƙasa, FRSC, na shawartar direbobi da rage gudu lokacin ruwan sama mai yawa. Jiƙaƙƙun hanyoyina da haɗari, kuma haɗurra na ƙaruwa idan ba a gani da kyau.
Yoruba: Ẹgbẹ́ Ààbò Ọ̀nà Àpapọ̀ rọ àwọn awakọ̀ láti dín iyara wọn kù nígbà òjò tó ń rọ̀. Àwọn ọ̀nà tó bá tutù lè léwu, àwọn jàǹbá sì máa ń pọ̀ sí i nígbà tí ojú ò bá fi bẹ́ẹ̀ hàn dáadáa.

Source: Reports of overflowing drainage systems in Enugu are rising. The state government is urging residents to clear their gutters to help prevent further flooding.
Igbo: Akụkọ na-ekwu na mmiri na-ejupụta na Enugu na-arị elu. Gọọmentị steeti ahụ na-arịọ ndị bi n'obodo ahụ ka ha kpochapụ ọwa mmiri ha iji gbochie ide mmiri ọzọ.
Hausa: Ana samun ƙarin rahotanni na magudanan ruwa da suka cika a Enugu. Gwamnatin jihar na roƙon jama’a su share magudanan ruwansu don daƙile ci gaban ambaliya.
Yoruba: Àwọn ìròyìn nípa àwọn ètò ìtọ́jú omi tó kún àkúnya ní Enugu ń pọ̀ sí i. Ìjọba ìpínlẹ̀ náà ń rọ àwọn aráàlú láti fọ àwọn ìkùdu wọn kí wọ́n lè dènà omíyalé mìíràn.

Source: Livestock farmers should prepare for drier-than-usual conditions in Zamfara. Ensure animals have enough water and shade during the heat.
Igbo: Ndị na-azụ anụmanụ kwesịrị ịkwado maka ọnọdụ kpọrọ nkụ karịa ka ọ na-adị na Zamfara. Jide n'aka na ụmụ anụmanụ nwere mmiri ga-ezuru ha na ndò n'oge okpomọkụ.
Hausa: Masu kiwon dabbobi su shirya don yanayi mai bushewa sama da yadda aka saba a Zamfara. Ku tabbata dabbobi na da wadataccen ruwa da inuwa mai kyau.
Yoruba: Awọn agbẹ ẹran yẹ ki o mura silẹ fun awọn ipo ti o gbẹ ju deede lọ ni Zamfara. Rí i dájú pé àwọn ẹranko náà ní omi àti ibòji tó pọ̀ tó nígbà tí ooru bá mú.

Source: If your home is near a riverbank, check for early signs of erosion. If you notice any, take action immediately or contact local authorities for help.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ụlọ gị dị nso n'akụkụ osimiri, legharịa anya ka ị mara ma ọ̀ ga-emebi n'oge na-adịghị anya. Ọ bụrụ na ị chọpụta nke ọbụla, mee ihe ozugbo maọbụ kpọtụrụ ndị ọchịchị obodo maka enyemaka.
Hausa: Idan kuna kusa da bakin kogi, Ku duba alamun zaizayar ƙasa. Idan kuka gani, ka ɗauki mataki da wuri ko ka kira hukuma.
Yoruba: Tó bá jẹ́ pé etí odò ni ilé rẹ wà, rí i dájú pé kò sí àmì pé ilẹ̀ ti ba odò náà jẹ́. Tó o bá kíyè sí èyíkéyìí lára wọn, tètè gbé ìgbésẹ̀ tàbí kó o kàn sí àwọn aláṣẹ àdúgbò fún ìrànlọ́wọ́.

Source: Port Harcourt residents are advised to prepare for heavy downpours this week. Have a plan in place in case of unexpected flooding.
Igbo: A na-adụ ndị bi na Port Harcourt ọdụ ka ha kwadebe maka nnukwu mmiri ozuzo n'izu a. Tụọ arọ n'oge ma ọ bụrụ na ide mmiri bia na mberede.
Hausa: Ana shawartar mazauna Port Harcourt su shirya don ruwan sama mai yawa a wannan makon. Ka tanadi mataki idan ambaliya ta zo a bazata.
Yoruba: A gba awọn olugbe Port Harcourt nimọran lati mura silẹ fun ojo nla ni ọsẹ yii. Mọ ohun tó o lè ṣe tó bá ṣẹlẹ̀ pé omíyalé bá dé lójijì.

Source: NiMet warns that extreme heat will persist across the country. Drink plenty of water and avoid prolonged outdoor activities.
Igbo: NiMet na-adọ aka na ntị na oke okpomọkụ ga-adịgide na mba ahụ. Na-aṅụ mmiri nke ọma, e meekwala ihe ọbụla ga-eme ka ị nọrọ ọtụtụ oge n'èzí.
Hausa: NiMet na gargaɗin cewa zafi mai tsanani zai ci gaba a faɗin ƙasa. Ku sha ruwa da yawa kuma ku guji aiki a rana sosai.
Yoruba: NiMet kìlọ̀ pé ooru líle yóò máa wà káàkiri orílẹ̀-èdè náà. Máa mu omi dáadáa, má sì ṣe máa lo ọ̀pọ̀ wákàtí níta.

Source: Reports indicate that blocked drainage systems in Ibadan are worsening the flooding problem. Community efforts to clear debris can help reduce risks.
Igbo: Akụkọ na-egosi na uso mmiri mechiri emechi n'Ibadan na-eme ka nsogbu ide mmiri ka njọ. Mbọ ndị obodo na-agba iji kpochapụ ahịhịa ndị a nwere ike inye aka belata ihe ize ndụ ndị e nwere.
Hausa: Rahotanni sun nuna magudanan ruwa da ke toshewa a Ibadan na ƙara tsananta matsalar ambaliya. Aikin al’umma na share datti na iya rage haɗari.
Yoruba: Ìròyìn fi hàn pé àwọn ọ̀nà tí omi ń gbà ṣàn tí wọ́n ti dí ní Ibadan ń dá kún ìṣòro omíyalé náà. Ìsapá táwọn aráàlú ń ṣe láti palẹ̀ àwọn àlàfo tó wà níbẹ̀ mọ́ lè dín ewu tó wà níbẹ̀ kù.

Source: Kwara State has recorded unusually strong winds in recent weeks. Secure rooftops and windows to prevent damage to property.
Igbo: Steeti Kwara enwetala ifufe siri ike na-adịbeghị anya n'izuụka ndị gara aga. Kpuchie ụlọ na windo ka ngwongwo gị ghara imebi.
Hausa: Jihar Kwara na fuskantar iska mai ƙarfi a 'yan makonnin nan. Ku tabbatar da lafiyar rufin gini da tagogi don gujewa lalacewar kaya.
Yoruba: Ìpínlẹ̀ Kwara ti ṣe àkọsílẹ̀ afẹ́fẹ́ líle tí kò wọ́pọ̀ ní àwọn ọ̀sẹ̀ tó kọjá. Fi àwọn òrùlé àti fèrèsé mọ́lẹ̀ kó o má bàa ba ohun ìní jẹ́.

Source: If you experience dizziness or exhaustion while working under the sun, take immediate breaks and rehydrate. Heatstroke is dangerous and can be life-threatening.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ajụ na-ebu gị maọbụ na ike na-agwụ gị mgbe ị na-arụ ọrụ n'anwụ, kwụsị ozugbo ma ṅụọ mmiri. Ọrịa anwụ dị ize ndụ, ọ pụkwara igbu mmadụ.
Hausa: Idan kuka fara jin jiri ko kasala yayin aiki a cikin rana, ka dakata nan-da-nan ka huta kuma ku sha ruwa. Zafi mai tsanani na da haɗari kuma yana iya jefa rayuwa cikin haɗari.
Yoruba: Bó o bá rí i pé ó máa ń ṣe ọ́ bíi pé o fẹ́ máa ṣarán tàbí pé ó máa ń rẹ̀ ọ́ gan-an nígbà tó o bá ń ṣiṣẹ́ lábẹ́ oòrùn, tètè sinmi díẹ̀ kó o sì tún mu omi tó pọ̀. Ó léwu gan-an téèyàn bá ní ìsun ooru, ó sì lè gbẹ̀mí ẹni.

Source: The rising heat is increasing the risk of dehydration among children. Parents are encouraged to ensure kids drink enough water throughout the day.
Igbo: Okpomọkụ na-arị elu na-eme ka ụmụaka kpọnwụọ. A na-agba ndị nne na nna ume ịhụ na ụmụ ha na-aṅụ mmiri kwesịrị ekwesị n'ụbọchị.
Hausa: Zafin wanda ke ƙaruwa na ƙara haɗarin ƙarancin ruwan jiki ga yara. Iyaye su tabbatar da cewa yara na shan ruwa sosai a cikin duku yini.
Yoruba: Ooru tó ń pọ̀ sí i yìí ń mú kí ewu kí omi gbẹ àwọn ọmọdé pọ̀ sí i. A gba àwọn òbí níyànjú láti rí i dájú pé àwọn ọmọ ń mu omi tó tó lójúmọ́.

Source: The National Orientation Agency is urging communities to take flood warnings seriously. Relocate early if your area is at risk instead of waiting for the worst.
Igbo: Ụlọọrụ National Orientation Agency na-agba ndị obodo ume ka ha ghara iwere ọkwa gbasara ide mmiri ka egwuregwu. Ọ bụrụ na e nwere ihe ize ndụ n'ebe i bi, buru ụzọ kwaga ebe ọzọ kama ichere ka ihe ka njọ mee.
Hausa: Hukumar NOA na roƙon jama’a su ɗauki gargaɗin ambaliya da muhimmanci. Ka koma wuri mai aminci da wuri idan yankinku na cikin haɗari, madadin tsayawa har sai ta ɓaci.
Yoruba: Ilé-iṣẹ́ Ìsọfúnni fún Orílẹ̀-èdè ń rọ àwọn aráàlú láti fọwọ́ pàtàkì mú ìkìlọ̀ nípa omíyalé. Tó bá jẹ́ pé àgbègbè tí o ń gbé léwu, tètè lọ síbòmíì dípò tí wàá fi dúró de ohun tó lè ṣẹlẹ̀.

Source: Unusual weather conditions have led to an increase in crop pests in some regions. Farmers should monitor their fields and seek guidance on pest control.
Igbo: Ọnọdụ ihu igwe anaghị ahụkebe emeela ka ihe nripịa nke ihe ọkụkụ mụbaa n'ógbè ụfọdụ. Ndị ọrụ ugbo kwesịrị ileba anya n'ubi ha ma chọọ nduzi n'ịchịkwa ihe nripịa a.
Hausa: Sauyin yanayi wanda ba a saba gani ba ya haifar da ƙaruwar ƙwari masu lalata amfanin gona. Manoma su sa ido a gonakinsu kuma su tuntuɓi masu ba da shawara kan kula da ƙwarin gona.
Yoruba: Àwọn ipò ojú ọjọ́ tí kò bára dé ti mú kí àwọn kòkòrò tó ń ba irè oko jẹ́ pọ̀ sí i láwọn àgbègbè kan. Àwọn àgbẹ̀ gbọ́dọ̀ máa ṣọ́ oko wọn kí wọ́n sì máa wá ìtọ́sọ́nà lórí bí wọ́n ṣe lè gbógun ti àwọn kòkòrò.

Source: There has been a rise in cases of electrical fires due to power fluctuations during storms. Unplug devices during thunderstorms to avoid damage.
Igbo: E nweela mmụba nke ọkụ eletrik n'ihi mgbanwe ike n'oge oké ifufe. Wepụ ngwaọrụ gị dị n'ọkụ n'oge égbè eluigwe iji zere mmebi.
Hausa: An samu ƙaruwar gobarar lantarki saboda rashin daidaiton wuta yayin hadari. Ka cire na’urori daga soket idan hadari ya zo domin kare lalacewar abubuwa.
Yoruba: Àìmọye ìgbà ni iná mànàmáná máa ń jó nígbà tí ìjì bá ń jà. Yọ àwọn ohun èlò náà kúrò nígbà tí ààrá bá ń sán, kó o má bàa bà á jẹ́.

Source: The Nigerian Hydrological Services Agency has confirmed that river levels are rising faster than expected. If you live close to a river, prepare for possible evacuation.
Igbo: Ụlọọrụ na-ahụ maka mmiri na Naịjirịa ekwuola na mmiri na-arị elu karịa ka a tụrụ anya ya. Ọ bụrụ na ị bi nso n'osimiri, kwado ịpụ ozugbo.
Hausa: Hukumar Kula da Ruwa ta Najeriya, NHSA, ta tabbatar da cewa yawan ruwa a koguna na hauhawa fiye da yadda aku yi tsammani. Idan kuna kusa da kogi, ka shirya ƙaura.
Yoruba: Ajọ to n ri si ọrọ omi ni Naijiria ti fidi rẹ mulẹ pe omi odo n sare sii ju bi wọn ṣe n reti lọ. Tó o bá ń gbé nítòsí odò, múra sílẹ̀ de ìgbà tí wọ́n bá fẹ́ kó o kúrò níbẹ̀.

Source: If you use a generator for power during floods, ensure it's placed in a well-ventilated area to prevent carbon monoxide poisoning.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ị na-eji igwe na-enye ọkụ n'oge ide mmiri, hụ na e debere ya n'ebe ikuku na-eru nke ọma iji gbochie kemikal kabon monokzide.
Hausa: Idan kuna amfani da janareto wurin samun wuta lokacin ambaliya, Ku tabbata ka sanya shi a wuri mai iska don guje wa guba ta carbon monoxide.
Yoruba: Tó o bá ń lo ẹ̀rọ amúnáwá láti pèsè agbára nígbà tí omíyalé bá ń jà, rí i dájú pé ibi tó ní ẹ̀fúùfù tó dáa ni wọ́n gbé e sí, kó má bàa di pé èéfín carbon monoxide máa ràn ẹ́.

Source: Heavy rainfall is expected in Kano over the next 48 hours.
Igbo: A na-atụ anya nnukwu mmiri ozuzo na Kano n'ime awa iri anọ na asatọ na-abịa.
Hausa: Ana sa ran ruwan sama mai yawa a Kano cikin awanni 48 masu zuwa.
Yoruba: A nireti òjò ńlá ní Kano ní wákàtí méjìdínlọ́gọ́rin tó ń bọ̀.

Source: Residents in flood-prone areas should move to higher ground.
Igbo: Ndị bi n'ebe na-enwekarị ide mmiri kwesịrị ịkwaga n'ebe ndị dị elu.
Hausa: Mazauna yankunan da ke da yiwuwar samun ambaliya su koma wuri mai tudu.
Yoruba: Ó yẹ kí àwọn tó ń gbé láwọn àgbègbè tí omíyalé lè ṣẹlẹ̀ sí kó lọ síbi tó ga.

Source: Flooding is likely in Sokoto as rivers continue to rise.
Igbo: Ide mmiri na-adịkarị na Sokoto dịka osimiri na-arị elu.
Hausa: Ana sa ran ambaliya a Sokoto yayin da ruwan koguna ke ci gaba da hauhawa.
Yoruba: Ìkún omi lè wáyé ní Sokoto bí àwọn odò ṣe ń pọ̀ sí i.

Source: Strong winds and heavy rainfall may cause severe flooding.
Igbo: Oké ifufe na oké mmiri ozuzo pụrụ ịkpata oké ide mmiri.
Hausa: Iska mai ƙarfi da ruwan sama mai yawa na iya haddasa mummunar ambaliya.
Yoruba: Ẹ̀fúùfù líle àti òjò tó máa ń rọ̀ lè fa omíyalé tó lágbára.

Source: The Nigerian Meteorological Agency has issued a flood alert for Jigawa.
Igbo: Ụlọọrụ na-ahụ maka ọnọdụ ihu igwe na Naịjirịa ewepụtala ọkwa ide mmiri na Jigawa.
Hausa: Hukumar Kula da Yanayi ta Najeriya, NiMet, ta fitar da gargaɗin yiwuwar ambaliya a jihar Jigawa.
Yoruba: Ajọ to n ri si oju ojo lorilẹ-ede Naijiria ti kede pe omi le ru ni ilu Jigawa.

Source: Avoid crossing flooded roads to prevent accidents.
Igbo: Zere ịgafe okporo ụzọ ndị ide mmiri jupụtara iji zere ihe mberede.
Hausa: Ku guji ƙetare tituna da ambaliya ta mamaye don kauce wa haɗari.
Yoruba: Má ṣe gba ojú ọ̀nà tó ti kún fún omi kọjá kó o má bàa ṣe jàǹbá.

Source: Farmers should take precautions as heavy rains may damage crops.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ ugbo kwesịrị ịkpachara anya n'ihi na oke mmiri ozuzo nwere ike imebi ihe ọkụkụ.
Hausa: Manoma su ɗauki matakan kariya domin ruwan sama mai yawa na iya lalata amfanin gona.
Yoruba: Àwọn àgbẹ̀ ní láti ṣọ́ra nítorí òjò líle lè ba àwọn irè oko jẹ́.

Source: People living near riverbanks should be ready for possible evacuation.
Igbo: Ndị bi n'akụkụ osimiri kwesịrị ịdị njikere maka ịpụ ozugbo.
Hausa: Mutanen da ke zaune kusa da gaɓar kogi su kasance cikin shiri don yiwuwar ƙaura.
Yoruba: Ó yẹ kí àwọn tó ń gbé nítòsí odò múra sílẹ̀ de ìgbà tí wọ́n bá fẹ́ kó wọn kúrò níbẹ̀.

Source: Flash floods are possible due to continuous heavy rainfall.
Igbo: ide mmiri nwere ike ịbịa n'ike n'ike n'ihi oke mmiri ozuzo na-aga n'ihu.
Hausa: Ana iya samun ambaliya ta bazata sakamakon ruwan sama mai yawa da ke ci gaba.
Yoruba: Ìkún omi òjijì lè wáyé nítorí òjò ńlá tó ń rọ̀.

Source: Emergency services are on standby to assist flood victims.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ enyemaka mberede dị njikere inyere ndị ide mmiri metụtara aka.
Hausa: Ma’aikatan gaggawa na cikin shiri don taimaka wa waɗanda ambaliya ta shafa.
Yoruba: Àwọn ẹ̀ka ètò pàjáwìrì ti wà ní ìmúrasílẹ̀ láti ṣèrànwọ́ fún àwọn tí àkúnya omi náà pa.

Source: The water level in the Kaduna River is rising rapidly.
Igbo: Mmiri na-arị elu n'osimiri Kaduna n'ike n'ike.
Hausa: Ruwa a Kogin Kaduna na hauhawa cikin sauri.
Yoruba: Omi Odò Kaduna ń yára ga sí i.

Source: Floodwaters may submerge roads and farmlands in Borno.
Igbo: Ide mmiri nwere ike ikpuchi okporo ụzọ na ala ndị a na-akọ ugbo na Borno.
Hausa: Ruwan ambaliya na iya mamaye hanyoyi da gonaki a Borno.
Yoruba: Ìkún omi lè bo àwọn ọ̀nà àti ilẹ̀ oko ní Borno.

Source: Heavy rains in the coming days may cause landslides in northern states.
Igbo: Oké mmiri ozuzo n'ụbọchị na-abịanụ nwere ike ibute mbutu ihe na steeti dị na ugwu.
Hausa: Ruwan sama mai yawa a kwanaki masu zuwa na iya haddasa zabtarewar ƙasa a jihohin Arewa.
Yoruba: Òjò líle tó máa rọ̀ láwọn ọjọ́ tó ń bọ̀ lè mú kí ilẹ̀ rọ̀ láwọn ìpínlẹ̀ tó wà lápá àríwá.

Source: The government urges citizens to stay alert for weather updates.
Igbo: Gọọmentị na-arịọ ụmụ amaala ka ha nọrọ na nche maka ihe ndị ga-eme na ihu igwe.
Hausa: Gwamnati na kira ga jama’a da su kasance masu sauraron sabbin bayanai kan yanayi.
Yoruba: Ìjọba rọ àwọn aráàlú láti wà lójúfò fún àtúnṣe ojú-ọjọ.

Source: Floodwaters may cut off major roads, causing travel disruptions.
Igbo: ide mmiri nwere ike imechi okporo ụzọ ndị dị mkpa ma mee ka ndị mmadụ ghara inwe ike ime njem.
Hausa: Ruwan ambaliya na iya yanke manyan hanyoyi, wanda zai haifar da cikas a tafiye-tafiye.
Yoruba: Omi tó ń dà bọ̀ lè dí àwọn ọ̀nà ńláńlá lọ́wọ́, èyí sì lè mú kí ìrìn àjò èèyàn má rọrùn.

Source: Expect thunderstorms and torrential rains in Adamawa.
Igbo: Na-atụ anya igwe ojii na oke mmiri na Adamawa.
Hausa: A sa ran samun guguwar hadari da ruwan sama mai ƙarfi a Adamawa.
Yoruba: A retí ìjì ààrá àti òjò ńlá ní Adamawa.

Source: Drainage systems should be cleared to prevent urban flooding.
Igbo: A ghaghị ikpochapụ usoro mmiri iji gbochie ide mmiri n'obodo ukwu.
Hausa: A share magudanan ruwa don kauce wa ambaliya a cikin birane.
Yoruba: Ó yẹ kí wọ́n fọ àwọn ibi tí omi ti ń ṣàn kúrò kí omi má bàa bo ìlú.

Source: Rising water levels in Yobe threaten local settlements.
Igbo: Mmiri na-arị elu na Yobe na-eyi ndị bi na ya egwu.
Hausa: Hauhawar ruwa a Yobe na barazana ga mazauna yankunan.
Yoruba: Omi tó ń lọ sókè ní Yobe ń halẹ̀ mọ́ àwọn ìlú tó wà ládùúgbò.

Source: The Red Cross is preparing to provide relief to affected families.
Igbo: Red Cross na-akwado inye enyemaka nye ezinụlọ ndị ahụ ọdachi ahụ metụtara.
Hausa: Ƙungiyar agaji ta Red Cross na shirin tallafa wa iyalan da ambaliya ta shafa.
Yoruba: Ẹgbẹ́ Àgbélébùú Pupa ti ń gbára dì láti pèsè ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún àwọn ẹbí tí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà kàn.

Source: Flood victims are advised to seek shelter in designated safe zones.
Igbo: A na-adụ ndị ide mmiri metụtara ọdụ ka ha chọọ ebe mgbaba n'ebe ndị e wepụtara maka nchekwa.
Hausa: Ana shawartar waɗanda ambaliya ta shafa su nemi mafaka a amintattun wuraren da aka ware.
Yoruba: A gba àwọn tí àkúnya omi bá nímọ̀ràn láti wá ibi ìsádi lọ sí àwọn àgbègbè tí ààbò wà.

Source: Keep emergency supplies ready in case of unexpected flooding.
Igbo: Kwadobe ihe ndị e ji enyere ndị nọ ná mkpa aka ma e nwee ide mmiri a na-atụghị anya.
Hausa: Ka tanadi kayayyakin gaggawa ko da ambaliya za ta zo ba zato ba tsammani.
Yoruba: Múra àwọn ohun èlò pàjáwìrì sílẹ̀ fún ìgbà tí òjò bá rọ̀.

Source: Damaged bridges may become impassable due to strong water currents.
Igbo: E nweghị ike ịgafe àkwà mmiri ndị mebiri emebi n'ihi ebili mmiri siri ike.
Hausa: Gadojin da suka lalace na iya zama waɗanda ba za a iya bi ba saboda ƙarfin ruwan ambaliya.
Yoruba: Àwọn afárá tó ti bà jẹ́ lè di èyí tí kò ṣeé gbà kọjá nítorí omi tó ń ṣàn lọ́nà tó lágbára.

Source: Livestock owners should relocate animals away from flood zones.
Igbo: Ndị na-akpa anụmanụ kwesịrị ibuga anụmanụ ha n'ebe a naghị enwe ide mmiri.
Hausa: Masu kiwon dabbobi su matsar da dabbobinsu daga yankunan da ake ambaliya.
Yoruba: Ó yẹ kí àwọn tó ni ẹran ọ̀sìn kó àwọn ẹran ọ̀sìn wọn kúrò ní àwọn àgbègbè tí omíyalé ti ń jà.

Source: Heavy rainfall warnings have been issued for Katsina and Zamfara.
Igbo: A dọọla ndị nọ na Katsina na Zamfara aka na ntị maka oke mmiri ozuzo.
Hausa: An fitar da gargaɗin samuwar ruwan sama mai yawa a Katsina da Zamfara.
Yoruba: A ti fi ìkìlọ̀ nípa òjò ńlá fún Katsina àti Zamfara.

Source: Schools in flood-risk areas are advised to suspend activities.
Igbo: A gwara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ebe a na-enwe ide mmiri ka ha kwụsị ihe ọbụla ha na-eme.
Hausa: Makarantu da ke yankunan da ke fuskantar barazanar ambaliya su dakatar da ayyukansu na wucin gadi.
Yoruba: A gba awọn ile-iwe ni awọn agbegbe ti o lewu fun iṣan omi ni imọran lati dẹkun awọn iṣẹ.

Source: Motorists should drive with caution due to waterlogged roads.
Igbo: Ndị na-akwọ ụgbọala kwesịrị iji nwayọ na-akwọ ụgbọala n'ihi na mmiri jupụtara n'okporo ụzọ.
Hausa: Ya kamata direbobi su yi tuƙi a hankali saboda hanyoyin da ruwa ya mamaye.
Yoruba: Ó yẹ kí àwọn awakọ̀ wakọ̀ pẹ̀lú ìṣọ́ra nítorí àwọn ojú ọ̀nà tí omi ti kún.

Source: Do not attempt to walk or drive through moving floodwaters.
Igbo: A gaala ije maọbụ jiri ụgbọala na-aga n'ebe mmiri na-asọ asọ.
Hausa: Kada ku yi ƙoƙarin tafiya ko tuƙa mota cikin ruwan ambaliya mai tafiya.
Yoruba: Má ṣe rin tàbí wakọ̀ lọ sínú òkun tó ń ṣàn.

Source: The government is monitoring the situation and will provide updates.
Igbo: Gọọmentị na-enyocha ọnọdụ ahụ ma kwukwa ihe ọzọ a ga-eme.
Hausa: Gwamnati na sa ido kan halin da ake ciki, kuma za ta ci gaba da bayar da bayani.
Yoruba: Ijọba n tọpinpin ipo naa ati pe yoo pese awọn imudojuiwọn.

Source: Flash flood alerts remain active across multiple states.
Igbo: E nyeela ozi gbasara ide mmiri ugboro ugboro n'ọtụtụ steeti.
Hausa: Gargaɗin ambaliya ta bazata yana nan a jihohi da dama.
Yoruba: Ìkìlọ̀ nípa ìkún omi òjijì ṣì wà ní ìgbésẹ̀ ní àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ bíi mélòó kan.

Source: Prepare for possible evacuations as rain continues to fall.
Igbo: Kwado maka ịpụ ozugbo ma ọ bụrụ na mmiri akwụsịghị.
Hausa: Ka shirya yiwuwar ƙaura yayin da ruwan sama ke ci gaba da zuba.
Yoruba: Ẹ gbára dì fún ìsádi tó ṣeé ṣe bí òjò ṣe ń bá a lọ.

Source: Flood-affected families will receive food and medical assistance.
Igbo: A ga-enye ezinụlọ ndị ide mmiri ahụ metụtara nri na enyemaka ahụike.
Hausa: Iyalan da ambaliya ta shafa za su samu abinci da magani.
Yoruba: Àwọn ìdílé tí àkúnya omi náà kàn yóò rí oúnjẹ àti ìrànlọ́wọ́ ìṣègùn gbà.

Source: Deforestation contributes significantly to extreme weather events, affecting global biodiversity.
Igbo: Mkpochapụ oké ọhịa na-eme ka oké ifufe na-akpa ike, na-emetụta ihe ndị dị ndụ n'ụwa.
Hausa: Sare itacen dazuka na da tasiri mai yawa wajen haddasa sauyin yanayi, wanda hakan ke shafar nau’in halittu a duniya.
Yoruba: Pípa igbó run ló ń fa àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ojú ọjọ́ tó burú jáì, èyí tó ń ṣàkóbá fún onírúurú ohun alààyè tó wà láyé.

Source: Scientists warn that rising sea levels could lead to more extreme weather patterns.
Igbo: Ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị ekwuola na ogo osimiri a na abawanye nwere ike ibute ọnọdụ ihu igwe na-akawanye njọ.
Hausa: Masana kimiyya sun yi gargaɗi cewa hauhawar matakin ruwa na iya janyo sauyin yanayi mai tsanani.
Yoruba: Àwọn onímọ̀ sáyẹ́ǹsì kìlọ̀ pé bí òkun ṣe ń ga sí i lè mú kí ojú ọjọ́ túbọ̀ le koko sí i.

Source: The rapid melting of Arctic ice is a clear sign of rising sea levels.
Igbo: Mmiri a kpụkọrọ akpụkọ na-agbaze ngwa ngwa n'Arctic bụ ihe a mara doro anya na ogo osimiri na-arị.
Hausa: Yawan saurin narkewar ƙanƙara a Arctic alamar hauhawar matakin teku ne.
Yoruba: Bí yìnyín tó wà ní Àríwá Òkun Àríwá ṣe ń yọ́ yára jẹ́ àmì tó ṣe kedere pé omi òkun ti ń lọ sókè.

Source: Public awareness campaigns about renewable energy have increased in recent years.
Igbo: Mgbasa ozi ọhanaeze banyere ume ọhụrụ amụbawo n'afọ ndị gara aga.
Hausa: Gangamin wayar da ku kan makamashi mai sabuntuwa ya ƙaru a 'yan shekarun nan.
Yoruba: Láwọn ọdún àìpẹ́ yìí, ọ̀pọ̀ èèyàn ló ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí í wá bí wọ́n á ṣe máa sọ fún àwọn èèyàn pé kí wọ́n máa lo àwọn ohun àmúṣagbára tí wọ́n lè mú lò.

Source: Recent studies show a significant rise in deforestation due to human activities.
Igbo: Nnyocha ndị e mere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na-egosi oke mgbutu osisi n'ihi omume mmadụ.
Hausa: Bincike na baya-bayan nan ya nuna ƙaruwa sosai a sare dazuka sakamakon ayyukan ɗan adam.
Yoruba: Àwọn ìwádìí tí wọ́n ṣe lẹ́nu àìpẹ́ yìí fi hàn pé àwọn èèyàn ń pa igbó run gan-an.

Source: Communities are adopting extreme weather events to mitigate environmental damage.
Igbo: Obodo dị iche iche na-eji oke omume ọnọdụ ihu igwe eme ihe iji belata mmebi a na-emebi na gburugburu ebe obibi.
Hausa: Al’umma na rungumar shirye-shiryen sauyin yanayi mai tsanani don rage illa ga muhalli.
Yoruba: Àwọn aráàlú ń lo àwọn nǹkan tí ojú ọjọ́ máa ń mú kí ó burú láti dín ìpalára tó ń ṣe fún àyíká kù.

Source: Public awareness campaigns about heat waves have increased in recent years.
Igbo: Mgbasa ozi ndị a na-eme iji mee ka ọhanaeze mara banyere oké okpomọkụ amụbawo n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya.
Hausa: Gangamin wayar da ku kan zafin rana mai tsanani ya ƙaru a 'yan shekarun nan.
Yoruba: Láwọn ọdún àìpẹ́ yìí, ọ̀pọ̀ èèyàn ló ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí í ṣe ìpolongo nípa ooru tó máa ń mú ganrínganrín.

Source: Deforestation contributes significantly to renewable energy, affecting global biodiversity.
Igbo: Osisi a na-egbutu na-eme ka a na-enweta ike a ga-eji mee ihe ọzọ, na-emetụtakwa ihe ndị dịgasị iche iche dị n'ụwa niile.
Hausa: Sare itacen dazuka na da tasiri sosai ga makamashi mai sabuntuwa, wanda hakan yana shafar nau’in halittu a duniya.
Yoruba: Pípa igbó run máa ń jẹ́ kí agbára tí wọ́n lè mú jáde látinú àwọn ohun àmúṣagbára míì pọ̀ sí i, èyí sì máa ń ṣàkóbá fún onírúurú ohun alààyè tó wà láyé.

Source: The impact of solar power on marine ecosystems is becoming more evident.
Igbo: Mmetụta ike anwụ na-enwe n'ebe ihe ndị dị n'oké osimiri dị na-apụtawanye ìhè.
Hausa: Tasirin makamashin hasken rana ga halittu na cikin teku yana ƙara bayyana.
Yoruba: Ipa tí agbára oòrùn ń ní lórí àwọn ohun alààyè inú òkun túbọ̀ ń hàn kedere sí i.

Source: The rapid melting of Arctic ice is a clear sign of wind energy.
Igbo: Ịgbaze nke ice ndị dị n'Arctic n'ike n'ike bụ ihe a mara doro anya nke ike ifufe.
Hausa: Saurin narkewar ƙanƙarar yankin Arctic alamar makamashin iska ce.
Yoruba: Bí yìnyín tó wà ní Àríwá Òkun Àríwá ṣe ń yọ́ yára jẹ́ ẹ̀rí tó ṣe kedere pé afẹ́fẹ́ ń ṣiṣẹ́.

Source: Scientists warn that global warming could lead to more extreme weather patterns.
Igbo: Ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị ekwuola na okpomọkụ a na-enwe n'ụwa niile nwere ike ime ka ọnọdụ ihu igwe kawanye njọ.
Hausa: Malaman kimiyya sun yi gargaɗi cew aɗumamar yanayi na iya janyo sauyin yanayi mai tsanani.
Yoruba: Àwọn onímọ̀ sáyẹ́ǹsì kìlọ̀ pé bí ayé ṣe ń móoru sí i lè mú kí ojú ọjọ́ túbọ̀ burú sí i.

Source: Many cities are now investing in carbon emissions as an alternative energy source.
Igbo: Ọtụtụ obodo mepere emepe na-etinye ego ugbua n'imepụta kabọn dị ka isi ike ọzọ.
Hausa: Yawancin birane yanzu na zuba kuɗaɗe a fitar da hayakin carbon a matsayin hanyar makamashi madadin.
Yoruba: Ọ̀pọ̀ ìlú ló ti ń wá bí wọ́n á ṣe máa lo àwọn ohun tó ń mú èéfín jáde láti mú kí iná mànàmáná máa ṣiṣẹ́ dáadáa.

Source: The impact of carbon emissions on marine ecosystems is becoming more evident.
Igbo: Mmetụta ikuku carbon na-enwe n'ebe ihe ndị dị n'oké osimiri dị na-apụtawanye ìhè.
Hausa: Tasirin fitar da hayaƙin carbon ga halittun ruwa yana ƙara bayyana.
Yoruba: Àwọn ohun tí èéfín carbon ń tú jáde nínú òkun ti ń ṣàkóbá fún àwọn ohun tó wà nínú òkun.

Source: The impact of ocean acidification on marine ecosystems is becoming more evident.
Igbo: Mmetụta kemịkal e nwere n'osimiri na-apụta ìhè.
Hausa: Tasirin yawan sinadarin asid na teku ga halittun ruwa yana ƙara bayyana.
Yoruba: Àwọn ohun tó ń ṣẹlẹ̀ nínú òkun yìí ń ṣàkóbá fún àwọn ohun tó wà nínú rẹ̀ gan-an.

Source: Increased rainfall in Bauchi could worsen existing flood conditions.
Igbo: Mmụba nke mmiri ozuzo na Bauchi nwere ike ime ka ọnọdụ ide mmiri dị ugbua ka njọ.
Hausa: Yawan ruwan sama a Bauchi na iya ƙara tsananta matsalar ambaliya da ake fama da ita.
Yoruba: Òjò tó ń rọ̀ nílùú Bauchi lè mú kí àkúnya omi tó wà báyìí burú sí i.

Source: The impact of climate change is leading to more frequent floods.
Igbo: Mmetụta mgbanwe ihu igwe na-eduga n'ọtụtụ ide mmiri.
Hausa: Tasirin sauyin yanayi na janyo yawan ambaliya a ku a ku.
Yoruba: Ìpalára tí àyípadà ojú-ọjọ́ ń fà ń fa omíyalé tó ń wáyé léraléra.

Source: Residents should reinforce homes against potential flood damage.
Igbo: Ndị bi n'ebe ahụ kwesịrị ịkwado ụlọ ha ka ide mmiri ghara imebi ha.
Hausa: Ya kamata mazauna su ƙarfafa gidajensu don guje wa ɓarnar ambaliya.
Yoruba: Ó yẹ kí àwọn aráàlú ṣe àwọn nǹkan tó máa dáàbò bo ilé wọn lọ́wọ́ àkúnya omi tó lè ṣẹlẹ̀.

Source: Parents should ensure children stay indoors during storms.
Igbo: Ndị nne na nna kwesịrị ịhụ na ụmụ ha nọ n'ime ụlọ n'oge oke ifufe.
Hausa: Ya kamata iyaye su tabbatar da cewa yara suna zaune a cikin gida lokacin guguwar hadari.
Yoruba: Àwọn òbí gbọ́dọ̀ rí i dájú pé àwọn ọmọ wọn wà nínú ilé nígbà tí ìjì bá ń jà.

Source: The military is assisting with flood rescue operations.
Igbo: Ndị agha na-enye aka n'ọrụ nnapụta maka ide mmiri.
Hausa: Sojoji na taimakawa wajen aikin ceto yayin ambaliya.
Yoruba: Àwọn ológun ń ṣèrànwọ́ nínú iṣẹ́ ìpamọ́ nígbà ìkún omi.

Source: Travelers are advised to postpone trips to high-risk areas.
Igbo: A na-adụ ndị njem ọdụ ka ha ghara ịga ebe ndị nwere nnukwu ihe ize ndụ.
Hausa: Ana ba matafiya shawarar su ɗaga tafiye-tafiyensu na zuwa yankuna masu haɗari.
Yoruba: A gba àwọn arìnrìn-àjò níyànjú láti sún ìrìn àjò wọn síwájú sí àwọn àgbègbè tí ewu pọ̀ sí.

Source: Heavy downpours are expected to persist for the next three days.
Igbo: A na-atụ anya na mmiri ga-ezo nke ukwuu ruo ụbọchị atọ na-abịa.
Hausa: Ana sa ran ruwan sama mai yawa zai ci gaba har tsawon kwanaki uku masu zuwa.
Yoruba: Òjò líle ni wọ́n ń retí pé yóò máa rọ̀ fún ọjọ́ mẹ́ta tó ń bọ̀.

Source: Farmers should store grains in dry locations to avoid spoilage.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ ugbo kwesịrị ịchekwa ọka n'ebe kpọrọ nkụ iji zere imebi ya.
Hausa: Ya kamata manoma su adana hatsi a wurare busassu don guje wa lalacewa.
Yoruba: Àwọn àgbẹ̀ gbọ́dọ̀ tọ́jú ọkà wọn sí ibi tó gbẹ kí wọ́n má bàa bà jẹ́.

Source: The health ministry warns of waterborne diseases after flooding.
Igbo: Mịnịstrị ahụike na-adọ aka na ntị maka ọrịa mmiri na-ebute mgbe ide mmiri gasịrị.
Hausa: Ma’aikatar Lafiya na gargaɗi kan cututtuka masu yaɗuwa ta ruwa bayan ambaliya.
Yoruba: Ilé-iṣẹ́ ìlera kìlọ̀ nípa àwọn àrùn tí omi ń kó kiri lẹ́yìn omíyalé.

Source: Residents should report missing persons to emergency officials.
Igbo: Ndị bi n'ebe ahụ kwesịrị ịgwa ndị ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe mberede banyere ndị mmadụ furu efu.
Hausa: Mazauna su sanar da jami’an gaggawa idan mutum ya ɓace.
Yoruba: Ó yẹ kí àwọn olùgbé ìlú sọ fún àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ètò pàjáwìrì nípa àwọn tó sọnù.

Source: Heavy floods may damage electricity poles, causing power outages.
Igbo: Nnukwu ide mmiri pụrụ imebi ogidi ọkụ eletrik, na-akpata nkwụsịtụ ọkụ eletrik.
Hausa: Ambaliya mai ƙarfi na iya lalata sandunan wutar lantarki, wanda zai janyo katsewar wuta.
Yoruba: Àkúnya omi tó lágbára lè ba òpó iná mànàmáná jẹ́, èyí sì lè mú kí iná mànàmáná pa.

Source: The National Emergency Management Agency is coordinating relief efforts.
Igbo: Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe mberede na mba ahụ na-ahazi ọrụ enyemaka.
Hausa: Hukumar Agajin Gaggawa, NEMA, na jagorantar aikin agaji.
Yoruba: Ẹ̀ka tó ń bójú tó ètò pàjáwìrì lórílẹ̀-èdè náà ló ń ṣètò ìrànwọ́.

Source: Government agencies are working to clear blocked drainage systems.
Igbo: Ụlọọrụ gọọmentị na-arụ ọrụ iji kpochapụ usoro nsị mmiri a gbochiri egbochi.
Hausa: Hukumomin gwamnati na aiki don share magudanan ruwa da suka toshe.
Yoruba: Àwọn àjọ ìjọba ti ń ṣiṣẹ́ láti fọ àwọn ọ̀nà ìgbẹ́ tó ti dí.

Source: Riverbanks are eroding due to continuous rain and strong currents.
Igbo: Osimiri na-agbaze n'ihi mmiri ozuzo na-aga n'ihu na mmiri na-asọsi ike.
Hausa: Gaɓoɓin koguna na zaizayewa saboda ruwan sama akai-akai da gudun ruwa mai ƙarfi.
Yoruba: Àwọn odò tó wà létí odò ń ya lulẹ̀ nítorí òjò tó ń rọ̀ láìdáwọ́dúró àti ìgbì òkun tó lágbára.

Source: Do not rely on footpaths in flooded areas; they may be unstable.
Igbo: Atụkwasịla obi n'okporo ụzọ ụkwụ ndị dị n'ebe ndị ide mmiri na-ezo; ha pụrụ ịbụ ndị na-adịghị mma.
Hausa: Kada ka dogara da hanyoyin tafiyar ƙafa a wuraren da aku yi ambaliya; suna iya rushewa.
Yoruba: Má ṣe gbára lé àwọn òpópónà tó wà láwọn àgbègbè tí omi ti ya wọlé; wọ́n lè má dúró sán-ún.

Source: Residents should stockpile food and drinking water in case of emergencies.
Igbo: Ndị bi n'ebe ahụ kwesịrị ịkwakọba nri na mmiri ọṅụṅụ maka ihe mberede.
Hausa: Ya kamata mazauna su tanadi abinci da ruwan sha don halin gaggawa.
Yoruba: Ó yẹ kí àwọn olùgbé kó oúnjẹ àti omi mímu pa mọ́ fún ìgbà pàjáwìrì.

Source: Floodwater contamination increases the risk of cholera outbreaks.
Igbo: Mmetọ nke mmiri ide mmiri na-eme ka ihe ize ndụ nke ntiwapụ nke ọrịa ọgbụgbọ na-amụba.
Hausa: Gurɓatar ruwan ambaliya na ƙara haɗarin kamuwa da cutar kolera.
Yoruba: Àìmọ́tótó omi ìkún-omi máa ń jẹ́ kí àrùn kólẹ́rà tètè tàn kálẹ̀.

Source: Keep your mobile phone charged to receive emergency updates.
Igbo: Debe ekwentị gị na chaji ka ị na-enweta ozi mberede.
Hausa: Ku tabbatar wayarku ta cika caji don samun sabbin bayanai na gaggawa.
Yoruba: Máa fi fóònù alágbèéká rẹ ṣírò kí o lè máa rí ìsọfúnni pàjáwìrì gbà.

Source: First responders are rescuing stranded individuals in flooded zones.
Igbo: Ndị mbụ na-agbatara ndị mmadụ ọsọ enyemaka na-azọpụta ndị tọrọ atọ n'ebe ndị ide mmiri na-ezo.
Hausa: Ma’aikatan gaggawa na ceto mutanen da ambaliya ta rutsa da su.
Yoruba: Àwọn tó kọ́kọ́ wá ìrànwọ́ ń gba àwọn èèyàn tí wọ́n há sínú omi là láwọn àgbègbè tí omíyalé dé.

Source: Residents near flood-prone areas should evacuate immediately.
Igbo: Ndị bi nso n'ebe ide mmiri na-eme kwesịrị isi ebe ahụ pụọ ozugbo.
Hausa: Mazauna kusa da wuraren da ke fuskantar barazanar ambaliya su fice da gaggawa.
Yoruba: Àwọn tó ń gbé nítòsí àwọn àgbègbè tí omíyalé lè wáyé gbọ́dọ̀ fi ibẹ̀ sílẹ̀ lójú ẹsẹ̀.

Source: People in low-lying regions must relocate to safer ground.
Igbo: Ndị bi n'ógbè ndị dị ala aghaghị ịkwaga n'ebe ndị dị nchebe karị.
Hausa: Mutanen da ke zaune a wurare ƙasa-ƙasa su koma wuri mafi aminci.
Yoruba: Àwọn èèyàn tó ń gbé ní àwọn àgbègbè tí kò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ jìnnà sí òkè gbọ́dọ̀ ṣí lọ síbi tí kò léwu.

Source: Authorities have ordered evacuations in flood-affected villages.
Igbo: Ndị ọchịchị enyela iwu ka a gbapụ n'obodo nta ndị ide mmiri ahụ metụtara.
Hausa: Hukumomi sun bayar da umarnin ƙaura daga ƙauyukan da ambaliya ta shafa.
Yoruba: Àwọn aláṣẹ ti pàṣẹ pé kí àwọn èèyàn kúrò ní àwọn abúlé tí omíyalé ti bà jẹ́.

Source: Families are advised to move away from riverbanks before water levels rise.
Igbo: A na-adụ ndị ezinaụlọ ọdụ ka ha si n'akụkụ osimiri pụọ tupu ọkwa mmiri ebilie.
Hausa: Ana ba iyalai shawarar su bar bakin koguna kafin ruwa ya hauhawa.
Yoruba: A gba àwọn ìdílé níyànjú láti kúrò ní etí odò kí omi òkun tó lọ sókè.

Source: Schools in high-risk areas have been closed due to flooding.
Igbo: E mechiela ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ebe ndị nwere nnukwu nsogbu n'ihi ide mmiri.
Hausa: An rufe makarantun da ke yankunan da ke cikin barazana saboda ambaliya.
Yoruba: A ti pa àwọn ilé-ìwé ní àwọn agbègbè tí ewu pọ̀ sí nítorí omíyalé.

Source: Pregnant women and elderly residents should be evacuated first.
Igbo: E kwesịrị ibu ụzọ kpọpụ ụmụ nwanyị dị ime na ndị agadi bi n'ebe ahụ.
Hausa: Ya kamata a fara yi wa mata masu juna biyu da tsofaffi.
Yoruba: Ó yẹ kí a kó àwọn aláboyún àti àwọn àgbàlagbà kúrò lákọ̀ọ́kọ́.

Source: The local government is providing temporary shelters for flood victims.
Igbo: Gọọmentị obodo ahụ na-enye ndị ide mmiri ahụ metụtara ebe mgbaba nwa oge.
Hausa: Gwamnatin ƙaramar hukuma na samar da sansanonin wucin gadi don waɗanda ambaliya ta shafa.
Yoruba: Ìjọba àdúgbò náà ti ń pèsè àwọn ilé ààbò fúngbà díẹ̀ fún àwọn tí omíyalé dé bá.

Source: Emergency evacuation centers are now open in affected states.
Igbo: E wepụtaala ebe mmadụ nwere ike ịgbaba na steeti ndị ahụ ọ metụtara.
Hausa: Cibiyoyin ƙaura ta gaggawa yanzu a buɗe suke a jihohin da abin ya shafa.
Yoruba: Àwọn ibùdó ìsádi pàjáwìrì ti ṣí sílẹ̀ ní àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ tí àjálù náà ti wáyé.

Source: Residents should cooperate with officials and evacuate when instructed.
Igbo: Ndị bi ebe ahụ kwesịrị ime ihe ndị ọchịchị kwuru ma pụo mgbe ha sịrị pụọ.
Hausa: Ya kamata mazauna su ba wa hukumomi haɗin ku su ƙaura idan aka umarce su.
Yoruba: Ó yẹ kí àwọn aráàlú fọwọ́ sowọ́ pọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ìjọba kí wọ́n sì kúrò níbi tí wọ́n bá ti pàṣẹ fún wọn.

Source: Delaying evacuation may put lives at risk as flood levels rise.
Igbo: Ịnọ na-egbu oge n'ịkwapụ pụrụ itinye ndụ n'ihe ize ndụ ka ide mmiri na-arị elu.
Hausa: Jinkirta ƙaura na iya jefa rayuka cikin haɗari yayin da ruwa ke ƙaruwa.
Yoruba: Bí omi òjò bá ń pọ̀ sí i, ẹ̀mí àwọn èèyàn lè wà nínú ewu bí wọ́n bá ń fi àkókò falẹ̀.

Source: All movements should be restricted in heavily flooded areas.
Igbo: Ekwesịrị igbochi mmegharị niile n'ebe ndị ide mmiri na-ejupụta.
Hausa: Ya kamata a tsayar da dukkan ayyuka a wuraren da ruwa ya mamaye sosai.
Yoruba: Gbogbo ìgbésẹ̀ yẹ kí a dín kù ní àwọn àgbègbè tí omi ti ya wọ́n lẹ́nu.

Source: Flood rescue boats are available for stranded residents.
Igbo: Ụgbọ mmiri ndị na-azọpụta ndị ide mmiri dị maka ndị bi na ya.
Hausa: Akwai jiragen ruwa na ceto don taimaka wa mazauna da ambaliya ta rutsa da su.
Yoruba: Àwọn ọkọ̀ òkun tí wọ́n fi ń gba àwọn èèyàn là wà lárọ̀ọ́wọ́tó fún àwọn olùgbé tó bá wà nínú àkúnya omi.

Source: Parents should evacuate with their children to ensure their safety.
Igbo: Ndị nne na nna kwesịrị iso ụmụ ha pụọ iji hụ na ha chekwabara ha.
Hausa: Ya kamata iyaye su tseratar da ‘ya’yansu don tabbatar da lafiyarsu.
Yoruba: Àwọn òbí gbọ́dọ̀ kó àwọn ọmọ wọn lọ kí wọ́n lè dáàbò bò wọ́n.

Source: Seek shelter in designated evacuation centers during severe flooding.
Igbo: Chọọ ebe a na-agbaba ma mmiri zoo nọdụ.
Hausa: Ka nemi mafaka a wurarenc ƙaura da aka ware yayin ambaliya mai tsanani.
Yoruba: Tó bá ṣẹlẹ̀ pé omíyalé ń jà, máa wá ibi tó o ti máa sá pa mọ́.

Source: Local authorities will provide transportation for those unable to evacuate.
Igbo: Ndị ọchịchị obodo ga-enye ndị na-enweghị ike ịkwapụ ụgbọ.
Hausa: Hukumomin cikin gida za su samar da hanyoyin sufuri ga waɗanda ba za su iya ƙaura da kansu ba.
Yoruba: Àwọn aláṣẹ àdúgbò yóò pèsè ọkọ̀ ìrìnnà fún àwọn tí kò lè kúrò.

Source: People living near collapsed bridges must evacuate immediately.
Igbo: Ndị bi n'akụkụ àkwà mmiri dara ada kwesịrị ịpụ ozugbo.
Hausa: Dole ne mutanen da ke zaune kusa da gadojin da suka rushe su fice da gaggawa.
Yoruba: Àwọn èèyàn tó ń gbé nítòsí àwọn afárá tó wó gbọ́dọ̀ fi ibẹ̀ sílẹ̀ lójú ẹsẹ̀.

Source: The government has set up relief camps for displaced persons.
Igbo: Gọọmentị ehiwela ogige enyemaka maka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ.
Hausa: Gwamnati ta kafa sansanonin agaji don mutanen da aka raba da muhallansu.
Yoruba: Ìjọba ti dá àwọn àgọ́ ìrànwọ́ sílẹ̀ fún àwọn èèyàn tí wọ́n sá kúrò nílé wọn.

Source: Evacuation drills will be conducted in flood-prone areas.
Igbo: A ga-akpụpụta ndị mmadụ n'ebe nwere ide mmiri.
Hausa: Za a gudanar da horon ƙaura a yankunan da ke fama da barazanar ambaliya.
Yoruba: A ó ṣe ìdánrawò ìmúkúrò ní àwọn àgbègbè tí ìkún omi lè wáyé.

Source: If you are trapped in a flooded area, call emergency services.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ị danyere n'ide mmiri, kpọọ ndị na-ahụ maka ihe mberede.
Hausa: Idan ka maƙale a yankunan da suku yi ambaliya, ka kira layin gaggawa don samun taimakon gaggawa.
Yoruba: Tó o bá bára rẹ ní àgbègbè tí omi ti ya wọlé, pe àwọn tó ń bójú tó ọ̀ràn pàjáwìrì.

Source: Do not wait until the last minute to evacuate your home.
Igbo: E cheela ruo mgbe oge gaferela tupu ị hapụ ụlọ gị.
Hausa: Kada ku jira har sai lokaci ta ƙure kafin ka ƙaura daga gidanku.
Yoruba: Má ṣe dúró dìgbà tó máa pẹ́ jù kó o tó fi ilé sílẹ̀.

Source: Stay calm and follow official evacuation instructions carefully.
Igbo: Obi ruo gị ala ma mee ihe ndị ọchịchị kwuru nke ọma.
Hausa: Ka kasance cikin natsuwa kuma ku bi umarnin ƙaura daga hukumomi daidai.
Yoruba: Ẹ má ṣe jáfara, ẹ sì máa tẹ̀ lé ìtọ́ni tí ìjọba fún yín pé kẹ́ ẹ kúrò nílùú.

Source: Flood warnings indicate that evacuation is necessary in multiple states.
Igbo: Ozi gbasara ide mmiri na-egosi na ịgbapụ dị mkpa n'ọtụtụ steeti.
Hausa: Gargaɗin ambaliya na nuna cewa ƙaura ta zama dole a jihohi da dama.
Yoruba: Ìkìlọ̀ nípa omíyalé fi hàn pé ó pọn dandan láti ṣí kúrò ní ọ̀pọ̀ ìpínlẹ̀.

Source: Those refusing to evacuate may require emergency rescue later.
Igbo: Ndị jụrụ ịkwapụ nwere ike ịchọ enyemaka na mberede mgbe e mesịrị.
Hausa: Waɗanda suka ƙi ƙaura na iya buƙatar ceto na gaggawa daga baya.
Yoruba: Àwọn tó bá kọ̀ láti kúrò nílùú lè nílò ìrànlọ́wọ́ pàjáwìrì nígbà tó bá yá.

Source: Local leaders are assisting in coordinating safe evacuations.
Igbo: Ndị isi obodo na-enye aka n'ịhazi ndị mmadụ ịpụ n'enweghị nsogbu.
Hausa: Shugabannin al’umma na taimakawa wajen tsara ƙaura cikin aminci.
Yoruba: Àwọn olórí àdúgbò ń ṣèrànwọ́ láti ṣètò bí àwọn èèyàn ṣe máa sá kúrò láìséwu.

Source: The government is prioritizing the evacuation of vulnerable groups.
Igbo: Gọọmentị na-ahụ na otu na-esighị ike na-ebu ụzọ apụ..
Hausa: Gwamnati na ba fifiko ga ƙaurar waɗanda ke cikin haɗari.
Yoruba: Ìjọba ń fi àyè gba ìmúkúrò àwọn àwùjọ tí kò nílágbára.

Source: Medical teams will be available at evacuation centers.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ ahụike ga-anọ n'ebe ndị a na-ebuga ndị mmadụ.
Hausa: Ƙungiyoyin lafiya za su kasance a shirye a wuraren ƙaura.
Yoruba: Àwọn ẹgbẹ́ oníṣègùn yóò wà ní àwọn ibùdó ìsádi.

Source: Secure important documents before leaving your home.
Igbo: Chekwaba akwụkwọ gị dị mkpa tupu ị pụọ n'ụlọ.
Hausa: Ku tabbatar ka kulle takardu masu muhimmanci kafin barin gidanku.
Yoruba: Ṣọ́ àwọn ìwé tó ṣe pàtàkì tó o bá fẹ́ jáde nílé.

Source: Pack only essential items when evacuating to avoid delays.
Igbo: Buru naanị ihe ndị dị mkpa mgbe ị na-apụ apụ ka ị ghara igbu oge.
Hausa: Ka ɗauki muhimman abubuwa kaɗai yayin ƙaura don guje wa jinkiri.
Yoruba: Àwọn ohun tó pọn dandan nìkan ni kó o kó nígbà tó o bá fẹ́ kúrò nílé kó o má bàa pẹ́.

Source: Those in mud houses should evacuate to prevent collapse risks.
Igbo: Ndị bi n'ụlọ ụrọ kwesịrị ịpụ ka ha ghara ịda.
Hausa: Waɗanda ke zaune a gidajen laka su fice don gujewa hatsarin rushewa.
Yoruba: Ó yẹ kí àwọn tó ń gbé inú ilé tí wọ́n fi amọ̀ ṣe ṣí kúrò níbẹ̀ kí wọ́n má bàa wó lulẹ̀.

Source: High-risk zones have been mapped for mandatory evacuations.
Igbo: E nyeela iwu ka a kpọpụ ndị nọ ebe ka njọ ozugbo.
Hausa: An ayyana yankuna masu haɗari don ƙaura ta tilas.
Yoruba: A ti ṣe àwòrán àwọn àgbègbè tó léwu gan-an fún ìgbòkègbodò ìsádi.

Source: Flood levels are rising faster than expected; evacuate now.
Igbo: Ọ̀tụ̀tụ̀ ide mmiri na-arị elu ngwa ngwa karịa ka a tụrụ anya ya; gbapụnụ ugbua.
Hausa: Matakin ruwan ambaliya yana hauhawa da wuri fiye da tsammani; ka fice yanzu.
Yoruba: Ìkún omi náà ń yára pọ̀ sí i ju bí a ṣe rò lọ; ẹ kúrò níbí nísinsìnyí.

Source: Avoid panic and follow instructions from emergency responders.
Igbo: Zere ịtụ ụjọ ma gbasoo ntụziaka ndị ọrụ mberede nyere.
Hausa: Ku guji firgita kuma ku bi umarnin jami’an agajin gaggawa.
Yoruba: Má ṣe jẹ́ kí jìnnìjìnnì bo ọ, kó o sì máa tẹ̀ lé ìtọ́ni àwọn tó ń bójú tó ọ̀ràn pàjáwìrì.

Source: Evacuation notices will be broadcast on radio and mobile networks.
Igbo: A ga-agbasa ozi ịkpọpụta mmadụ na redio nakwa ekwentị.
Hausa: Za a riƙa sanar da umarnin ƙaura ta rediyo da wayoyin hannu.
Yoruba: A ó máa gbé ìkìlọ̀ nípa ìsádi jáde lórí rédíò àti lórí ẹ̀rọ alágbèéká.

Source: Communities in flood-prone zones should evacuate before nightfall.
Igbo: Ndị bi n'ebe e nwere ide mmiri ga-apụ tupu chi ejie.
Hausa: Ya kamata al’ummomi a yankunan da ke fama da barazanar ambaliya su ƙaura kafin dare ya zo.
Yoruba: Ó yẹ kí àwọn aráàlú tó wà ní àwọn àgbègbè tí omíyalé lè wáyé kó kúrò nílé kí òru tó ṣú.

Source: Road closures may delay evacuations; leave as soon as possible.
Igbo: Imechi okporo ụzọ nwere ike igbu oge n'ịkpọpụ ndị mmadụ; pụọ ebe ahụ ozugbo.
Hausa: Rufe hanyoyi na iya janyo jinkiri wajen ƙaura; ka fice da wuri.
Yoruba: Bí wọ́n bá ti pa àwọn ọ̀nà, ó lè mú kí àwọn èèyàn fi ibẹ̀ sílẹ̀ fúngbà díẹ̀; ẹ tètè kúrò níbẹ̀.

Source: Officials are distributing life jackets to assist with evacuations.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ gọọmentị na-ekesa jaket nchekwa iji nye aka na ịkpọpụ ndị mmadụ.
Hausa: Jami’ai na raba rigunan ruwa don taimakawa wajen ƙaura.
Yoruba: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ìjọba ń pín àwọn aṣọ ìgbafẹ́ láti ṣèrànwọ́ fún àwọn tí wọ́n ń sá kúrò.

Source: Avoid using flooded roads when evacuating to prevent accidents.
Igbo: Zere ịga n'okporo ụzọ ide mmiri jupụtara na ha mgbe ị na-apụ apụ iji gbochie ihe mberede.
Hausa: Ku guji bin hanyoyin da ruwa ya mamaye yayin ƙaura don gujewa haɗari.
Yoruba: Yẹra fún lílo àwọn ojú ọ̀nà tó ti kún fún omi nígbà tó o bá ń sá kúrò nílùú láti dènà jàǹbá.

Source: Medical staff are on standby to treat evacuation-related injuries.
Igbo: Ndị na-ahụ maka ahụike nọ na njikere ịgwọ ndị merụrụ ahụ mgbe a na-akpọpụtan ha n'ide mmiri.
Hausa: Ma’aikatan lafiya na cikin shiri don jinyar raunukan da ke da alaƙa da ƙaura.
Yoruba: Àwọn oníṣègùn ti wà ní ìmúrasílẹ̀ láti tọ́jú àwọn tó fara pa nígbà ìsádi.

Source: Avoid staying on rooftops; instead, relocate to official shelters.
Igbo: Zere ịnọ n'elu ụlọ; kama, gaa biri n'ebe gọọmenti kwuru ka ndị mmadụ biri.
Hausa: Ku guji zama a kan rufin gida; maimakon haka, ka koma mafakar da hukuma ta tanadar.
Yoruba: Má ṣe dúró sórí òrùlé ilé; kàkà bẹ́ẹ̀, kó lọ síbi tí ìjọba ti ṣètò pé kó o máa gbé.

Source: Keep flashlights and batteries ready in case of nighttime evacuation.
Igbo: Kwado ọkụ mkpanaka na batrị gị ma ọ bụrụ na e nwee mkpa isi n'ụlọ pụọ n'abalị.
Hausa: Ka tanadi fitilu da batura ko da za a yi ƙaura da dare.
Yoruba: Jẹ́ kí àtùpà àti batiri wà lárọ̀ọ́wọ́tó bí wọ́n bá fẹ́ sá kúrò nílé lóru.

Source: Listen for sirens and announcements signaling evacuation orders.
Igbo: Gee ntị n'olu siren na ọkwa ndị na-egosi na e nyeela iwu ka a gbapụ.
Hausa: Ka saurari ƙarar jiniya da sanarwa da ke nuna umarnin ƙaura.
Yoruba: Fetí sí àwọn ìró afẹ́fẹ́ àti ìkéde tó ń jẹ́ ká mọ̀ pé a gbọ́dọ̀ kúrò nílùú.

Source: Local security forces will assist in maintaining order during evacuations.
Igbo: Ndị nchekwa obodo ga-enye aka ịhụ na ihe niile gara nke ọma n'oge ndị mmadụ na-apụ.
Hausa: Rundunar tsaro ta cikin gida za ta taimaka wajen tabbatar da daidaito lokacin ƙaura.
Yoruba: Àwọn aláàbò àdúgbò yóò ṣèrànwọ́ nínú pípa ètò mọ́ lákòókò ìmúkúrò.

Source: Churches and mosques are offering temporary shelter for evacuees.
Igbo: Chọọchị na ụlọ alakụba na-enye ndị a chụpụrụ achụpụ ndo.
Hausa: Coci-coci da masallatai na bayar da mafaka ta wucin gadi ga masu ƙaura.
Yoruba: Àwọn ṣọ́ọ̀ṣì àti àwọn mùsùlùmí ń pèsè ibi ìsádi fúngbà díẹ̀ fún àwọn tí wọ́n kó kúrò nílùú.

Source: People with disabilities will receive evacuation assistance.
Igbo: A ga-enyere ndị nwere nkwarụ aka ịpụ.
Hausa: Mutanen da ke da naƙasa za su samu taimakon ƙaura.
Yoruba: Àwọn aláàbọ̀ ara yóò rí ìrànlọ́wọ́ gbà láti kúrò.

Source: Store food and water supplies before evacuating your home.
Igbo: Debe ihe oriri na mmiri n'ụlọ gị tupu i si n'ụlọ gị pụọ.
Hausa: Ka tanadi abinci da ruwan sha kafin ka fice daga gidanku.
Yoruba: Kọ́kọ́ kó oúnjẹ àti omi tó o máa lò pa mọ́ kó o tó kúrò nílé.

Source: Officials warn that floodwaters may reach dangerous levels overnight.
Igbo: Ndị ọchịchị ekwuola na ide mmiri ahụ nwere ike iru ogo dị egwu n'ime abalị.
Hausa: Jami’ai sun yi gargaɗi cewa ruwan ambaliya na iya ku matakin haɗari da dare.
Yoruba: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ìjọba kìlọ̀ pé òjò náà lè bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí í rọ̀ lóru.

Source: If transportation is unavailable, walk towards higher ground.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na e nweghị ụgbọala, jiri ụkwụ gaa n'ebe dị elu.
Hausa: Idan babu hanyoyin sufuri, ku yi tafiya zuwa wuri mai tudu.
Yoruba: Bí kò bá sí ọkọ̀, ẹ máa rìn lọ síbi tó ga.

Source: Make arrangements for livestock before evacuating rural areas.
Igbo: Chekwaba anụ ụlọ gị tupu ị si n'ime obodo pụọ.
Hausa: Ka tsara yadda za ku kula da dabbobin kiwo kafin ka ƙaura daga ƙauyuka.
Yoruba: Kó o tó ṣí kúrò láwọn ìgbèríko, kọ́kọ́ ṣètò fún àwọn ẹran ọ̀sìn.

Source: Emergency services are monitoring the situation for further evacuations.
Igbo: Ndị na-ahụ maka ihe mberede na-enyocha ọnọdụ ahụ maka ịkpọpụ ndị ọzọ.
Hausa: Ma’aikatan agaji na sa ido kan yanayi don duba buƙatar ƙarin ƙaura.
Yoruba: Àwọn ẹ̀ka tó ń bójú tó pàjáwìrì ń ṣàyẹ̀wò bí nǹkan ṣe ń lọ sí kí wọ́n lè dá àwọn èèyàn padà.

Source: Communities must prepare for possible long-term displacement.
Igbo: Obodo dị iche iche ga-akwado maka nkewa ga-anọte aka.
Hausa: Dole al’ummomi su shirya don yiwuwar barin muhallansu na dogon lokaci.
Yoruba: Àwọn aráàlú gbọ́dọ̀ múra sílẹ̀ fún ṣíṣí kúrò níbi tí wọ́n ń gbé fún àkókò gígùn.

Source: Authorities have announced the planned release of water from the Lagdo Dam.
Igbo: Ndị ọchịchị ekwuola na ha ga-eme ka mmiri na-agba na Dam Lagdo.
Hausa: Hukumomi sun sanar da shirin sakin ruwa daga Dam ɗin Lagdo.
Yoruba: Àwọn aláṣẹ ti kéde ètò tí wọ́n ń ṣe láti tú omi sílẹ̀ láti inú ìsédò Lagdo.

Source: The dam gates will be opened due to excessive water levels.
Igbo: A ga-emeghe ọnụ ụzọ mmiri ahụ n'ihi oke ogo mmiri ya.
Hausa: Za a buɗe ƙofofin dam ɗin saboda yawan matakin ruwa.
Yoruba: A ó ṣí àwọn ẹnubodè ìsédò nítorí omi tó pọ̀ jù.

Source: People living downstream should prepare for possible flooding.
Igbo: Ndị bi n'ebe ndịda ga-akwadebe maka ide mmiri.
Hausa: Mutanen da ke ƙasa da dam ɗin su shirya don yiwuwar ambaliya.
Yoruba: Àwọn tó ń gbé ní ìsàlẹ̀ odò náà gbọ́dọ̀ múra sílẹ̀ fún omíyalé tó ṣeé ṣe kó wáyé.

Source: Water will be released gradually to prevent sudden flooding.
Igbo: A ga-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-awụpụ mmiri iji gbochie ide mmiri na mberede.
Hausa: Za a saki ruwan a hankali don kauce wa ambaliya ta bazata.
Yoruba: Díẹ̀díẹ̀ ni wọ́n á máa tú omi náà sílẹ̀ kí òjò má bàa ṣàn.

Source: The Nigerian government is monitoring dam water levels closely.
Igbo: Gọọmentị Naịjirịa na-enyocha ọkwa mmiri dị na mmiri ahụ nke ọma.
Hausa: Gwamnatin Najeriya na sa ido sosai kun matakin ruwan madatsan ruwa.
Yoruba: Ìjọba Nàìjíríà ń tọ́jú ìpele omi inú àpáta náà pẹ̀lú ìpamọ́ra.

Source: Residents near riverbanks should relocate before the dam release begins.
Igbo: Ndị bi n'akụkụ osimiri kwesịrị ịkwaga ebe ọzọ tupu a malite ịtọhapụ mmiri ahụ.
Hausa: Mazauna kusa da bakin kogi su ƙaura kafin a saki ruwan.
Yoruba: Àwọn olùgbé tó wà nítòsí odò gbọ́dọ̀ kó kúrò ní ibẹ̀ kó tó di pé wọ́n tú àpáta náà sílẹ̀.

Source: Emergency alerts have been issued due to the rising water levels in the dam.
Igbo: E wepụtala ọkwa mberede maka mmiri na-arị elu na mmiri ahụ.
Hausa: An fitar da gargaɗin gaggawa saboda hauhawar matakin ruwa a dam ɗin.
Yoruba: A ti fi ìkìlọ̀ pàjáwìrì sílẹ̀ nítorí omi tó ń pọ̀ sí i nínú ìsédò náà.

Source: The release of water may lead to severe flooding in downstream communities.
Igbo: Mmiri a nwere ike ibute nnukwu ide mmiri n'obodo ndị dị n'okpuru mmiri.
Hausa: Sakin ruwan na iya haddasa mummunar ambaliya a ƙauyukan da ke ƙasa da dam ɗin.
Yoruba: Ìmújáde omi lè yọrí sí omíyalé tó le koko ní àwọn ìlú tó wà ní ìsàlẹ̀ odò.

Source: People should avoid fishing near the dam during the water release period.
Igbo: Ndị mmadụ kwesịrị izere ịkpa azụ n'akụkụ mmiri mgbochi ahụ n'oge a na-ewepụta mmiri.
Hausa: Mutane su guji kamun kifi kusa da dam ɗin lokacin da ake sakin ruwa.
Yoruba: Àwọn ènìyàn gbọ́dọ̀ yẹra fún wíwọ ẹja nítòsí ìsédò nígbà tí omi bá ń tú jáde.

Source: Flood control measures are being put in place before the dam release.
Igbo: A na-eme ihe iji gbochie ide mmiri tupu a tọhapụ ihe mgbochi ahụ.
Hausa: Ana ɗaukar matakan hana ambaliya kafin a saki ruwa daga dam ɗin.
Yoruba: Àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ láti dènà omíyalé ti ń wáyé kí wọ́n tó tú àpáta náà sílẹ̀.

Source: Authorities warn that uncontrolled water discharge can cause flash floods.
Igbo: Ndị ọchịchị na-adọ aka ná ntị na mmiri a na-anaghị achịkwa achịkwa pụrụ ịkpata ide mmiri na mberede.
Hausa: Hukumomi sun yi gargaɗi cewa sakin ruwa ba tare da kula ba na iya haddasa ambaliya ta bazata.
Yoruba: Àwọn aláṣẹ kìlọ̀ pé tí omi bá ń tú dà nù láìsí àbójútó, ó lè fa omíyalé.

Source: Farmers should relocate their livestock to higher ground immediately.
Igbo: Ndị ọrụ ugbo kwesịrị ibuga anụ ụlọ ha n'ala dị elu ozugbo.
Hausa: Manoma su fitar da dabbobinsu na kiwo zuwa wuri mai tudu cikin gaggawa.
Yoruba: Àwọn àgbẹ̀ gbọ́dọ̀ gbé àwọn ẹran ọ̀sìn wọn lọ síbi tó ga ní kíákíá.

Source: Engineers are inspecting the dam to ensure its structural integrity.
Igbo: Ndị injinia na-enyocha mmiri ahụ iji hụ na ọ kwụrụ nke ọma.
Hausa: Injiniyoyi na duba dam ɗin don tabbatar da ƙarfinsa da lafiyarsa.
Yoruba: Àwọn onímọ̀ ẹ̀rọ ń ṣàyẹ̀wò àpáta náà kí wọ́n lè rí i dájú pé kò ní bà jẹ́.

Source: The government has issued flood warnings following the dam release announcement.
Igbo: Gọọmentị amaala ọkwa gbasara ide mmiri ka e nyesịrị ọkwa ntọhapụ mmiri n'odo mmiri.
Hausa: Gwamnati ta fitar da gargaɗin ambaliya bayan sanarwar sakin ruwa daga dam ɗin.
Yoruba: Ijọba ti fi ìkìlọ̀ ìkún omi sílẹ̀ lẹ́yìn ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ìdásílẹ̀.

Source: The hydrology department has declared a high-risk flood alert.
Igbo: Ngalaba na-ahụ maka mmiri kwuru na e nwere ike inwe ide mmiri.
Hausa: Sashen kula da ruwa ya bayyana gargaɗin ambaliya mai haɗari.
Yoruba: Ẹ̀ka ìwádìí nípa omi ti kéde ìkìlọ̀ nípa ìkún omi tó léwu.

Source: Increased rainfall is causing dam reservoirs to fill up faster than expected.
Igbo: Mmiri na-ezo n'ike n'ike na-eme ka mmiri jupụta n'ọdọ mmiri ngwa ngwa karịa ka a tụrụ anya ya.
Hausa: Yawan ruwan sama na cika dam cikin sauri fiye da yadda ake tsammani.
Yoruba: Òjò tó ń rọ̀ tó sì ń pọ̀ sí i ló ń mú kí omi kún inú àwọn àgbá omi náà ju bí wọ́n ṣe rò lọ.

Source: A temporary ban on river navigation has been imposed near the dam.
Igbo: A machibidoro ịkwọ ụgbọ mmiri n'akụkụ mmiri ahụ.
Hausa: An sanya haramcin wucin gadi kan zirga-zirgar kan ruwa kusa da dam din.
Yoruba: A ti fi òfin de ìrìn-àjò orí odò fúngbà díẹ̀ nítòsí ìsédò náà.

Source: The water release will last for 48 hours to regulate reservoir pressure.
Igbo: Mmiri a ga-adịgide ruo awa iri anọ na asatọ iji dozie nrụgide dị n'ọdọ mmiri ahụ.
Hausa: Za a saki ruwan dam na tsawon sa’o’i 48 don daidaita matsin ma’adanar ruwan.
Yoruba: Ìtọ́jú omi náà yóò wà fún wákàtí méjìdínláàádọ́ta láti lè mú kí ìfúnpá omi inú àgbá náà wà níwọ̀ntúnwọ̀nsì.

Source: Low-lying villages should prepare for possible water overflow.
Igbo: Obodo ndị dị n'ala ala kwesịrị ịkwadebe maka ebe mmiri nwere ike ịgbafe.
Hausa: Ƙauyukan da ke ƙasa-ƙasa su shirya don yiwuwar tumbatsa da zubar ruwa.
Yoruba: Àwọn abúlé tó wà ní ìsàlẹ̀ ló yẹ kó múra sílẹ̀ fún àkúnya omi tó ṣeé ṣe kó wáyé.

Source: Residents should stay informed about dam water levels through official reports.
Igbo: E kwesịrị izi ndị bi n'obodo ahụ ozi nke ọma maka ogo odo mmiri site n'akụkọ ndị ọchịchị.
Hausa: Mazauna su rika bibiyar rahotannin hukuma kun matakin ruwan dam.
Yoruba: Àwọn olùgbé ní láti máa gbọ́ nípa bí omi adágún náà ṣe ga tó nípasẹ̀ ìròyìn ìjọba.

Source: Scientists warn that backflow from the dam could worsen existing floods.
Igbo: Ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị ekwuola na mmiri na-esi n'ọdọ mmiri ahụ asọghachi azụ nwere ike ime ka ide mmiri ndị dị ugbua ka njọ.
Hausa: Masana kimiyya sun yi gargaɗi cewa dawowar ruwa daga dam na iya ƙara tsananta ambaliya.
Yoruba: Àwọn onímọ̀ sáyẹ́ǹsì kìlọ̀ pé omi tó ń ṣàn padà láti inú àpáta náà lè mú kí omíyalé tó ti wà tẹ́lẹ̀ burú sí i.

Source: The National Emergency Management Agency is coordinating relief efforts.
Igbo: Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe mberede na mba ahụ na-ahazi ọrụ enyemaka.
Hausa: Hukumar Agajin Gaggawa ta Ƙasa, NEMA, na daidaita tsara agaji.
Yoruba: Ẹ̀ka tó ń bójú tó ètò pàjáwìrì lórílẹ̀-èdè náà ló ń ṣètò ìrànwọ́.

Source: Downstream flooding is expected in areas along the Benue River.
Igbo: A na-atụ anya ide mmiri na mpaghara ndị dị n'akụkụ Osimiri Benue.
Hausa: Ana sa ran yin ambaliya a yankunan ƙasa-ƙasa a wuraren da ke gefen Kogin Benue.
Yoruba: A retí pé kí ìkún omi wáyé ní àwọn agbègbè tó wà ní ìsàlẹ̀ odò Benue.

Source: Emergency shelters are being set up for those displaced by dam-related floods.
Igbo: A na-ehiwe ebe mgbaba mberede maka ndị a chụpụrụ n'ebe obibi ha n'ihi ide mmiri metụtara mmiri.
Hausa: Ana kafa sansanonin wucin gadi don waɗanda suka rasa muhallansu sakamakon ambaliya mai alaƙa da dam.
Yoruba: Àwọn ilé ààbò pàjáwìrì ni a ń gbé kalẹ̀ fún àwọn tí àkúnya omi tó jẹ mọ́ àpáta náà kó kúrò nílé wọn.

Source: Heavy rains have increased the likelihood of emergency water releases.
Igbo: Nnukwu mmiri ozuzo abawanyela mgbapụta mmiri na mberede.
Hausa: Ruwan sama mai yawa ya ƙara yiwuwar sako ruwan gaggawa daga dam.
Yoruba: Òjò tó rọ̀ gan-an ti mú kó ṣeé ṣe kí omi máa tú dà nù.

Source: The authorities are urging immediate action to prevent flood casualties.
Igbo: Ndị ọchịchị na-arịọ ka e mee ihe ozugbo iji gbochie ide mmiri.
Hausa: Hukumomi na kira da a ɗauki mataki nan da nan don guje waasara a ambaliya.
Yoruba: Àwọn aláṣẹ ń rọ àwọn èèyàn pé kí wọ́n tètè wá nǹkan ṣe kí wọ́n má bàa kó ẹ̀mí àwọn èèyàn sínú ewu.

Source: People should move valuables to higher floors before floodwaters rise.
Igbo: Ndị mmadụ kwesịrị iburu ngwongwo ha ndị dị oké ọnụ ahịa gaa n'okpukpu ụlọ ndị dị elu tupu ide mmiri ahụ amalite.
Hausa: Ya kamata mutane su matsar da kayayyakin su masu muhimmanci zuwa tudu kafin ruwa ya hauhawa.
Yoruba: Ó yẹ kí àwọn èèyàn kó àwọn nǹkan iyebíye wọn lọ sí àwọn àjà tó ga ju ti tẹ́lẹ̀ lọ kó tó di pé omíyalé bẹ̀rẹ̀.

Source: Experts say dam water releases should be carefully timed to reduce damage.
Igbo: Ndị ọkachamara na-ekwu na e kwesịrị iji nwayọ mara oge a ga-eji gbapụ mmiri dị n'ọdọ mmiri iji belata mmebi.
Hausa: Masana sun ce ya kamata a tsara lokacin sakin ruwa daga dam don rage ɓarna.
Yoruba: Àwọn ògbóǹkangí sọ pé ó yẹ kí wọ́n fara balẹ̀ ṣètò ìgbà tí wọ́n máa tú omi tó wà nínú àpáta náà jáde kí wọ́n lè dín ìpalára tó máa ṣe kù.

Source: Dam spillways will be monitored continuously during the release period.
Igbo: A ga na-enyocha mmiri ndị na-esi n'ọdọ mmiri ahụ asọ n'oge a na-ewepụta mmiri.
Hausa: Za a riƙa sa ido kan hanyar zubar ruwa daga dam a duk lokacin da ake sakin ruwa.
Yoruba: A ó máa ṣe àyẹ̀wò àwọn ibi tí omi ti ń ṣàn jáde láti inú àwọn ìsédò náà ní gbogbo ìgbà tí wọ́n bá ń tú omi náà jáde.

Source: Warning sirens will be sounded before the dam gates are opened.
Igbo: A ga-ama ọkwa tupu e mepee ọnụ ụzọ odo mmiri ahụ.
Hausa: Za a yi amfani da jiniyar gargaɗi kafin a buɗe ƙofofin dam ɗin.
Yoruba: Wọ́n á ti máa dún ìkìlọ̀ kí wọ́n tó ṣí àwọn ẹnubodè àpáta náà.

Source: The sudden release of large volumes of water can damage bridges and roads.
Igbo: Nnukwu mmiri na mberede nwere ike imebi àkwà mmiri na okporo ụzọ.
Hausa: Sakin ruwa mai yawa a lokaci guda na iya lalata gadoji da hanyoyi.
Yoruba: Bí omi tó pọ̀ bá ṣàdédé dà jáde, ó lè ba àwọn afárá àti ọ̀nà jẹ́.

Source: Residents must stay away from riverbanks until the floodwaters recede.
Igbo: A gwara ndị bi n'ebe ahụ ka ha ghara ịgafe osimiri ruo mgbe mmiri ahụ ga-ebelata.
Hausa: Mazauna su nisanta daga bakin kogi har sai ruwan ambaliya ya ragu.
Yoruba: Àwọn olùgbé ibẹ̀ gbọ́dọ̀ jìnnà sí etí odò títí omi á fi rọlẹ̀.

Source: Authorities have restricted movement around the dam for safety reasons.
Igbo: Ndị ọchịchị amachiela ndị mmadụ ịgagharị n'akụkụ mmiri ahụ maka nchekwa ha.
